title: Great holiday with good facilities overall
review: The hotel has lots of facilities that are accessible for everyone, with a dedicated adults area.  The staff are very friendly and helpful, I had an issue that I complained about and this was addressed and I received an apology.  We had a room with a roof terrace and hot tub, a real bonus.

title: Perfect place!
review: We had a lovely holiday at the Zafiro Tropic and thanks to all of the staff for making this such a perfect stay. The hotel was in a perfect position, not to close to all the mass hotel complexes nearer the beach but close enough to make the short walk to both the miles of sandy beach and the picturesque port. A short walk to the old town of Alcudia with its lovely old city wall added yet another bonus to the hotel.  We had a room overlooked the gardens which were beautifully maintained and meant the room was fairly quite compared to the rooms overlooking the pools. The room was spacious, clean and well maintained with spacious balconies.  The restaurant was well managed with a huge selection of high quality food at all times. One downside was one chef who want to act like a clown most of the time and appear to be unable to crack an egg without breaking the yolk or make an omelette without burning it. Thankfully he could be avoided by not choosing the eggs on those days.  The entertainment was a good standard and well managed.  The pools were lovely and the children had a lovely time playing with the bubble. We had no children with us but we took great pleasure in watching the children so happy with both the water and also the staff entertainment put on for them. As a couple with no children we took advantage of the adult only area and had many relaxing hours there enjoying the peace both in the area and in the pool. Perfect!  We even managed to hire the bikes at the hotel to cycle to the natural park nearby. The bikes were a bit old but totally adequate for casual cycling,  I guess they are not  used much so understandably not top quality.   The staff were all so friendly and made us feel welcome and coped with everything in a professional way. We thanks you for your care and attention and would not hesitate   to recommend the hotel to anyone.…

title: Second fantastic stay. Thanks Mella!
review: We returned this year following a wonderful stay in the Zafiro Tropic last year. This year with our 11 year old and 8 month old. The hotel is spotless with a good variety of foods. Friendly staff. Special thanks to Mella who made my daughter’s and our stay extra special.

title: Package holiday
review: We spent 8 nights at in Alcudia and the apartment was clean and nice. Perfect for our stay. The hotel had varies pools and a great parka day  kids pool with slides. The place was clean and the staff were friendly and couldn’t do enough for us. I would recommend a stay here if you have children or not. 10/10 from me. Thank you

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Stayed in October half term, and although the weather was awful, the kids and us had a fantastic time. The hotel was brilliant, with lots of pools to keep everyone occupied, including an indoor one which was a god send! It's only a five minute walk to the beach so is In a great location. The hotel was immaculately clean and staff really friendly and helpful. We'll be back again, but hopefully with better weather next time!!

title: short six days stay
review: staff   restaurantstaff was not very friendly towards singles. i was completely ignored most of the time,  only reception staff was helpfull  food  was okay... and a lot to choose from  location nicely located close to beach shops and restaurants  room looked really nice, but the smell was awfull, moist or fungus... not very nice room 1202, i reported it.  view not very interesting

title: Was our favourite but we have been left disappointed.
review: Dear carla b,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel.   We appreciate any feedback, regardless of whether it’s positive or negative, as this gives us the opportunity to improve.   I am surprised to hear that you were quite disappointed and did not enjoy your stay. I sincerely apologise if you consider our restaurant staff wasn't friendly and helpful to you, we certainly aim to provide the same level of service to all of our guests regardless the type of travel. I will look into this with them to ensure it doesn't happen again.  If you are ever planning to visit us again, please contact me directly so that I can look after you during your stay.   Best regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Good service
review: We have stayed at this hotel, and its sister Viva Sunrise many times over the last 8 years with our Daughter who has grown to love these hotels as a home from home, we have also bought family to stay too. We chose these hotels on recommendation and also, we decided as a treat we would book the Royal garden Suite, which comes with a large balcony/terrace with sofa, hot tub and bed... every year when we visit, sometimes twice a year we have had maintenance adjust the temperature to the recommended 39-40 degrees, it has never been a problem, we really look forward to using the hot tub as a family. Sadly this year on arrival we found the hot tub was chilly, cold even just 34-35 degrees, and certainly not hot, also the bubbles were not working in half the tub (room 1545) the…

title: Alcudia Holiday
review: Dear Cornishdreams,   Above all, we would like to thank you for having chosen Zafiro Tropic hotel again for your holiday in Mallorca and for sharing your opinion with other travellers on TripAdvisor.  We are sorry to read your experience wasn't as good as previous years due to the temperature of our hot tubs and pools. Due to new Health & Safety regulations, this year the maximum temperature permitted is 36 degrees. Most guests are generally ok with this temperature, but we understand each person has a different perception. I hope this explains the difference with previous years, and I am sorry you were disappointed because of this.  I also regret you left with the impression our team didn't take your case seriously, our engineers checked the hot tub inmediately after you reported the issue and they didn't find any faulty pieces. The engineer usually leaves a confirmation note in the terrace which I'm guessing for some reason it wasn't there.  Our goal is that our guests enjoy a perfect holiday, and I am sorry that you left our hotel with a bad impression of our service due to this particular incident.   I am very grateful to you for your trust in Zafiro Hotels and, once again, for having taken the time to share your experience with the rest of the travel community.  I do hope we will have the chance to welcome you and your family again.  Sincerely,  Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Angela Fisher, Leicester
review: Nice and clean hotel, with good service!  Very bikefriendly, your own "parkingplace" for your bike.  Nice food, and nice rooms. A little bit too much noise from rooms around us, would have been nice if it was a bit more noise reduction in ceiling and walls.

title: Not so bad.…
review: Apart from the small balcony with no sun ever, the lack of water for two days and the lakage from the roof when the water was back on, we had a nice stay.  Otherwise clean and tidy. We did get a new room.   Would Aldo like to thank for the bottle of Cava to our daughter on her 9th birthday.

title: Five day cycling trip
review: Dear JgbgW,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review and for choosing to stay at Zafiro Tropic Hotel.   I would like to apologise for the service issues you experienced during your stay. This is not the level of service that we strive to achieve and I have thus taken note of this and passed it on to Senior Management to review this with the members of staff within their teams.   I do hope to welcome you back to Zafiro hotel in the future.   Many thanks,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Great visit
review: The staff at Zafiro Tropic are its greatest asset, from reception to restaurant staff, cleaning staff- all so friendly and helpful. The hotel was spotlessly clean and made a very pleasant oasis after a hard day on the bike. Huge choice of food at breakfast and lunch . Would definitely recommend.

title: Can't fault it.
review: Dear Joe M,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay.   I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Alcudia again soon.   Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Zafiro tropic rated excellent
review: Lovely hotel to stay in, rooms are spacious and spotless, staff are so efficient and friendly,I was cycling most days but when I was resting there is plenty to do and see. Food was amazing and such a wide variety of every product for both breakfast and dinner every day. We had two males in our room, only gripe was towels weren't replaced automatically every day but when I asked the cleaners to replace there was no issue. Beach and Town is only a 5min stroll so easily accessible to everyone.

title: Fab family hotel
review: Currently staying here in a premium privilege 1 bedroom apartment, the rooms are absolutely fantastic with the extra garden space.  Can not fault the rooms, massive bed, great shower, everything you need in a mini kitchen.  My 3 year old is in his element so much to do for the kids who get bored easily. Can jump from pool to pool.  Can’t comment on food as been eating out.  The service on the desk on arrival was brilliant. Ignore any negative comments because this is a perfect 4 star hotel with everything you need for a self catering holiday. I wouldn’t ever go all inclusive so I can’t comment on that aspect.

title: Lovely hotel.
review: On arrival we were greeted by the receptionist who was great, she let us know exactly how the hotel worked and i always felt like we could ask if we had any queries. We arrived a bit earlier than planned, check in was at 14.00 but the room wasn’t ready till 14.30, which was fine because there is a room to store your suitcases and we went and had a look round the hotel anyway. Everything that is brought within the hotel is paid for on your wrist bands that you have for the duration of your stay, these also open your door to your room. Our room was clean, tidy and very modern, the bathroom was lovely with a big walk in shower, we never used the kitchen but everything was available, pots, pans, toaster and kettle. One thing we have never had to do before is pay for a safe which is…

title: Central and comfortable hotel
review: I came with my 16 year old daughter and a friend and had a one bedroomed apartment. This was very comfortable and I loved the fact that the flat has a coffee machine. Big plus from me!!! I slept in the living-room and the bed was comfortable enough but there is a lot of noise when people walk past - especially when pulling a suitcase. Earplugs recommended! Our room was facing the side-street and we were on the ground floor. We had a small grassed area with sun loungers and it was quiet and relaxing. So glad we did not face the pool!   The pool areas are nice and loved the chill-pool for adults only, especially when the activities started! The evening entertainment was ok but drinks were expensive and not very good (coctails).   Location is fantastic - 5 minutes to the beach and…

title: Family hotel
review: We had a garden view studio on the 5th floor with further  views of the mountains and part sea. Room had a kitchentte and a large bed. We had enough space. What we missed in the kitchen was something to use in order to wash the dishes. We had to buy small sponges. Satellite TV was great, we had BBC and ITV (we don't have ITV in Holland). We only went to the chill pool once. The other pools were often full with kids playing. Staff were friendly and helpful.

title: Great week!
review: We had a great week her in september. Good weather and great staff. Very good with kids. Our children had a great time With lot of activites. We will absolutely visit this Place again. Good Food as well.

title: Family self catering
review: Very pleased to receive an upgrade to a 1 bedroom ground floor appt from a studio upon arrival. However, the patio was situated right opposite the all inclusive dining area, so that was our view when we had breakfast which wasn’t ideal. The pools were of a brilliant standard and was perfect having the kids pool within 50 yards. Entertainment for the kids appeared to be good, but my 2 year old wasn’t interested in it as was a wee bit too young. The evening entertainment was ok, but started at 9pm and finished at 10pm(no music after 10pm) which I could not believe. If I’d booked all inclusive I would’ve been miffed. The hotel was perfectly located with several supermarkets within 200 yards. The beach is fantastic for both kids and adults alike with several bars and a variety of…

title: What a wonderful week 10/10
review: What a lovely holiday we had at Zafiro Tropic. My partner and our 2 year old and 9 month old have just got back from a week at Zafiro Tropic and we have had a fantastic time - mainly due to the kids club activities that were on offer to keep our toddler happy. She loved hanging out with Mella, Alva and Noemi at the kids club making things, playing games and at the mini disco. I cannot thank them enough for all of their hard work. We had the most wonderful stay because they made our little ones happy, which meant that we were able to relax and enjoy ourselves. We had a ground floor apartment that overlooked the bubble pool which suited us well as we were able to stay in the shade on the decking outside the room, but also go for a swim with the children without needing to take…

title: second trip abroad vid our whole family, and this was a success
review: Very nice room. VERY GREAT staff. Our grandchildren loved all the staff in the hotell. Nice  pools for everyone, inklusive our small grandchildren. Very good kitchen (allmost too good). 100% plus experience of this trip. PE

title: An OK holiday
review: Friendly helpful staff, clean rooms, wide choice of all inclusive drinks etc. Izzy the koala mascot and his team of pirates were brilliant with the kids. For a family holiday with young children, this was a really good hotel with lots of space and 6 pools, including an indoor pool in the spa area and an 18 plus for a little bit of me time. On the down side I’m afraid that the food, although quite edible lacked that come and eat me presentation, even in the A le Carte, and was confusing in the choices it offered. More to the point, it was barely warm! However, would I return, only for the children.

title: Great hotel for kids
review: We just returned from a great stay at the Zafiro Tropic. It has the Perfect location, both close to the Beach and the city. We loved the facilities for the kids with the splash pool, play area and entertainment. We did not try the food at the hotel as it was so easy to eat out.  We had a 2 bed room apartment with a private garden. It was really nice and spacious.  Staff friendly and helpful.  Great idea with the chip for payment and key.  We would definately come again.

title: Really lovely stay at Zafiro Hotel 😃
review: Thank you for a pleasant stay at Zafiro hotel. We had our first holiday as a family at your hotel and it was perfect! Hotel was clean, food really tasty, entertainment was really good too and all staff so polite, friendly and helpful. Everything was as it should be. Your staff working so hard!!   Zafiro hotel enjoy your sun vacation! And let us for you... Zafiro hotel the best place to feel free ... 😁

title: Audrey Jackson
review: Would highly recommend this lovely hotel. All of the staff were extremely friendly and efficient. Accommodation very comfortable and food was varied tasty and beautifully presented.  The facilities for children were exceptionaland safe.

title: Zafiro Tropic Hotel Alcudia
review: We have just returned and we have had a lovely holiday. Hotel is in a good location. Very clean. Was surprised we had to pay for the safe in the room as everywhere else we have been it was a refundable deposit or free.

title: A place to be
review: We had a great stay at Zafiro Tropic. Å very nice place to go with chillern. The childrens pools were exellent! Our 4 year old son really enjoyed it, and so did we😊  The hotell is close to everything.

title: Could be better..
review: Positives: Rooms and pools and playground  Improvement needed: Food and drinks are low standard. Also we sometimes got the impression that it is all about money, and not really trying/wanting to keep customers satisfied. So basically, something management could do better..

title: Better for young families
review: Good staff. Tried hard to please. Had a self catering room but very basic. Lots of young families and noise level a bit high for oldies.  Check your bil. Area was ok and close to town and bus stops. Be weary of pickpockets in the town.  Air conditioner was suspect

title: defiantly not a 4 star hotel!
review: Dear 214glenn,   Thank you for sending us your comments after your stay with us.   We sincerely regret that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. We would have liked to have had the chance to hear about your experience in reception and resolved the problems during your stay. Our team is always available to guests to ensure they are satisfied with their stay.   However, we also hope that you were able to enjoy all of our other services and facilities and that we may welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Not 4* hotel
review: We recently stayed at zafiro tropic for 1 week getting into our room which wasnt exactly great it smelt of damp and the rooms are looking rather tired, no complimentary tea or coffee is offered on your arrival in the room ,on every holiday i have ever been on this has always been the case ,the balcony was over looking a buzy noisy road which for me with 2 young babies was not great we were woken a few times due to the noise when we asked to change our room as i didnt want to be over looking the road side we were told we cant do this, this hotel is far from cheap so to be billed for a travel cot at the ed of the week which was already put up in the room without us even asking for it i thought was pretty poor considering we had already paid for my little girl within the room price…

title: VERY loud music and bad fitness
review: Dear npalmer84,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate any feedback, regardless of whether it’s positive or negative, as this gives us the opportunity to improve.   I sincerely apologise if you consider that the attitude of our staff was not acceptable. I will investigate this matter further and ensure that appropriate training will be provided if necessary. On behalf of the entire team, I am truly sorry that you didn't enjoy your holidays fully, especially as this is not the level of service we aim to provide to our guests.   If you are ever planning to visit us again, please contact me directly so that I can look after you during your stay.   Best regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: DO NOT VISIT
review: The rooms here are of a standard that is not of 4* quality . Cheap quality furnishings, laminate flooring and minimal decorations. Parts of the hotel need refurbishment e.g. mini golf area looks tired and in need of smartening up. The hotel appears to have been upgraded to obtain 4* status but the basic fabric of the rooms is not to that level. I would not recommended the hotel.

title: Pros n Cons
review: I may be being slightly harsh awarding only 3 stars being average but 4 denotes very good and perhaps a true score would be somewhere twixt the two. The staff were certainly consistently very very good being polite, friendly and efficient each and every one of them. Had a one bed superior apartment which was more than adequate and very clean. Had missed our evening meal upon arrival but sandwiches, fruit and water were a welcome find in the fridge. We stayed AI but if staying SC then note the prices to eat and drink in the hotel are very expensive. EG breakfast €24!  The in house supermarket likewise. They even add on a surcharge to the cover price of newspapers and price marked soft drinks, a practice that is illegal in the UK. There are far superior and cheaper supermarkets …

title: Spoiled vacation
review: Dear TREBORBARNSLEY,   Thank you for sending us your comments after your stay with us.   We sincerely regret that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. We would have liked to have had the chance to hear about your experience in reception and resolved the problems during your stay. Our team is always available to guests to ensure they are satisfied with their stay.   However, we also hope that you were able to enjoy all of our other services and facilities and that we may welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Zafiro Tropic Just Gets Better
review: I was in the hotel with my daughter 9 y.o. After 4 days (every day she spent a lot of time in the swimming pool) she felt bad (pain in the ear & temperature 38 & higher). In the clinic the doctor said, that the reason for infection otitis externa (it was the diagnosis) 1) sulfur plugs and 2) DIRTY WATER IN THE SWIMMING POOL!!! Only because of the bacteria it’s possible to have such an infection. So, time (it was week-vacation) & money were wasted. The way-back was really terrible (pain in the ear in the aircraft, temperature rise up to 39). Then she was ill for 3 weeks (because another ear also became ill, despite of antibiotic). All these terrible things because of the bacteria in the swimming pool in the hotel (also, sulfur plugs it’s ours fault).   The food in the restaurant…

title: Super vacation
review: Dear AlexanAA,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review following your stay with us.   I am truly sorry that you couldn’t enjoy your stay fully and I’d like to apologise for this. We are sorry to hear that your daughter had an ear infection during your holiday, I appreciate how inconvenient and unfortunate this can be and we all hope she’s fully recovered by now.   We take Health & Safety accusations very seriously and I would like to take this opportunity to inform you that our engineers check daily the water of our pools. In addition to this, the water also gets inspected by an external company on a weekly basis. In the event of finding anything suspicious, we have strict protocols to guarantee the safety of all our guests. We carried an internal investigation immediately after you reported this and we’ve failed to find evidence of any bacteria in the water.   I have however shared your feedback with both our engineers and this company to keep a closer eye and be extra careful with the water readings.   Should you be interested in reading the water parameters over the period of your stay, we remain at your entire disposal.   Again, I’m very sorry you couldn’t enjoy your holidays fully and we hope we can welcome you back again in the future.  Kind regards,  Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Great family holiday
review: My wife and I have been lucky to visit the Zafiro Tropic four times in the last five years  and its always been a great Hotel  but having just returned from the Hotel two days ago I can say the tropic has improved again.  The Head Chef delivers a series of meals that surpass themselves and Lorenzo the Restaurant Manager runs a marvellous team of waiters who deliver the goods in professional  service and nothing is impossible for this team of servers.  Moving on to the reception staff whatever problem that comes up the reception team will answer it.  There was one disappointing thing  this year that is the entertainment team...They do not seem to have any direction whereas in previous years there was a leader and the rest of the entertain team rallied around their leader. Just to…

title: Great hotel
review: We have really enjoyed one week at this hotel. Great food and very nice staff. We used the photographer from Vista photo to take familyphotos. We are very pleased with the photos and the photographers were very profesionall. Recommend all that are staying at the hotel to visit them with the reception at the hotel.

title: Zaffiro tropics
review: We went last year and it was brilliant couldn't fault it at all but this year i was a little disappointed with a few things that had been changed  Last year every night at the reaturant was a theam night this year only 2nights a week had a theam  Last year the entertainment set up was after dinner they had a kid a kids show featuring the mascot yzzy which the kids loved then the main show and then the quiz, this year the kids show was an hour and a half before dinner and the mascot on did a show on Sunday and appeared for about 5mins every other night. Then the main show at 9 and quiz which followed . We preferred last year's set up. Also all the kids were made to sit back and and still while the kids show was on. Really unfair as they just want to interact especially the bubble…

title: David Landon
review: Our 2nd year here at zafiro tropic yet again we had a fantastic time lots to do for my 2 year old the whole team at the hotel were excellent friendly helpful and very caring to my son which was one of the main reasons we returned to zafiro tropic the hotel is very clean the food is very good lots of different selections to choose from the pool bar food was delicious too my favourite are there pizzas. We look forward to returning again thank you for helping to make our holiday great

title: Family holiday
review: Spent 10 nights here. Hotel clean and well looked after. Staff are friendly and welcoming. Food is standard for a hotel with all inclusive  package. Always plenty and never ran out. There are four pools and a splash pool for little ones. The water in the pools was cold, I think because the pools are in the middle of the hotel so surrounded by buildings so only get sun directly on the water during the hot part of the day, 2 are quite deep and waterfall into the 2 shallower pools so the all remain cold. Not pleasantly so, couldn’t just chill in the pools because it was cold. Limited sun beds around the pool and even though there are signs advising people not to reserve sun beds it still happens and to get a good sunbed you had to be there by before 8 am and by 8.30am the sunbeds…

title: Brillant hotel
review: Dear Mphazi,   Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to leave a review.   We value your feedback regarding your stay at Zafiro Tropic Hotel. Your comments have been passed on to our management team to help improve our service.   We hope to welcome you back to our hotel in the near future.   Best regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Wonderful holiday with all the family
review: Just got back from a great week at this hotel. Have visited many hotels and must say this is on our best list. Nice position 5 minutes from beach, great facilities, excellent staff, spotlessly clean and most of all fantastic food. Very good choice and quality, always nicely presented.Modern bright accommodation. Lovely pool areas for kids and adults alike. Super spa which we didn't need to use as weather was amazing. Will definitely go there again

title: Zafiro Tropic Hotel Lovely Location
review: Exellent hotel very friendly staff the food and drink were very good i would recommend all inclusive as the waiter service is very good not to far away from beach and market we are already looking at booking again next year only one complaint should have stayed 10 days instead of 7

title: GREAT RESORT
review: Our room was lovely , very clean  food was 9/10 great selection  booking a table for 6 in the resturant through the app was struggle , eventually reception sorted it  great facilities for the kids , all the staff was very pleasent to talk to , great experience for my kids first holiday , will definately go back !

title: Lovely hotel in a fantastic location.
review: Much nicer than i expected as i paid through the nose for school holiday trip and was a little apprehensive.  Caters more for the all inclusive masses but it didn't hinder our self catering stay in anyway.  Lunch at the poolside restaurant was very good but a little expensive.  All the pools are great which my 6 year old loved.  Staff, amid service were all spot on.  Getting a sunbed around one of the pools isn't easy this time of year but the lifeguards do their best to deter those that reserve very early morning.  Will definitely stay again and consider maybe bed and breakfast/half board next time.

title: Zafiro Tropic Brilliant Hotel. Highly recommend in every way!!
review: We visited this hotel for a second time this year. Our first holiday here last year was so good, we returned this summer for another brilliant holiday.   The hotel is very clean and tidy and the staff are ALL kind, friendly and look after the guests well.  We stayed all inclusive in a premium studio with a garden view. The room was perfect for three of us (two adults and a ten year old) and the maids were so lovely they left the rooms with a nice touch every day.    The entertainment team were brilliant, they worked hard to Keep adults and children entertained and we thoroughly enjoyed their entertainment through the week.  The evening quiz and dancing was fun and the children were well looked after. Every night there were activities near the evening entertainment area for the…

title: 4th visit and still amazing!
review: This was our 4th stay at Zafiro Tropic and we have already booked again for next August as we absolutely love this hotel.  All of the staff are lovely, always smile and chat and work so hard in the scorching heat. They always remember us year on year and we are so familiar with the hotel and staff that it just feels right to keep going back.  There is literally something to do for everyone and one day I hardly saw my husband and son as they were off doing activities all day from 11-5.45….although I did have the pleasure of their presence for an hour at lunchtime.  This works though as I get to read my book while my active boys do what they enjoy.  A special shout out to Dennis from the animation team who is amazing at getting everyone involved including my shy son….he even got…

title: Very Family Friendly
review: Just came back from 10day trip with my wife and 5yr old. We all loved it. All the way from the sandwiches and salads in the fridge for us to eat due to our late check-in in the first night, to the staff always greeting us with a smile and making a big effort with our 5yr old. The hotel is well maintained, spotlessly clean, great facilities. My wife tried to spa and was very pleased with her facial and the price. The food was good, very well presented and varied every night. To say the least we will be booking again with either the Zafiro Tropic or another Zafiro hotel in the chain as many familes we met during our stay only had good things tk say and several have stayed in may different hotels of this chain never been disappointed.   The only reasons it did not got 5* was the…

title: Excellent from start to finish
review: We had a great experience at the Zafiro Tropic.  The hotel, although only 4 star, had every facility you could wish for, for both children and adults.  Our room although not massive was extremely well equipped and very clean.  The staff at this hotel are obviously well trained and this shows in their helpful and pleasant attitude at all times. The quality, variety and huge array of food at Breakfast, lunch and dinner could not have been bettered.  The adult only pool area was a huge bonus and well used.

title: Great family friendly hotel
review: There is a lot to do throughout the day with the entertainment staff for kids. Great variety of food which is so fresh. It’s very clean and staff work exceptionally hard to ensure you have a great time.

title: family holiday in august
review: As a family of 4 children, 1 as a wheelchair user I cannot fault Zafiro Tropic.. wheelchair friendly, staff are all lovely and will help as much as possible, food was varied every day and a great quality, the pools are great for the children with different ones to choose from and the rooms were lovely. I would definitely return with the children again. Alcudia is a great place and wheelchair accessible all over!

title: Not the worst
review: Brilliant hotel but a few issues  1) Not enough sunbed to accommodate high season. You feel like your on top of each other. 2) Poor service at the bar though the day and on and evening for drinks. 3) Food gets a little but repetitive after a while same old chips pizza. 4) entertainment isnt aimed at kids really for adults but other than that a nice hotel wouldnt go back but enjoyed our stay

title: Save your money and book at proper 4 star
review: Dear Donna L,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at the Zafiro Tropic. Your feedback, whether positive or negative, is very important to us as it gives us the opportunity to always seek improvement.   I have already shared your comments with the departments involved to see what can we do to improve on those areas.  Should you wish to give us another chance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me directly so that I can ensure everything will be spot on.   Regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Lovely family holiday!
review: There are some good points about this hotel. The pools, the restaurant, the children's playground. BUT the filthy rooms, the kids club and the children's entertainment is very poor. Our room (2 bed renovated apartment) was grubby and always smelt musty and even though I told housekeeping and reception it was never properly cleaned. I chose to accompany my children to the kids club just to see what it was all about. I was appalled at the lack of interest shown by the staff in the children and the dull itinerary.  If you are looking to leave your children in the kids club this is not the hotel for you as they only run 'supervised' activities 10.30-12.30 . The afternoon is all open so the kids (from the age of 4!!!!) can come and go as they choose. The kids club is hotel run and…

title: Family Holiday - 14/08/19-24/08/19
review: Dear LovesholidaysLondon,   Thank you for taking some of your precious time to share your impressions about our hotel on TripAdivsor.  We are pleased that you enjoyed a few days of rest in Mallorca. However, we have also taken note of your comments about our mini club that we will share with the Entertainment team to help ensure that our service is always of the highest quality. We regret that you have been left with this bad impression and hope again for another chance in the future.  Thanks again for sharing your opinion with the rest of the travel community.  It would be a pleasure to welcome you back on your next visit to any Zafiro Hotel.  Best regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Very nice hotel with good location. Then very good service
review: We stayed with Zafiro Tropic for 10 days in August with my husband, 12 & 16 year old children.  I would say this is a great hotel for families with children age 12 and below as most activities geared towards this age group, football is run every morning (a massive hit with my 12 year old) mini golf, table tennis, various pools and kids clubs (neither of mine used) the adult only pool is a massive bonus! Service is great, we asked for a room upgrade to a pool view, this was accommodate with no problem. A couple of negatives: The hotels is very busy - almost needs a larger pool area to accommodate everyone, and you have to get up early to place towels down (by 8:45am) they will take them away if you are not back by your bed within 30-45 mins.  This wasn't great for us as with two…

title: Room 1538
review: Very nice hotel with good location. Then very good service and good staff Amina very helpful and with a smile always. maybe the hotel's next hotel manger Thanks to Tony for providing good service. The also dont forget the housekeeping very claen all the days we stay

title: Luxurious hotel.
review: The hotel is beautiful, the staff are amazing and they cater for everyone. There are loads of pools with different depths and activities. The pool areas are clean and well set out. Staff ensure sunbeds arent reserved at breakfast time, with a 40 minute time limit, which is plenty of time to eat breakfast.Theres even a huge grass area beyond the pool areas that has more sunbeds and is peaceful. The staff serving drinks and food are very hard working and everything runs smoothly. Our studio room was large with kitchenette, fridge, lovely bathroom with hairdryer and lots of complimentary toiletries. The location couldn't be better, close to Alcudia beach, which is why we return to this resort time and again. This has been the nicest hotel we've stayed in to date. The only negative…

title: Fantastic holiday
review: Loads to do, this hotel has everything for children and adults. It is literally two mins from the beach, our pool/ beach and mountain view from the balcony was superb. Staff are very friendly and helpful and if you don’t want to que for the bar then the onsite shop sells everything you need including cold refreshments. I was apprehensive about sunbeds after reading the reviews, however this wasn’t an issue. We always managed to get a couple of sunbeds, just remember not be geeedy, if your children are swimming, the do not need a sunbed reserved with a towel all day. We had loads of fun and I would defiantly go back as shops/ boat trips and a good thirty eating places are on your doorstep too. We loved the excursion to marina land and also enjoyed the private experience with…

title: Ms
review: Just got back back from a fabulous family holiday, (16 of us!).  As expected, the hotel was extremely busy being school holidays. However, the hotel staff manage it very well considering the amount of people they have to cater for. The food was excellent, particularly the pool bar for lunch. The cocktails, wine and all soft drinks were of excellent quality.  You had to get up early to get sun loungers I.e 7.30/8am. If your loungers were vacant for 40 minutes or more then the pool staff removed your towels, which I thought was fair. The only ‘moan’ we had, was that we found a few staff to be bit ‘grumpy’ to start with. When we raised our concerns over a couple of things, they were rectified and dealt with. From then on we found all the staff very pleasant.  Initially we were…

title: Great
review: Great for children  Take spray for mosquitos if you want to avoid.” Go all inclusive it’s worth it.  Do a pack lunch at breakfast for yourself and family at breakfast on last day, saves money at airport. When going to beach walk s little way down beach as there’s Is a bit of a smell. Ask for children’s buckets and spades behind life guard at pool lots. Also other bits people no longer need. Get bottle water at bar to take to your to your room. Food lovely and we had no bad tummies. Your tag on arm band is your key to room this is also scanned for all inclusive ice creams, drinks, food.  Rooms nice size and very clean.

title: Great for a family holiday
review: This resort ticked all of the boxes for our needs with 4 young children. Upon arrival I found it pretty cramped but this really didn’t affect anything at all. There’s a lot squeezed on site which keeps the children happy, also an over 18 relaxation area (which I didn’t really use as you can imagine). The food was spot on with options for even the fussiest of eaters.  The beach is a 5 minute (at most) walk away and is beautiful. The water is very shallow with calm seas, again ideal for young kids.  There’s a harbour 15 mins walk away with lots of places to eat or have a drink.  I’ve stayed at better resorts but for what our needs were keeping a budget in mind I cannot fault this place.

title: Lovely holiday
review: Lovely hotel with friendly staff. Pools great for all and great range of drinks on offer. Breakfast and pool snacks fab! Special thanks to the hotel for taking our daughter’s egg allergy seriously. It is always a major worry for us travelling abroad as many unlikely foods contain egg products and can be very dangerous for her. The hotel were AMAZING!! They  provided her with an allergy. Card to carry around. The card talked about the issues with cross contamination too which is also a concern for us. The head chef, Javier, was wonderful and I can’t express our thanks to him enough. He came out to meet lily every day, took her around the buffet and told her exactly what she could and couldn’t have to eat. He made a real effort with her and she loved him!  He remembered her every…

title: Truly awful hotel
review: We have stayed in zafiro hotels for over 10yrs and have always been fantastic, however our stay in the zafiro tropic alcudia was nothing but terrible on a number of points listed below. 1. Mosquitoes iv never been bitten until staying here, the hotel and our room was infested despite purchasing bottles and bottles of room spray they just kept appearing the walls upto our room were covered at night in mosquitoes.  2. We booked a jacuzzi superior room all inclusive I was disgusted at the poor state the room and the out side area, the walls and curtains had splattered mosquitoes all over them, the room its self was very aged nothing like any other room I have stayed in at other zafiro hotels even though we payed the same amount for this room,we knocked the shower on and within…

title: Love it!
review: Dear Nicolagreggain,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.   I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for choosing to stay at Zafiro Tropic Hotel.   I would like to apologise for the service issues you experienced during your stay. This is not the level of service that we strive to achieve and I have thus taken note of this and passed it on to Senior Management to review this with the members of staff within their teams. I do hope to welcome you back to Zafiro hotel in the future.   Many thanks,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Fantastic holiday for families with young children
review: Perfekt summerweek for all of us. Everything was good, The food,(🌟🌟🌟👌) the pools. People who worked here. Really hope that we can come back again some day.I think that all inclusive is the best choice for this kind of holiday.

title: Family holiday would recommend this hotel
review: Hotel grounds were kept clean and room was cleaned every day. Beach towels given at the reception Lots of fun activities done throughout the day  We didn't score a five star because we had issues with our room Toaster tripped the switch Toilet wouldn't flush Shower knob kept falling off  Draw and kitchen unit broken see photo Fridge freezer did not work. However toaster and toilet was resolved straight away.   Very quiet location and hotel is quiet in the evening  Beach 4 minute walk Water park about 15 minutes walk Do all shopping at Lidl which is 10 minutes  away just turn right and follow street. It's also near burger king.  Dolphin trip is very good   Recommend wate

title: Excellent hotel in an excellent location
review: We've just got back from a stay at this hotel, and we look forward to going again hopefully! We travel as a large extended family, and this hotel is just right for that. This was our second visit (the first since the brand change to Zofiro), and we were pleased that the quality has stayed the same as we remembered it. The staff here are super friendly and accommodating, from the front desk, the bar, to the cleaning team.  The rooms we've stayed in have been top quality and very clean. We had a balcony with a jacuzzi this time, which was amazing! The kids loved the numerous pools on the site, and the bouncy pillow was a welcome addition.  The hotel is in a great location, just a quick walk to the beach and loads of fantastic restaurants. We did eat in the hotel once (you must…

title: Excellent family hotel
review: We have just returned from a family holiday at the Zafiro Tropic.  There were 11 in our group (4 families) and it worked well for everyone.  My husband and I (the grandparents) had a standard studio room which was in the main block (block 1).  It was a large room with plenty of space and had a very useful little kitchen area with a fridge, two hotplates, microwave, kettle and coffee maker.  This was great for preparing a light lunch to eat on the balcony while all the young children were having naps.  The shop on site sold everything that you might want at reasonable prices. One family had a one bedroom apartment which seemed to work well and the other two families shared a 2 bedroom swim up apartment (in block 4) which was lovely.  This was by the block 4 pool which suited us…

title: Great family holiday
review: We had a great family holiday with two children. Plenty to entertain the kids. Room adequate but could possibly of been cleaner, some days there was no maid service. we were self catering & to purchase drinks from the bar was very expensive. We would probably return to this hotel but all inclusive only.

title: Fantastic Family Holiday
review: Dear Ellen G,   Thank you for sending us your comments after your stay with us.   We sincerely regret that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. We would have liked to have had the chance to hear about your experience in reception and resolved the problems during your stay. Our team is always available to guests to ensure they are satisfied with their stay.   However, we also hope that you were able to enjoy all of our other services and facilities and that we may welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Sun and beach
review: A very nice hotel. Excelent location. The waiters are very kind. The rooms are nice and clean. The breakfast is magnificent. The relax pool is great at the end of the day 🌸 After a nice day at the beach, you can drink a cocktail at the pool bar

title: What excellent staff
review: Just back from a week all inclusive at the Zafrio tropic. The staff here are amazing especially on Reception. Lovely hotel with great facitites especially for the kids. Lots of great pools and activities. Fab location close to the beach,shops, transport links and the fab old town. Definitely worth a visit on market day. Evening entertainment good quality. Food was good quality but a little bland at times but branded drinks a big plus and drinks are waiter service mainly.  Spa was a great add on but freezing cold water made it unbearable which was a shame. Having a shop, laudrette and kitchette on site great ideas. Will be back x

title: DISEASE!
review: Travelled as a family ages  27 26 3 on 1/8/19 to ZAFIRO TROPIC Alcudia all inclusive for 9 days. I became very unwell with high temperature and fast rapid breathing. The air con in our room was useless and didn’t work properly. I asked the jet2 rep to recommend a doctor and she said to see the hotel doctor I made the appointment with hotel reception  to see him. He told me I had just a cold and he was extremely rude saying I wasn’t used to the heat. ( I go abroad at least twice a year) he refused to give me any medication or help and charged me €95.  On returning home with the same symptoms I visited my doctor who rushed me to hospital with pneumonia and legionnaires disease! Usually linked to faulty air con with bacteria or dirty shower heads or swimming pools. I went on this…

title: Lovely hotel, shame about sunbed allocation
review: Really lovely hotel, good food, immaculate clean rooms. My only criticism was that the first morning we arrived there were towels on a number of sunbeds. As I was travelling with my daughter and her 2 children who love the pools we thought it would be ok to leave towels on 3 sunbeds while we went to eat breakfast. On returning I noticed that the towels , my medication, suncreams and the boys toys had been removed. No one else had their towels removed. I inquired as to what had happened to our possessions and was told a young lad who worked as a cleaner/attendant at the hotel had removed them. After asking why only our towels were removed he said he did not understand. We were away 46 minutes. The Lifeguard who spoke limited English said towels were moved after 45 minutes that…

title: Zafiro Tropic. Alcudia. Fantastic holiday
review: Just returned from a week’s holiday to the Zafiro Tropic. Absolutely loved it! Tons for my 9 year old daughter to do, though she preferred to just play in the pools and on the amazing water bubble. Went all-inclusive. Food was delicious. Service excellent. Pool bar fantastic too. Upgraded to a 1 bedroom apartment when got there as we felt the studio apartment was too small for us. Plenty wardrobe space. Lovely pool view. Hotel just a few minutes walk to the gorgeous beach and Port. Will definitely return - probably next year!

title: Lovely hotel...if you’re all inclusive!
review: We visited Zafiro Tropic in Alcudia last week. The hotel itself is fantastic, friendly staff, it’s in a great location, nice clean rooms which are cleaned daily, new towels daily and lots of choice of swimming pool and activities for the kids. That part is perfect and just want you want in a family holiday.   However, as we were self catering we felt the pinch if we wanted a drink round the pool and even to buy things from the shop! There was no way we could have eaten there as the food was so expensive.  For a buffet breakfast for non all inclusive, the price was €24.50 per person! We could not justify this for a family of 6 - probably couldn’t justify that for a couple! For a small beer (30cl) it was €3.20 and in the shop, if you wanted a beer from the fridge, they charged you…

title: Mrs Riley
review: Completely underwhelming hotel. Booked for a special occasion & were so disappointed. Superior room was small, my husband was sleeping on the floor on a trundle pull out bed, every time he moved the bed would slide all over the floor. The air conditioning wasn’t working. The balcony looked out onto a road which was extremely noisy & far from private. The bathroom had a strong smell of stale urine, despite buying some bleach myself. We were unable to secure a sun lounger around the pool on any of our 12 day stay. Unfortunately the staff seemed unhappy & there was a more than apparent lack of atmosphere. The bar area had a very business like feel. Coffees & beers were often under filled & when we asked if it was possible to have a full cup/glass we were scowled upon. The evening…

title: Lovely resort, great staff - let down by smoking & vaping everywhere!
review: Dear lisa r,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!  I am very sorry to see that there were a few things about your stay that left you feeling disappointed.   I have forwarded your comments to the relevant managers and asked them to address them with their teams. I do hope that you will give us another chance in the future and thank you again for your helpful feedback.   Many thanks,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Family holiday
review: We would highly recommend this resort and likely to return next year.  We had the family room with roof terrace & Jacuzzi - only 1 TV in this room and the roof terrace was up on a separate area not outside the room - not the most child friendly!  crazy golf is really poor / tiny  kids pool & play area was great  clean pools - good lifeguards - friendly staff & atmosphere - decent evening entertainment.  you do have to wait to be served for drinks at the bar tho? there is a 2nd bar but this wasn't in use? we was all inclusive and everything gets scanned onto your wrist tag they supply - its a cashless resort so you pay at the end for any extras.  Food was great although a little limited for fussy boys.  a 2 minute walk from the lovely beach / shops  BUT !!!!  They allow smoking &…

title: Great family resort!
review: Visited 1-8th August 2019 - great holiday for family’s food good staff pleasant hotel clean. Stayed in a premium studio that if I am honest needs updating, laminate floors and furniture dated, however clean and comfortable.  All inclusive service good and food of a good standard for the money paid. Had a meal from the al a cart menu and the steak was outstanding! Well Worth the 7 euro supplement. Alcúdia itself is pleasant enough but dated and tired looking. We usually visit princess playa hotel cala'n bosch menorca. This hotel and island are on a smaller scale but is better value for money and has a fresher feel. Our son Is 8 and thought it wonderful met lots of friends and felt really safe around the pool as life guards were very vigilant and kept a close eye in the kids.…

title: Great Stay
review: Yet another great stay at Zafiro Tropic. Good food, friendly staff and great pools. Sunloungers busy but you name me a hotel that has a surplus of pool room!  We had a pool view and loved it. Kids are already asking when we are going back.

title: Ok but won’t stay again.
review: We have just returned from our 2 week holiday at the Zafiro Tropic.  The hotel was nice, we upgraded to the royal suite when we got there.  The balcony is nice and big with a jacuzzi, 2 sun loungers, a table with 4 chairs and an outdoor sofa.  The bed was really big and could have slept all 4 of us.  The staff at the reception was lovely and very helpful.  We stayed room only so I cannot comment on the food.  We did see the pool bar bar food which you order from a menu everything from pizza to toasted sandwiches and burgers etc this all looked really good.  There did seem to be quite long queues at the bar.  A family we spoke to said that some of the food in the buffet restaurant was not cooked properly.  All the shops bars and restaurants are a 5 minute walk away which is great…

title: 3rd stay first time all inclusive
review: Dear Thisie,   Thank you for taking the time to write your review.   We are delighted you liked the hotel, as well as the hotel facilities and services.   We apologise for any discomfort caused by the sunbeds that disturbed your stay. During the high season there are more guests in the hotel who want to make use of them and this is something we're looking at improving.  We value your feedback and hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.   Kind regards,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Disappointing
review: We are a family of four aged 37, 38,14 &11. This was our 3rd visit but our first on an all inclusive basis. My review as always is honest and not bias. We decided to stay AI as we have seen the food on offer and thought it looked nice. As you will know there are lots of restaurants and a lovely beach minutes away so either is a good option. We needed a break so we wanted to do nothing this time plus we knew it would be hot so we didn't fancy walking far. We normally stay in May but we booked the end of July to Aug as we got a very good deal with Jet2. On arrival our room was not in the main hotel for the first time. We were in block 3. I had asked for a pool view. Our room was smaller than we had had before and it was loud at first as we were facing the inflatable dome. I was a…

title: New Hotel -
review: The hotel and grounds were clean and tidy. Staff were very pleasant and helpful. The one exception to this was in the evenings we chose to sit inside - the staff were in and out serving the people outside. In order to get drinks, we had to either physically stop them as they walked past or go up to them at the bar! It was obvious that the priority was serving outside! We were all inclusive - the food was rather bland and boring. They had a couple of theme nights and did some special food / which was an improvement - although the California Rolls (sushi) on Japanese night, were amazing! The first week we were in a 2 bed apartment in a building on the far side of the complex which was nice and quiet.. Quite small, only wardrobes for strange, no drawers, no space in bathroom for…

title: Everything was super!
review: We had a great week at Zafiro Tropic! Really good room, nice and clean, good big bed (that we requested and got) a bit oldish decorated but lovely bathroom. Great food and an amazing staff(always nice to us and welcoming). Good drinks and wine. Pools were really good an with a lot of different depths made us all enjoy it! Kids pool were perfect and the playground was also very good. Did not explore that much in Alcúdia tho, but cozy city with a lot to do both for kids and adults. Good entertainment in the hotel at the evenings an fun quizzes. The kids entertainment team were great and Swedish Mella was amazing!💃🏻  Only downside was the dirty glasses, all the glasses were dirty all the time(just a bad dishwasher?). And the lack of sun beds, if we came down a bit late (10am ish)…

title: Mosquito Hotel
review: Mosquito Hotel come and ruin your sun Vacation!! Thats what the song should of been!! Just spent 7 days at this hotel and spent most of our time outside of the hotel. Rude staff who dont smile! Manager is the worst out of them all! Talk about you when you walk away..... luckyily i speak spanish! Cant get a sun lounger unless your up at 6am every morning! All entertainment finishs at 10.30pm then its bed time. The only thing good about this hotel is the food..... drinks are all watered down, i drank the whole cocktail list and still couldnt feel the slightest bit tipsy! Everyone was complaining about the infestation of mosquitos!! So so bad, if you want a good holiday dont book this hotel!

title: Good pools for kids, but tasteless buffet and non-smiling staff
review: The hotel is nicely situated in walking distance to the beach and center of Port d’Alcúdia. Pools are well suited for kids aged 6-9 and it is quite safe for them to move around on their own.   We had holiday inclusive but decided to go out several nights since both adults and kids were simply fed up with the tasteless and boring buffet. The staff in the restaurant are not smiling or engaging as experienced in other hotels in Alcúdia.   On more than one occasion we experienced that the glasses, cloth and cutlery was not clean on at a prepared table in the restaurant. Cleaning in the room is also limited.   Quite a lot of smokers in the hotel and they seem to be allowed anywhere outside at the expense of non-smokers... back to the 00s. Not nice for a familiarly hotel.   We had a…

title: Great hotel in the lovely resort of Port Alcúdia
review: Dear jakobv704,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel.   We appreciate any feedback, regardless of whether it’s positive or negative, as this gives us the opportunity to improve.   I am sorry to hear that you were quite disappointed and did not enjoy your stay.  I sincerely apologise if you consider that the attitude of our staff in the restaurant was not acceptable.  I will investigate this matter further and ensure that appropriate training will be provided if necessary.   We have also taken note of your comments about smoking in common areas for internal review.   I do hope that you will give us another chance in the future and thank you once again for your feedback.  Kind regards,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Great service, staff and facilities!
review: We stayed at the Zafiro Tropic after originally booking the Zafiro in Ca’n Picafort. Due to over booking we were offered this an alternative by Zafiro. The hotel and rooms were very clean and the staff friendly. Our room backed onto a pool but there are a great range of pools and activities offered also. We stayed All Inclusive and I found the food better than other holiday hotel all inclusive offerings (it still got a bit samey after a week though!) the pool bar does great lunchtime food. Our little girl rarely left the pool but did have a couple of great sessions at the children’s club. The hotel is well located for both the port and town of old Alcúdia. I would recommend the Zafiro Tropic to anyone looking for a good quality hotel for the family.

title: 1 week all inclusive
review: Absolutely loved it!! Can't fault anything ! The hotel was cleaned thoroughly every day. Our one bedroom apartment was cleaned 5 timed during the week. The food selection and quality was amazing (even for a fussy 10 yr old!!). The wrist bands act as a key aswell as your account. The kids (and us) are definitely rebooking for next year !

title: Fantastic facilities
review: We went as a family of 5 - including 2 teenagers and a 3 year old. The pools were amazing, especially the Pirate Ship one. Our youngest loved the playground and bouncy castle. We were self catering and the 2 bedroom apartment was very spacious and clean with more than adequste facilities and efficient air conditioning. We overlooked one of the pools, but were never bothered by noise. We ate in the restaurant once, which is a buffet and there was a huge choice, but the hotel is very close to all the restaurants of Alcudia too. All the staff were friendly, although on arrival the wristband/payment system wasn't explained to us. On the whole, information was scarce unless we enquired. The only criticisms would be that as we weren't all inclusive, there were no food facilities open…

title: 10 day family holiday
review: We decided to stay in Zafiro Tropic because it seemed very family friendly which is what we were looking for. We stayed in a 1 bedroom apartment overlooking the street, we found it to be very quiet which we preferred with 2 small boys.  The apartment is well equipped and kept tidy with a daily cleaner who comes and changes towels and changes beds if needed or leaves fresh bedsheets.  The pull out sofa in the living area is actually a sofa with a pull out single bed underneath which we weren't expecting but it was fine.  The air con worked really well - just make sure you keep the windows and balcony door closed for it to be switched on. The reception area is lovely with helpful staff.  We never ate at the hotel (opted for self catering) but it looked like a nice, clean area.  We…

title: Lovely family hotel
review: Stayed in 1 bed apartment with pool view (3rd floor in block 1) with two adults + two children.  Room - great size, air-con worked & lots of space. One huge double bed with fitted wardrobes & space for travel cot. Living area with sofa bed + pull out bed under sofa. Kitchenette + family bathroom. TV had some kids channels which helped. Hairdryer in bathroom. Big balcony too.  Room wasn’t cleaned every day but cleaners were out and about each day so we asked to get bins emptied (nappies!).  Food - we were all inclusive. Buffet breakfast/lunch/dinner was good. Plenty of choice. Freshly cooked meat and fish each night. Options for kids too. Being able to get a la carte lunch service at pool bar was huge bonus. We ate there most days. Quite a large choice too. We had an a la carte…

title: Short break
review: I recently visited Zafiro Tropic with my daughter aged 11. The studio was clean and spacious and serviced every day. The staff were friendly and were available to answer any questions we had. The food was freshly prepared , and reasonably priced and our requests were always met. The hotel was centrally located to the beach and a 5 minute taxi ride from the beautiful Old Town.  I would highly recommend it if travelling with children.

title: The sabat family
review: Over all we have been to this hotel three times now and it definitely looks better than the last time.  My friend came out four days later and he was happy with what he saw. The only problem is there’s not enough sun beds for all of the people staying there. The kids disco started a 5pm which we thought was to early. The entertainment staff were extremely friendly and helpful plus Mel was great.  Only problem I have is the cleaning of the rooms wasn’t great the maids should need more time in each room. We had a problem with ants everywhere my daughter thought it was fun to stamp the ants every day because I gave her a Euro for each one she killed. But they were like SAS ants and wouldn’t die.  Overall I would definitely recommend this highly for family and friends to try it out.…

title: Family with 2 x Teenagers
review: This is my first ever review and i felt compelled to write one from my recent experience. I know that every one has a different opinion,but this is just mine.The adult swimming pool for over 18’s is nice, however adults were allowing their younger children as young as 8 years old to enter and play in the pool. At no time did the hotel staff enter this area to remove under 18’s, This happened very day during my 7 night stay in July 2019. Out hotel room on arrival had broken patio doors and the air conditioning not working, handyman sent to fix problem but only patio doors not air conditioning, so we had to go to reception again and hire 2 x fans for our bedrooms at an extra charge to us?.Hotel is focused around younger children, not teenagers or for adults, nighttime…

title: Mrs J Moss
review: Dear Travelaway007,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel.   We appreciate any feedback, regardless of whether it’s positive or negative, as this gives us the opportunity to improve. I am surprised to hear that you were quite disappointed and did not enjoy your stay. I sincerely apologise if you consider that the attitude of our staff was not acceptable. I will investigate this matter further and ensure that appropriate training will be provided if necessary.   On behalf of the entire team, I am truly sorry for any inconvenience, especially as this is not the level of service we aim to provide to our guests.   If you are ever planning to visit us again, please contact me directly so that I can look after you during your stay.   Best regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Family, 2 kids
review: Just spent 10 nights at the Zafiro Tropic Hotel with my family and we had an amazing time! The hotel is extremely clean as are the multiple pools. No problem getting sunbeds (in fact lifeguards remove towels if people reserve them). Food was excellent at the buffet restaurant and we also had a lovely meal at the a la carte. The staff were very friendly and helpful. There was so much for the kids to do and they really enjoyed the evening entertainment and quiz. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

title: Wonderful
review: Quite crowded at the pool area in july. The best thing was the park beside the hotel where are sunbeds and many activities. Short walk to the beach. Possible to rent bikes and play minigolf and tabletennis also.  Room was good an not noise at night. The gym was a disappointment in many ways. The food was very good but drinks didn’t include in dinner at halfboard. Cold be more cleaning.

title: Very relaxing 2 week vacation
review: We got a 2-room apartment.  That was just perfect for us and our son.  Nice balcony where we could have breakfast together.  Clean bathroom.  Room service was excelent.  Very clean over all. With 5 swimming pools our son had plenty to do, apart from all the activities that are planned by the hotel throughout the day every day. Personnel working at the hotel (reception, restaurants, bar) were very nice, friendly and service minded. The hotel is within walking distance of many nice restaurants, and a couple of blocks away from the beach.  Excellent location. I used their bicycle station, which I highly recommend.  They rent very good bicycles, and again, very service minded. This was the second time we stayed at the Zafiro Tropic, and again, very satisfied with our stay.

title: Amazing holidays in an amazing place captured on a beautiful photos from VISTA PHOTOGRAPHY !
review: The hotel is exceptionally good. I stayed for two weeks holidays with family. Rooms, food, facilities... there is nothing to complain about. Don't really like going to the same places but we will definitely go back! It was a real pleasure having the photo session. I was a bit sceptical at first but the quality of service Vista Photography has provided was amazing. I have two little kids and wasn't expecting it's manageable to have such a great shots with them. It's mainly due to both ladies as they were doing miracles having fun with them just to make them happy and smiling. Very good experience and photos are stunning. Worth mentioning it's a really good  price and you what you are getting is priceless. I have best memories from Alcudia captured in a beautiful way and form!…

title: Great Family Holiday in the Sun!
review: Although we have been to Alcudia before this was our first stay in the Zafero Tropic. All of us have said that this is the best hotel that we have ever stayed in.  We booked a swin up room at the back of the hotel which meant we didnt have to bother with the daily scramble for sun beds, which made a huge difference. Was fantastic to simply step from our room through the lovely and well maintained garden into the pool area. Despite it being open to all guests as there were limited sunbeds it never got too crowded, and later on in the day was very quiet.  Our room was spacious fir three of us (mum, dad and teenage daughter) and was cleaned to a high standard regularly. The free beach towels were also a bonus which could have saved on our baggage allowance if we had known.  The…

title: Don't dare move from sunbed
review: Don't dare move off your sunbed for longer than 40 mins or all your stuff gets moved, rediculous I can understand the policy but 40 mins is pathetic. Your scared to nip the shop. The sunbed situation is terrible you need to be down early and you dare not move, all beds gone before 9am. Seen people go over for breakfast at the all inclusive and return to there stuff moved. I took it up with the reception manager with the grey hair, one obnoxious man he is!  Other than the stupid sunbed rule the hotel is lovely and fantastic placed all the staff really nice, exept the reception manager.  Great hotel for kids, WiFi great throughout hotel aswell

title: Great holiday
review: We have just returned from Zafiro Tropic with our 4 children (11,8,4,1) staying in a 2 bed apartment. This hotel was fab from the choice of pools, food, activities, staff etc. Prior to arrival we requested a ground floor room, as previous reviews mentioned we had a member of reception say that these are premium rooms and we would need to pay(extra €30 a night) They let us view the room first and we accepted due to location of the room and ease of having a gate out to the pool (room number 2008). It was nice that the cot had a thick mattress and not the usual travel cot mattress. It was great to see that pool staff put notices on sun beds with towels on and if not returned in a certain timeframe the towels would be removed, I saw this happening most mornings. Guests generally sat…

title: Lovely relaxing stay
review: We stayed in a ground floor room with outside space and 2 sun beds so none of the nonsense of trying to find a bed which was ideal for us. My 14 y.o. son loved some of the entertainment such as football, rifle shooting, paint balling and darts. We tried tennis but it was just way to hot for all that running about......the paint balling had a cost but he loved it so would recommend this activity for sure. Special mention to Paio (i hope I spelled his named correctly) and Denis. The food was good, we were all inclusive so to avoid it becoming too repetitive we did eat out a couple of times. There was evening entertainment which typically started at 9pm and was done by 10:15 some good, some not so good but overall we loved our stay at Zafiro and will return for sure.

title: Another wonderful holiday here
review: This is our 5th year visit to this hotel which again was perfect for us. We are a family of 4, parents and 2 adult special needs children. The hotel is clean and comfortable, rooms clean and staff very friendly. Good choice of foods, Buffett restaurant can be busy at peak times but relax, you’re on holiday. Pool bar menu at lunchtimes very good. Good choices and variety on all inclusive drinks options. Adult only pool lovely and relaxing, didn’t go in the main family pool which was very busy. Spa at the complex which we didn’t use. Enjoyed so much we have already booked to go back July2020. The hotel works perfectly for us. Close to the beach and flat prom with a lovely walk to the marina.

title: More than ticked the boxes
review: Ok so I still can’t get excited about a family friendly all inc break in Majorca in the school holidays... That said, this place really delivered and beyond. Our kids 6 and 2 loved the pools - the bouncy dome was a huge hit - and the playground, the beach is beautiful and a 5 min walk away, excellent quality and variety of food and drink, Perfectly nice apartment (appreciated instead of just a room) and efficient + friendly service. The 6 year cried on departure and tried to make us promise to return. And we might well do, which we rarely say. A really fine example of the type of holiday we now need. If only they’d heat the pool! Freezing. Using a tip from an earlier reviewer we bought the kids wetsuits. 6 year old wouldn’t wear his but it allowed 2 year old to stay in longer…

title: Average at best
review: Hotel is geared up for the AI guests, the hotel should also remember not everyone prefers going on an AI holiday. So if you did choose to eat and drink at the hotel, be prepared to pay over the odds for it. Hotel has way too many guests versus sunbeds and actual space around the pool areas, very cramped indeed. Cleaning of the room left a lot to be desired, don't think the floors in the room were swept or mopped in the duration of our stay, so had to get the brush and pan out myself, not what you want to be doing on your hols. Air conditioning is very poor, struggled to sleep at night with the heat. Hotel is cashless throughout, so check your bill on departure they charged us a meal we never had!! ALL staff we came across were very helpful and pleasant which was a wonder as they…

title: Good quality family hotel.
review: Dear Fully0707,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! I am very sorry to see that there were a few things about your stay that left you feeling disappointed. I have forwarded your comments to the relevant managers and asked them to address them with their teams. I do hope that you will give us another chance in the future and thank you again for your helpful feedback.  Many thanks,  Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Good hotel for family stay
review: We’ve stayed for a week in July. The hotel is a large complex with several buildings of apartments, which at times feels rather overcrowded. For instance, if you’d had breakfast around 9 am there’s very little chance to get a sunbed by the pool. Also, the restaurant during breakfast was very crowded... Another thing: I think smoking should not be allowed by the pool, especially with so many small children around, it bothered me quite a lot. Be prepared that wi fi is rather slooow, if you’re used to fast broadband. Overall, it was ok, the food was good and the big plus for extra activities like water aerobic, for instance.

title: Wonderful family hotel
review: Dear MagdalenaKL,  Thank you for sending us your comments after your stay with us. We sincerely regret that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. We would have liked to have had the chance to hear about your experience in reception and resolved the problems during your stay. Our team is always available to guests to ensure they are satisfied with their stay. However, we also hope that you were able to enjoy all of our other services and facilities and that we may welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Dan Oly
review: Zafiro Tropic is a great hotel to stay with family! We don't usually come back to the same place twice, but this time we might!  The staff is very friendly and the atmosphere is relaxed. There are lots of activites and entertainmemt every day for all ages, and though some of the pools may feel a bit crowded at times, you can just go to one of the many others. The all-inclusive buffetis very good and there is always something for the kids if they don't like paella.   The hotel is somewhat expensive, but for a no-stress familiy vacation with small children (ours are between 1 and 7), we can definetely reccomend Zafiro Tropic. The beach is also only a short walk away and it is excellent beach children.

title: Excellent holiday for families
review: We stayed all inclusive for 2 weeks. Here are my reasons why it was such a poor hotel.   1. Staff are extremely rude. 2. The hotel is very run down and needs an extensive refurb. 3. The air con is the old style, it blows mildly cool air 4. The pool area is so cramped, forget about getting a sun bed. 5. You can not move in the pool. 6. Expect a 30 min wait at the pool bar for a simple bottle of water. 7. In an evening, order a drink and it could be 20-30 mins before it arrives 8. Food was very simple and mostly poor. 9. The all inclusive is a joke, there are 2 freezers for ice cream, one with quality ice cream (but you have to pay for those....) The other freezer with cheap all inclusive ice cream.  10. It’s very overpriced  11. The broadband is non existent  12. The child’s play…

title: Wow Fantastic !!!
review: Dear Dan Oly,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at the Zafiro Tropic.  Your feedback, whether positive or negative, is very important to us as it gives us the opportunity to always seek improvement.   I am really sorry that you did not enjoy your stay and would like to offer you my sincere apologies. I have already shared your comments with the departments involved and they are looking into the issues in order to take appropriate measures to prevent them from happening again.  One again, please accept my apologies for everything that went wrong with your stay.  Should you wish to give us another chance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me directly so that I can ensure everything will be spot on.  Regards, Pep Escales Zafiro Tropic General Manager

title: Good family hotel
review: Good family hotel, great pool which my 14yr old 12 yr old and 5 yr old really enjoyed, but busy due to time of year. A serious lack of sun beds, not helped by people reserving with towels. Didn't find the staff very helpful unfortunately nor particularly friendly which was a real shame. Entertainment was dire, reps tried their best but very poor quality. Clean room. Overall would recommend, but there are improvements needed.

title: Great for kids
review: The hotel has a great location considering distance to the beach and town center. The room was allright in standard and size for two adults and a 4 yearold, we stayed in a premium apartment with one beedroom and there was room for a childrens bed in the bedroom so we coud put the child to sleep and still be able to use the livingroom until our own bedtime.
