The breakfast at the hotell is ok but doesnt strike me as exelent due to quality in some areas. At the poolbar i found the food to be miserable. We are considering going back there next year because of the lokation and because its great for families with small-teenage children but we will not include breakfast this time;)

title: Lovely, hassle free holiday!
review: Dear tonny J,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at the Zafiro Tropic.  Your feedback, whether positive or negative, is very important to us as it gives us the opportunity to always seek improvement. I am really sorry that you did not enjoy your stay and would like to offer you my sincere apologies. I have already shared your comments with the departments involved and they are looking into the issues in order to take appropriate measures to prevent them from happening again.   Once again, please accept my apologies for everything that went wrong with your stay.   Should you wish to give us another chance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me directly so that I can ensure everything will be spot on.   Regards,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: 2nd visit - location, surroundings, food and amenities - still all excellent!
review: Just recently returned from our 10 day all inclusive holiday at Zafiro Tropic and both me and my mum thoroughly enjoyed every minute of it. When we first arrived at around 12pm lunchtime and we checked into the hotel but got told our room wasn't ready yet, so we were able to put our luggage into a store room and we went off and explored the hotel. Around an hour later our room was ready and the receptionist informed us of where it was etc.  The room was lovely, we had a twin room with a garden view so it consisted of two single beds (which were so comfortable!), a balcony and a lovely bathroom with a shower. The room also had a good sized wardrobe as well as a sink, hob and fridge which was useful to keep bottles of water in!! It was also air conditioned which was perfect…

title: Great Holiday
review: This is our 2nd visit to Zafiro Tropic - see my review August 2017. We chose this due to the great experience 2yrs ago... July 2019, for our family of 2 adults and an 8yr old...  As you were :-) It's been tidied, smartened and some small tweeks have been made. They also have a doctor in every day, $100 a pop though...  Food hall and choice are superb, pools are fabulous & safe - with a choice of 7 different areas, reception is quick and effiecient and overall was excellent. We chose July as it's 'term-time' holiday, saving us nearly £2400 on the August price.  The only 'down-sides' we encountered are: Again, SO many smokers around the pool, bars and at night - not the hotel's fault! The entertainment wasn't as good, but this maybe because it was 'term-time'. During the daytime,…

title: VISTA PHOTOGRAPHY - DO IT!!!
review: We took a photo shoot with Inma and Paquita on the beach - super professional and so much fun! Lovely pictures!!!! I can really recommend you to do this!  Good hotel; clean, lovely buffet with so much to choose from! Good activities and great location. Anna, Johan, Adam & Viktor (Sweden)

title: Okay but would not stay here again - overpriced and not much to show for it
review: I have just returned from 7 nights at this hotel. We are a party of 6 (5 adults and a 2 year old) so we booked a 2 bed appt on a self catering basis. I always write detailed and honest reviews.  Before we arrived 2 months prior to our arrival i sent the hotel an email of a few small requests, one very important one being to face the garden as i wanted a quieter room having the baby with us, and secondly this holiday was to celebrate a 60th birthday so if we could have the best room they have it would be great or a free upgrade if available would be even better. They said they would try their best. I followed this up with an email 1 week prior to arriving which they did not respond to, so after 3 days i chased and they sent a one liner back - i would have expected something a tad…

title: Great stay and great service
review: Dear rosh_c_1986,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.   I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for choosing to stay at Zafiro Tropic Hotel. I would like to apologise for the service issues you experienced during your stay. This is not the level of service that we strive to achieve and I have thus taken note of this and passed it on to Senior Management to review this with the members of staff within their teams.   I do hope to welcome you back to Zafiro hotel in the future.   Many thanks,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: amazing stay
review: Travel period June/July 2019 Travellers: 5 persons (2 adults, 2 youth and child) Room type and location: 2-room apartment, in main building, with additional bed. 2nd floor, pool view, just above stage.  Duration: 8 days Meal type included: Half pension  Standard: Hotel has good standard in their rooms, with well working AC. I think the cleaning personnel were at our room every day, and changed our towels whenever needed. If I should remark something, I think they may not have washed the floor during our stay.  All pools seemed clean and well maintained.  Practical At arrival we received wristbands for everyone, which works as payment and door key , so no need for card for room key, and the electricity doesn't turn off when leaving the room (which is different compared with most…

title: Nice apartment hotel
review: Just back from 9 nights stay and had a great time. Arrived at midday and had to wait for our room but it was well worth it! We were allocated a room in block 3 and it over looked the bubble pool fabulous if you have children!  Food was great although at night you got a bit tired of the same stuff. We stayed all inclusive and it was branded alcohol and soft drinks which was a bonus. The staff were all very friendly and hard working.  Lots of activities on through the day a big thanks to Denis who entertained the children and adults during sports activities.  The hotel is clean throughout, it has a laundry room with washer and drier as well as an ironing board.  This hotel is a 2 minute walk to the beach and 20 minutes from old town which is worth a visit. Will definitely book a…

title: Not so clean
review: Dirty place, and not so much food to pick from. The service is not so good. The rooms are old and the power went off like a ten times we were there. Also a bad wi-fi did not work at all at times, There were poop i the pool

title: Excellent family hotel
review: Dear Carola J,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at the Zafiro Tropic.   Your feedback, whether positive or negative, is very important to us as it gives us the opportunity to always seek improvement. I am really sorry that you did not enjoy your stay and would like to offer you my sincere apologies. I have already shared your comments with the departments involved and they are looking into the issues in order to take appropriate measures to prevent them from happening again.   Once again, please accept my apologies for everything that went wrong with your stay.   Should you wish to give us another chance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me directly so that I can ensure everything will be spot on.   Regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Best holiday in Spain yet!
review: Great facilities for families , not really for older couples. Three staff were well trained and friendly really enjoyed out time there with the family. The food was excellent  and plentiful, the main restaurant got very busy but coped well. The room were spacious and clean .

title: Brilliant overall!!
review: We were checked in and welcomed by a friendly young lady on reception and were given our All Inclusive bands and were told to come back later for the room. We then decided to try the buffet restaurant which had really nice food, but don't go expecting Micheline star food. Once we got our room, which was on the 3rd floor, we found out we had a nice room, over looking the garden. The room did need a little refurbishment, and a little wipe down, but was very good anyway, also very spacious. The pool at this hotel is very good, the children really liked the bubble, so we generally stayed around the pool for our trip. The A La Carte restaurant "El Patio" was ok, the food wasn't too good and wasn't really worth paying for. The best part of the hotel were the entertainment team, they…

title: Great holiday
review: A modern hotel with excellent customer service and a lovely warm welcome!! The staff couldn’t do enough for anything you!   Room: -equipped with everything you need e.g cutlery, tea towels, plates, coffee machine,fridge, electric hob and storage space. -memory foam mattress and pillows (2 single beds pushed together) very comfortable. -wet room shower suit -balcony with plenty of sunlight  Cons with room: -only one spot light worked  -plug cover was broken so water didn’t drain as fast in shower -air con was a dated vent style and didn’t work as well as we had hoped  Pool area: -always clean  -nice and cool for hot weather -great selection of pools  -adult pool with jacuzzi jets in them which was lovely   Food: -great variety of food themes from Chinese to Mexican  -always…

title: Great photoshoot on premises!
review: We had a great time at the Zafiro Tropic, and enjoyed an exellent photoshoot with Inma and Paquita from Vista Photography! They are both very skilled photographers and are great with kids! The end result was impecable and we can highly recommend them!

title: A fantastic place to stay
review: I have just returned from a weeks holiday at the Zafiro Tropic and it was brilliant. Everything about the hotel was better than expected. The hotel is lovely and in a great location very close to the  beautiful beach. The food was excellent with a great variety to choose from. I felt like I was in w classy restaurant not in your typical all inclusive. The staff are lovely and all work there socks off to make sure everyone is happy. The best thing for me was the outside and pool areas for my 2 1/2yr old son. The kids pools and play areas are exceptional. He had a ball. We all loved this place and would highly recommend it. Definitely see it as a place we will visit again and again.

title: Vista Photography Alcudia
review: Lovely stay and we had a good experience with Paquita and Imma from Vista Photography, who took the most fantastic pictures of my children at the Beach.  I am happy for the photos 👍 I Can only recommend you to let Them take photos of your children

title: Oh dear
review: The room was nice, comfortable. The bed was really comfortable and didn’t split in the middle. The bathroom was a lovely size but could do with some heating and a larger shower screen as the spray tended to soak the floor. Housekeeping within the room did lack. The dinner table was not swept under in the whole time we were there and was thick with dust. Under the sofa was the same. When we pulled out the bed, it was thick dust and debris. I don’t think our beds were changed in the whole time there either. The air con also didn’t work. Near the end of our stay, we went back to the room and a few minutes later I noticed my son holding a cloth I didn’t recognise and was about to put it in his mouth. Yes, a cleaning cloth had been left on his cot. I reported it to reception and said…

title: Top Hotel including great "Vista Photography"
review: It was our first vacation in Mallorca as a family and it was extraordinary. To sum up, the hotel was clean and it shown a large variety of offers concerning the children activities, the staff was friendly and the ladies (Imma & Paquita) from "Vista Photography" were friendly and professional as well. By the way we got finally some new family pictures and it pays off to take time for the photo shooting !

title: Great for families
review: *Awesome pool facilities for kids.  *Some of the best(and most fresh) all incl food I’ve had. Even cocktails gets made the moment you order. *staff is very nice. *beach is close  I would have given it 5 stars if it had been a little cheaper.

title: Perfect place for families with little ones!
review: Zafiro Tropic is a good value for money, prefer place for families. We stayed at privilege family apartment on a ground floor next to children’s swimming pool so had no issue with sun beds. Very nice an adult only area with a swimming pool. Hotels is 5-7 minutes walk away from the beach and promenade with bars and shops. We had half board, thanks to waiter Juan for a service and smiling face! Food was good, you can always find something to eat. We also had an amazing photo shoot at the beach providing by Vista Photography, so we got not only a memories but also an album full of wonderful pictures :-)

title: Fantastic family holiday
review: My wife, 4 year old son and I have just returned from a weeks stay at the Zafiro tropic. I cannot fault the hotel at all. From the moment we arrived check in was quick and efficient. We stayed in a premium studio. To be honest if I was going back would stay in the apartment as the studio is a little small for a family but I chose the room. The whole hotel is spotless and the staff are fantastic. My son absolutely loved all the pools, especially the pirate slide pool. Yes it can be tricky getting a bed by the pool and although putting towels down early isn’t something I would normally do but after a few days I had to join everyone else in doing this. We were self catering so I cannot really comment on the food. The evening entertainment was top notch for kids and adults. Alcudia…

title: Very child friendly
review: Just arrived home after a fab 10 days in Zafiro Tropic in Alcúdia with my family,  The staff! I cannot fault them, they work so hard and are always smiling, from the waiters and receptions to the kitchen staff and housemaids always so welcoming.  The hotel it’s self was very clean.  This hotel I feel is specially for families with children as there is nothing after 10.30pm  The food is nice , but becomes very boring after a few days. One problem! if you want a sunbed by the pool, you may be lucky. People are putting towels on these sun beds early in the morning, by 8.30am most of the beds have towels on them. On mentioning this , was told people go round picking up these towel. Out of 10 days we only managed to get a bed twice.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Great hotel brilliant entertainment the kids pools are brilliant and everything was spot on. Staff were lovely and nothing was any trouble We were self catering but did eat in the hotel which was lovely. Would definitely go back again.

title: Best hotel!
review: I visited Zafiro tropic with my husband and our two children in the age of 3 and 1. We choosed all inclusive for the convenience with two small children, though im skeptic to it. But WOW! Really good food, generous drinklist, kind and friendly staff and the perfect hotel for children. We loved it, and will go back next year.

title: Great for small children
review: This hotel group is brilliantly geared up for small children and this one is no exception. It's proximity to the beach and facilities is great, but having been to the can picafort hotel last year this one seems a bit claustrophobic. The walkways are much nsrrower- less space for children to run around safely, and very cramped around the pools- and smaller pools too... That said the staff are extremely friendly and helpful and we had a great time.. bar prices quite expensive

title: Great for family with toddler
review: Dear Beverley G,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences.  We are glad that you liked the friendliness and service of the staff as well as the hotel facilities and services.  We apologise for any inconvenience caused by the lack of space affecting your stay.  We value your feedback and hope for a new opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next visit.  Warmest regards,  Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Perfect located hotel
review: Positives: Fantastic kids pools, great food & drinks, very clean. Staff very friendly. Hotel activities brilliant, you can join in as much or as little as you like. We enjoyed aquafit and spin classes and a few of the kids activities with our 3 year old (mask making and pirate games).  Very short walk to the beach which is lovely and sandy and great for paddling. We also enjoyed a boat trip and a trip to the market to break it up a bit. The market is in Alcúdia old town and is definitely worth a visit.   Negatives: Having stayed at zafiro hotels in other locations before, we were a little disappointed that the bed type sun loungers around the pool (which we loved spending time at at zafiro can Picafort)  were in the adult area only, they were usually empty when we walked past. I…

title: Perfect family holiday!
review: Hotel is perfect located near the beach (5min) and old town of Acudia (15min). We had an great stay here with family. Lots of entertainment for kids and good service. Rooms are big and clean. I hope to come back here in a few years.

title: Very hugh standards😊
review: The kitchen works by very high standards all the way.  Generally, the staff of the hotel is very proffesional and truly wants to do a good job. Any problems occuring is solved fast and effective.   Might be vice to order a room NOT facing the pool area, and you may need to throw away a towel if you wanna' use a sun bed😈 Some norwegian guests tend to 'reserve' the beds by throwing out their towels and leave them together with their garbage for hours...giving a damn in the hotels rules and manners. But luckily, this kind of people is by no means the rule at this friendly hotel😊We will be back😊

title: Great family holiday
review: Just back from a great family holiday at Zafiro tropic. Reception staff were very helpful on our arrival and our apartment was spacious and very clean and modern. We had a privilege apartment which had a great outdoor terrace with sun loungers and a table and chairs. This was ideal for us as we could still enjoy the sun whilst our baby napped. The bed in our apartment was huge and we ended up sharing it with our 4 year old so we didn't need to use the sofa bed. We got the baby package from the hotel which included a cot bed, highchair and also a buggy which you could go and take whenever you needed. We had our own buggy for our younger son but ended up using the hotel one for our older son during the day when it was hot or when we walked to the old town. The whole hotel is…

title: Great Location shame not all staff have customer service skills
review: The hotel is in a brilliant location, a few minutes you are on the beach, local shops and restaurants, the port and bus stops for public transport. The room we spent our stay in was really nice, we had a spacious bathroom. Kitchen if self catering like myself was fine for cooking we were provided with a tea towel and washing up liquid. We had a lovely terrace and garden on the ground floor that was well maintained we had the lawn mowed during our stay. The bad point to our room is actually a health and safety issue was when the sprinklers came on water collected outside the terrace door and did not dry up no matter how hot it became I had to ask a maid for bath mats to put down to soak it up and so my little boy did not slip. It was quite an amount that collected. The hotel…

title: A great time was had by all
review: Dear Rebecca K,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for choosing to stay at Zafiro Tropic Hotel.   I'm glad to read that you enjoyed a few days of rest in Mallorca. However, we have also taken note of your comments about our staff - I will share this with the heads of each department to help ensure that our service is always of the highest quality. On a separate note I am pleased to see that Tomeu helped you find your bag during your stay and I will be sure to pass your praise on to him.  Hopefully we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future. If we can be of any further assistance, please do not hesitate to get in touch.  Many thanks,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: All excellent; apart from the queues...
review: Just returned from a family break at the Zafiro Tropic. Very impressive. The hotel was modern and very clean. Staff were friendly and helpful. Food was excellent and the facilities for the children extensive. Lovely pools and play areas and entertainment to keep them amused. The hotel was only a 5 minute walk to the clean sandy beach which was glorious with calm shallow water very safe for the children. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend the Zafiro Tropic and Puerto d’Alcudia for a relaxing break.

title: Great - With a Few Caveats
review: We stayed here for a week during our Mallorca trip, which included another stay just down the coastline, so we had a bit to compare to.  First off, this place is fantastic for families with younger kids. Our 2 and 4 year old were in good company of plenty of other similarly-aged children enjoying the kiddie wading pool, complete with a pirate ship and 4 chutes, and several other smaller water slides. The onsite playground, minigolf, kid disco, and miniclub also help keep the kids busy and entertained.   As far as the adults go, you get an 18+ "relax" pool. But if you want to swim a few laps, your only choice is to hope the "swim up" pool hidden behind bloque 4 is empty, as the other pools are constantly full of other vacationers and rafts and aren't a good shape in any case. …

title: Not for couples who don't have kids!
review: PROS:  Hotel has many facilities and fitness classes, which we took full advantage of - swimming, spinning, volleyball, archery, yoga... none of which are very busy. They are well taught and enjoyable. Many throughout the day.  Very well located, 30-40 mins from the airport, 5 minutes walk (if that) to the beach.   There is a supermarket at the resort and shops very close by, perfect if you're in a self-catered room, like we were.   Nice big room with well stocked bathroom.   Evening buffet is lovely, lots of options to choose from. It is busy though and there was a queue outside at one point to get a table, so go early!  CONS: Be prepared for your room not to be ready at check-in time. We had to wait an hour, and so did a few other families we spoke to. No apologies, staff were…

title: Great for families, worth going all inclusive
review: Dear lovetotravel687,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of our hotel. I am very sorry that your experience at the hotel wasn’t as relaxing as it could have been.   At Zafiro Hotels we are very much focused on adult and family holidays and our hotels and resorts have been specifically designed with these two concepts in mind in order to offer the best of both worlds. A clear example of this is that all of our hotels feature adults-only pools and spaces. I will take this up with the reception team to ensure that all guests are made aware of our adults-only areas on arrival and during their stay.  I do hope that you will give us another chance in the future and thank you once again for your feedback.  Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Great hotel for families, splash pool is best I’ve seen, good play park and kids club. Evening entertainment is good and has something for everyone. Food is best we’ve had at 4 star hotel and the pool bar serves great food which is also included in the all inclusive not just the buffet restaurant. Branded spirits are served AI too. Rooms are spacious and clean, nice bathrooms, only shower no bath for babies so we took a small inflatable baby bath. Rooms also have small kitchen area which we found useful for preparing bottles and baby food. Beach is just a short 5 minute walk. Can take a little while to get served at the bar but the staff are all friendly and work hard to get everyone served. The a la carte restaurant is fantastic and you get 1 meal there when you stay for a week…

title: Just a Perfect family holiday!!
review: Of all the times we’ve been to Mallorca, this hotel is by far the best. The pools are great, especially for the kids with the pirate boat. And even an 18+ area where you could relax. Oddly it is placed next to the pirateship pool.  Overall it is a very clean and modern hotel with great WiFi and fast WiFi all over the hotel. The staff are super friendly, but English is still difficult for them. If you can Spanish it would be easier to communicate with them.  The food is a typically buffet, but there were always something to eat. Breakfast buffet was my favourite. Many things to choose.  And in the lunchtime you can decide to eat at the buffet or ala carte in the poolbar.   When you order a drink in daytime, you will get a normal soda cup and they don’t taste as good as they taste…

title: Amazing Terrace!
review: We really enjoyed Alcudia and the hotel was spotless.  We upgraded on arrival to a terrace apartment which had a hot tub, hammock, loungers, table and chairs and a sofa.  We used it a lot!    The hotel is immaculate, staff are all very friendly.  We were only there for 5 nights and found the hotel catered well for young children, especially the all inclusive which we weren't.  We have older children so for us it was a little too noisy with so many young ones, but you could see they were enjoying themselves.   If you enjoy all inclusive where you don't need to leave and plenty to do for the little ones then this really is a fabulous hotel.  It is 2 mins walk from the main strip and the beach which I must say the beach is impressive, yes its busy but again, very clean and the…

title: Half term perfect
review: Good location 5 minuets from the beach. All inclusive, food very good. Kids club good and entertainment during the day and evening especially geared for children. Staff pleasant and helpful. Indoor pool and spa

title: Good Hotel for Families
review: Last day of a 10 day break at Zafiro Tropic. A good hotel for those with families.  The rooms are fine - a little dated but clean, comfortable & plenty of space with a decent balcony too. The pools are great - always full of kids & the splash pool (where we spent most of our time with 2 yr old) is ideal, with the play park right beside it.  The food is ok. Not the best but certainly not the worst. There’s always plenty of choice so you can always make it work. The restaurant is a health hazard though. Too many people going in opposite directions with too many kids cutting about at knee height. Didnt see any accidents but they mist happen regularly. Location is great too. 5 mins from beach & port. A nice walk after breakfast or dinner. Onsite shop is very convenient. Pretty much…

title: Absolutely Loved It!
review: Zafiro Tropic. It was amazing! With all inclusive we had years worth of lovely food and drinks. The keys on the wrist is a great idea. The two things that upset me was all the flies bugging us when we were eating at the buffet and the entertainment wasn’t very enjoyable. But overall I’d give this place a solid ****. 4 stars.

title: relaxed vacation with photoshoot by Vista Photography
review: We had a nice relaxing holiday with a wonderful massage and the service there was 1a.  Since we got married 2 weeks ago, we wanted nice vacation photos, we saw in the hotel vista photography and made with them a photoshootoing. sensational photos were taken, with a lot of humor and fun. The two photographers had many great and crazy ideas.  This Photos are realy amazing we Love them.   Tim&Saskia

title: Do not book the royal terrace it’s not worth the extra anymore!
review: Love this hotel, visited last year, staying in the royal terrace apartment with hot tub. However regulations have changed since our last stay and the hot tubs are not allowed above 36 degrees (ours has not got above 34.5 despite numerous complaints to reception). This means if you plan to go in the hot tub after dark as we did while our little ones are asleep you basically can’t because it’s freezing! We paid an extra £350 for this facility and it was not worth one penny.  Whilst we appreciate there is nothing that can be done about these new rules we feel we should have been informed about this before we chose to book the holiday. A complete waste of money! Both Jet2 the company we booked the holiday with and the hotel have been very unsympathetic explaining that the hot tubs…

title: Vacation with family
review: Dear CMR78_11,   Thank you for your review.   We are sorry you were disappointed with the water terperature in the hot tub. As you rightly pointed, the water temperature is now a requirement by the Health & Safety department and the hotel has no option but to comply. I am sorry this was not explained to you before your trip and have disturbed your stay.  We value your comments and hope for another opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.   Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Nice Hotel
review: Great facilities, pirate pool for children was highly appreciated. The spa was nice, I got a massage one day and I really recommend everyone to do that if theres time. We had a couple of rainy days and the hotel staff did what they could to entertain the smallest guests with balloons etc. Very nice staff!

title: Nice hotel, enjoyed our stay, although not everything perfect
review: Stayed here for 10 days self catering over Easter and have a lovely time. Booked a 2 bed appartment for myself and 2 daughters (15 and 16) We usually holiday 4 times a year and have stayed in lots of 4 and 5 * hotels and this is an ok 4*.  We came here when the girls where younger (Viva Hotel them) During our 1st day we were left a nice bottle of red wine and a fruit basket as a welcome back... lovely touch. Celebrated my birthday and again without mentioning to anyone was left a nice bottle of Cava and a card for 50% off at the spa. Both myself and the girls had massages and loved them. (worth the full price) Thank you to the management and staff.  Ok, so allocated a nice room on the 2nd floor over looking the pool where we watched an army of staff cleaning around the pool…

title: Nice vacation
review: Having only previously stayed at their ‘Palace’ hotels, we were not quite sure what to expect and it was clear on arrival that there is a big difference between the two, but we still had an enjoyable holiday in this hotel.  This was also our first experience on an all inclusive basis. We were travelling with our 2 year old daughter and she absolutely loved the children’s playground, swimming pool, and the mini disco.  The food was very good, but we soon realised that a buffet meal is not for us every night so we went to the port on two nights, it would have been better for us if there was a menu choice like the lunch, although the lunch menu was rather limited but it was still excellent quality.  The staff are a credit to the hotel and work extremely hard, and were always…

title: Recommended hotel
review: Very nice hotel,pool area nice and suitable for all ages. During our week no problem getting a sunbed around the pool. Pools open 9-18,which was a little bit disappointing. Friendly and helpful staff. Close to beach and shopping, all in all I rate it 4/5.

title: Family holiday
review: DearMarikaB623,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay.   I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Mallorca again soon.   Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Great family hotel
review: Very nice hotel and super child friendly. Our 3 yo loves the hotel activities and installation. Rooms are comfy and clean, food is good and employees very kind. There is a very nice photography service in the hotel, pics can be taken in different locations. We love our pics and it is a great souvenir of our stay. Beach is very close and really enjoyable.

title: Fabulous stay
review: Dear Haimy M,   Thank you so much for the wonderful review! I am thrilled to read that you had a relaxing break in Mallorca. Hopefully it won’t be too long before you book another few days of rest and relaxation for yourselves.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Warmest regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Stay for Ironman
review: Perfect location close to both the beach, restaurants and shops. Kind and helpfull staff at the hotel. Clean room. Several pools both outside and a spa pool inside the hotel. Many things to do for kids. A nice Supermarket inside the hotel is also a big plus.

title: Fabulous hotel and location. Zafiro Tropic Port De Alcúdia
review: We visited Zafiro Tropic this time after staying at Zafiro PalmaNova last year. The hotel was spot on once again in terms of rooms/facilities/food etc.  We have 2 very young children and there was plenty for them to do. The indoor and outdoor pools, playground, park, kids club, mini disco .... the list is endless. It’s also only a few minutes walk down to the beach.   We also took the photography package with Vista Photography who are onsite near the reception area.  The girls were fabulous and took some amazing shots of us with the children. A real holiday to remember!

title: Ironman friendly
review: Dear Kate H,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay.  I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Mallorca again soon.   Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Family beach holiday
review: Spent 5 nights here for ironman 70.3 and it was really convenient for the race start and finish. Also, the hotel had a launderette which is such a bonus for washing race kit and general clothing. The hotel caters well for children. Only thing is the quiet adult only pool area is located right next to the kids playground and football field which didn’t really make sense. Our room was a little warm but luckily the weather was cool so it wasn’t a problem. Highly recommended.

title: Cycling holiday with family
review: Dear Cindymac1968,   Thank you so much for the wonderful review! I am thrilled to read that you had a relaxing break in Mallorca. Hopefully it won’t be too long before you book another few days of rest and relaxation for yourselves.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Warmest regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: BEST vacation, hotel and staff - WOUW
review: We had a wonderful week.  The hotel was beautiful, clean and friendly. Not many British. Lovely food - We liked that it was predominantly Spanish with different themes and things to try. There were chips and plain pasta every night for the kids though!   We had a first floor 1 bed with a terrace and jacuzzi which was perfect with a toddler. We originally had a top floor apartment with a roof terrace but decided this wasn’t suitable with an 18 month old due to the steep stairs, luckily they had a first floor one available on arrival so we swapped.  The entertainment for the kids was brill too. This was our first experience of kids entertainment on holiday! We didn’t want to put them in kids club and I liked that we could dip in and out of activities for free when we fancied, and…

title: 4 star plus
review: A fantastic hotel with great facilities and pool area. Friendly staff. Location excellent near  the Alcudia port and the beach. Everything within walking distance. The room with the kitchentte and balcony vas super. We have only one remark: We stayed there 4th to 11th of may. The weather was quite hot at the end of the week, but the air-condition did not work. The hotel hadn`t started it up for the season and couldn`t do it when we asked them to. We had 30 degrees Celsius in the room during the night. This doesn`t affect our rating though everything else in the hotel was so great and the next time we go to Alcudia we will stay there again.

title: Best holiday
review: Dear Bo N,   Thank you so much for the wonderful review!   I am thrilled to read that you had a relaxing break in Mallorca. Hopefully it won’t be too long before you book another few days of rest and relaxation for yourselves. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Warmest regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: All In One Relaxation
review: We had a wonderfull time at This hotel. Great pools, super service, great food in the restaurant. We love that we could get free towels to the pool It only take 3 min to the Beach, it is a fantastic Beach

title: great 4 star hotel
review: Dear Thomasbonin,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay. I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Mallorca again soon.   Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Super comfortable and located hotel in Port d'Alcudia
review: We booked a two bed apartment in Alcudia for a week.  What a charming little town and the hotel situated just a stones throw from the 14 km beach!   The staff at Zafiro Tropic took very good of me and my husband and our 7 month baby. Our 4 star hotel in many ways felt like 5 star- with an amazing breakfast buffet and impressive pools both indoors and outdoors. Lots of fun for the whole family - daily kids shows and professional dancers and singers to entertain!  The best with our stay was that everything was so comfortable. From the beddings to the pathways between buildings, everything to make you feel at ease and relax.  A dream for a tired new mom who wants a relaxation time with her little family!   I'm rating our stay "Excellent!"   Thank you!

title: Silly Policies spoil otherwise excellent experience
review: Charging guests €2.50 per day for a safe key in their room is a silly and petty policy. I have never come across this in many years of international travel. Neither have I seen a weighing machine in the courtesy baggage room with €1 slot for usage. Do management really believe these policies enhance the hotel's image? In all other aspects the Zafiro Tropic met my expectations. Staff, rooms, food and facilities were 4 Star quality. It missed a top rating because of the petty policies mentioned above.

title: Very nice hotel close to everything!
review: Dear Donal B,   Thank you for sending us your comments after your stay with us. We sincerely regret that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us.   We would have liked to have had the chance to hear about your experience in reception and resolved the problems during your stay. Our team is always available to guests to ensure they are satisfied with their stay.   However, we also hope that you were able to enjoy all of our other services and facilities and that we may welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic General Manager

title: Wonderful staff at hotel's restaurant
review: Nice rooms. Beds are perfect. Nice storage for bikes, and free water for bottles, tools.   The pool was very cold but a nice spa inside :)   Hotelroomdoors sounds a lot when neighbours close it. Woke up everymorning of it :(

title: Hmmmmm ... improvements needed
review: Dear Malin N,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay. I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Mallorca again soon.   Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Great hotel.
review: 5 stars for the restaurant staff, hope hotel takes care of them as they felt us special during our stay. Hotel altogether during May 4 stars, could rate higher during high season. Nice entertainment during evenings after dinner. We had as the room the jacuzzi with terrace and enjoyed it a lot.

title: A week in April
review: Just returned from a very good stay at the Zafiro Tropic with my wife and two friends. The hotel met our needs well. We opted for self catering so did not use the hotel restaurant at any point. We liked our spacious room with its garden facing balcony. We were well situated to access all that Alcudia has to offer and there was little to complain about.Staff were helpful and went out of their way to make our stay a memorable one for all the right reasons. Tip: Try to opt for a room facing the garden on a higher floor Facilities for young families struck us as being excellent. Would happily return.

title: Faultless
review: Dear 526cliver,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay. I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Mallorca again soon.   Kind regards,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Lovely hotel and location.
review: A clean and comfortable hotel. Great selection of fresh food at the buffet breakfast and dinner. The convenience room was most appreciated as I could check out, spend the day sightseeing then return to the hotel for a shower before going to the airport

title: Zafiro tropic alcudia.
review: Stayed here for a week with our 6 year old, having stayed at the Zafiro Palmanova in 2017. Good location within walking distance of the beach, bars, restaurants, marina and Alcudia itself. Transfer from the airport was an hour and a half. Quiet and well layed out hotel. Friendly and helpful staff. Buffet is good and well priced if not on all inclusive. Had a royal terrace with hot tub which was good for two adults.  An initial issue with a hot tub fault was sorted by hotel director who swapped us to a different room. Weather was changeable for the first 2 days but great for the rest of the week. Some hotels and atractions including water park and go-cart track, were only opening the week after we visited but this didn't bother us.

title: Overall, a great place, but showing its age
review: Nice location, clean rooms. The very loud noices in the dining and breakfast area made it unpleasant and not really possible to enjoy the well made food. If we go back it will not be with meals included. We got a nice little welcome gift , Thanx

title: Friendly hotel with great facilities
review: Our visit was in April and the weather was very mixed. We had warm sun and also cold weather and thunderstorms! I had booked this hotel as it had an indoor pool and it didn’t disappoint. The outdoor pools were very cold at this time of year so this was a great way to enjoy the water and wear out the children 😂 Staff were very professional and friendly. The kitchen and waiting staff worked hard to provide a lovely range of food each day. Special mention to the children’s entertainers Alex and the others who always had a smile and provided several indoor activities which was great considering the weather wasn’t too good at times.  We had a 2 bedroom apartment which was handy with microwave and fridge etc. Worked well for our family and was ground floor so had a lovely garden with…

title: Lovely stay
review: Lovely hotel with great amenities and close to the beach, shops and restaurants. This was our 3rd stay at the hotel, and while we had a great time and like the hotel, some of the amenities in our room were not maintained to the same standard as on previous years. There needed to be a little more attention to the general upkeep of the room. That said, we would return as it is a great hotel for families.

title: Lovely stay
review: We had an amazing time at this hotel. We booked a short trip to celebrate our 30th birthdays. We booked a room for 5 of us (all adults) and there was plenty of space for all of us. The hotel was clean and nicely furnished and we liked the fact that our room key was a bracelet and we each had one. We loved the food and the service that came with it. We spent a lot of time around the 18+ pool, which was equipped with the comfiest day beds. There were plenty of pools for children too. The hotel is ideally located, a few minutes walk from the beach and many restaurants, shops and bars. Only 20 minute walk from old town, which was beautiful and well worth the visit. We all agree that we would come here again. We had a really lovely stay.

title: Wonderful for the family
review: Thanks ! All good food marvellous.  Close to beach and shops if needed.  Pool table tennis, bingo and crazy golf what else is needed . Kids want us to book for next year. Steady on but that’s probably the sign it’s a top drawer place to go.  👍

title: Easter holiday
review: Hotel and rooms are nice. Great entertainment and lots of things to do with the kids. The kids clubs are brilliant staff are really nice and friendly. Lots of shops and restaurants within a couple of minutes walk. 1 of the nicest beaches I've ever been on, only a 5 minute walk from the hotel.  We would definitely go back in the future. Highly recommended!

title: Very beautiful and comfortable hotel
review: The hotel is very beautiful and comfortable. Very fresh and clean, gym, more than ten swimming pool and mannire  and still has very appropriate prices. Close to the centrum and beach. Strongly recommended if you want to visit beautiful island of Mallorca and stay in the city of Alcudia.

title: STAYING IN CLASSY ZAFIRO RESORT IN MAJORCA
review: My family and I went to Majorca to get a break from rainy London,and trust me,we did. We had a wonderful time at Zafiro Tropic resort. Our friends and us had planned this trip a year ago, so we were hoping for the best!!!! The food at the resort was great and the children were entertained. The staff was very friendly to them, and they had a great time. We were very impressed by the number of pools they had, all with different opening times. The indoor pool wasn't boring like the other pools where you only swim. Inside,there were at least 4 spas and a fountain. Other benefits of staying here are that your literally 2 to 3 minutes away from the beach, and if you want to explore the rest of the Port De Alcudia, there are a number of car rentals behind the resort. There was a play…

title: Easter break
review: The hotel is in a good location close to the beach and is nicely kept. It has many pools including a children’s pool with small slides and play area (officially up to age 12 but aimed at younger children - the sunken trampoline is a success with all ages). Kids liked the free mini golf.  We had a standard room overlooking the pool and went half board. If self-catering it would only be to prepare an easy bite. The room was clean and modern but smelt very musty. Breakfast was good overall but dinner a bit hit and miss - I enjoyed my cheese board but sweet desserts were poor. Even in April the restaurant was packed and very noisy - quite a few kids wearing headphones to drown out clatter. Kids entertainment aimed at younger ones - our 6 and 8 year old felt evening disco was aimed…

title: Really Disappointed
review: Dear HipKitten,	  Thank you for sending us your comments after your stay with us. We sincerely regret that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. We would have liked to have had the chance to hear about your experience in reception and resolved the problems during your stay. Our team is always available to guests to ensure they are satisfied with their stay.   However, we also hope that you were able to enjoy all of our other services and facilities and that we may welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Fantastic holiday
review: A few days back from our third stay at the Zafiro Tropic (feel free to read my two positive previous reviews) and wanted to wait a while before posting this time to reflect on things. I'm sorry to say we were extremely upset with our stay and how the continuous problems weren't dealt with. We booked the one bedroom Royal 1st floor apartment (not cheap at 120 euros a night even in early April) essentially because it has an outdoor hot tub. Having travelled from 3am in the UK we were looking forward to relaxing when we arrived. Having unpacked my wife and daughter headed out to find the hot tub was almost empty, and filthy both in the water and around the outside. I reluctantly dragged myself to reception and was told someone would be round soon to sort the problem out. We grew…

title: Superb
review: Second stay here at Zafiro Tropic. This time I bought a lot of my family and we were not disappointed at all. The facilities are superb for children, with lots to do for couples only as well. The views from the room were amazing. We stayed self catering, so unable to comment on the food. The staff are friendly and accommodating. The hotel is a short walk from the lovely beach. We look forward to returning again next year.

title: Family holiday
review: Perfect family holiday, we will be booking to return next year. Rooms are very clean. Perfect location. Fantastic outdoor facilities (although the pools could be warmer) also the kids pirate pool wasn’t working on arrival although this was fixed when I notified them of the problem. We loved our private jacuzzi. Can’t wait to return.

title: Great cycling holiday
review: A comfortable and well run hotel. The cleaning staff worked tirelessly to maintain spotlessly clean facilities. There were a few issues with toilet not filling after flushing and a fault with the cooker hob but these issues were quickly rectified by the on site technician. Great facilities for children, lots of sun beds and all the staff were polite, cheerful and helpful. The cycling facilities were first class including: secure storage, cycle maintenance tools, track pumps, water dispenser and cycle wash area. Conveniently located close to the beach, shops and local cycle routes.

title: Third visit - disappointed this time
review: Have previously loved this hotel and stayed twice before, and based on that decided to book our first family holiday here since having our son. We booked a royal jacuzzi room as it is all on one level and had a hot tub! The main reason for choosing this room was that it would be suitable with a young baby. Upon arrival we were told this room wasn’t available as all of the jacuzzis were not working correctly. We were offered an alternative room on two levels instead with a jacuzzi still. We agreed. The hot tubs are NOT hot! They only reach 34 degrees and were not enjoyable to use out of season with the weather being colder! In the summer I’m sure they would be fine. We were disappointed and downgraded our room to a standard room in the end as was pointless having an upgraded room…

title: Holiday
review: Dear HM88K,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! I am very sorry to see that there were a few things about your stay that left you feeling disappointed. I have forwarded your comments to the relevant managers and asked them to address them with their teams. I do hope that you will give us another chance in the future and thank you again for your helpful feedback.  Many thanks,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: “Very welcoming hotel”
review: We love this hotel and have just returned from our 2nd visit. Everywhere is spotless and the rooms are spacious and well equipped. The kitchenette facility was useful even though we were full board as we could make occasional tea/coffee whilst in the room. The facilities offered in this hotel make it very flexible for sports enthusiasts and families. The dining room is amazing and runs like clockwork with lots of very pleasant and efficient staff who work together as a team. The food is excellent, well prepared, varied and beautifully presented. The gardens and pool areas are spacious and well maintained with a fun 'bouncy dome' in one pool for the youngters. The evening entertainment was limited as it was the end of March/early April . The hotel is perfectly located for public…

title: Family holiday
review: Staff very helpful. Arrived before check in time which we knew we would due to flight times. Staff apologetic as room not ready. Great for kids. Pools with adequate sun beds and play area on site. Kids club offered varied activities. Bar drinks expensive but expect this at an all inclusive hotel. Situated 10 minute walk away from main shops/restaurants/beach. Room was spacious and clean.

title: 3 stars
review: The hotel is very nice, good pool area and nice staff.  The indoor pool and the so-called "jacuzzi" are the same pool and not as hot as a jacuzzi should be! Two very small saunas, can fit a maximum of 4 people if you sit tight.  We had no food included so I can't answer that.  The cleaning was a disaster !!! They only cleaned the floors, emptied the garbage and made the bed. No towels changed, did not clean  tables and surfaces, did not wash the dishes! But nice and fresh room overall.   The pool for 18+ would be heated to 25 ° C and however it was only one day the pool was so hot it was a day when there were controllers or senior managers at the hotel to check that everything was working ?!  I were here in low season, so there  were almost no children. Calm and nice!…

title: Training Camp: ideal location 😁
review: Dear Victoria H,  Thank you for taking some time to leave us a review following your stay. Firstly, I am very sorry to read that you were not pleased with the standard of cleanliness in Room. I have asked our Head Housekeeper to address this with her team. I sincerely hope that you will give us another chance in the future. Kind regards,  Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Second Visit - Still a great hotel
review: Stayed here for a week long training camp and it was an ideal location  I paid extra to have a room to myself but it would have been comfortable with two. Staff very friendly. Free internet but had to pay extra for safe in room. Room clean with large bathroom, small kitchenette, living area, balcony and decent sized double bed. Cycle centre was excellent too. Very difficult to book a massage though as everything was booked up for days in advance!? Food was very good once you got over the ‘bun fight at the buffet’ with the German pensioners!!😳 Plenty of choices at breakfast and at dinner too. Not top class but very good indeed. With your hotel wristband you can charge drinks to the room. UK TV channels good to catch up on the news every morning. Didn’t use the pools but they…

title: All good
review: Nice and clean hotel - friendly staff. A lot of opportunities and different kind of entertainment. Nice pools, nice spa-area, great playground- and poolareas for children. Small problems during the stay, but they took care off it fast and with no discussion - we will definitely be back  Best regards  Mr. Voigt

title: Nice hotel to stay for cycling holidays
review: We stayed at Zafiro Tropic hotel In March for midweek cycling. Very well located in Port d'Alcudia to start different cycling routes. Friendly staff and copious breakfast buffet which was very well welcomed to start full cycling day. Too cold to use outside swimming pool. The hotel has a dedicated storage room where rented bikes can be stored and individually locked.

title: Walking
review: Dear wimvanvooren,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay.   I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Mallorca again soon.   Kind regards,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: great hotel
review: We did est breakfast at thé hôtel only once because we thought thé breakfast was to expencive. Breakfast and thé buffet at thé hôtel were bouth complet and Nice. Room was Nice and we had an enjoyable stay.

title: Fantastic trip
review: Dear Voyage429994,   Thank you for sending us your comments after your stay with us. We sincerely regret that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. We would have liked to have had the chance to hear about your experience in reception and resolved the problems during your stay. Our team is always available to guests to ensure they are satisfied with their stay.   However, we also hope that you were able to enjoy all of our other services and facilities and that we may welcome you back again in the future.   Sincerely,   Pep Escalas  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Cycling Holiday
review: The Zafiro Tropic is a sports-friendly, beautiful hotel offering spacious, comfortable rooms, several pools plus a spa, excellent front desk service, fresh and healthy foods for breakfast and dinner, a large sitting/bar area, and an outstanding all around stay. Excellent value for the cost!

title: Amazing holiday
review: Amazing holiday. Hotel was amazing, food was lovely, fresh and hot if you can't find anything to eat you must be way to fussy, we ate he breakfast and dinner and some times bar snacks. Rooms are lovely and clean the staff are all really friendly and helpful. You get free pool towels and about 8 different accessories in the bathroom. Only downside was this time of year theirs not many shops open. We had lovely weather so great for winter sunshine but indoor pool is a must.

title: Pretty ok !
review: One man alone is doing the check-in...took a while...but ok...6/10points. Waited 2 hours before the room was ready (we got there at 12, and the rooms are available around 2/3pm). As we got our room we then realized, they had said nothing about WiFi, and no info was to be found in the room. Hooking up on the WiFi was a disaster in the beginning, but then it worked ok. Our safety deposit box was broke so we needed to fix that...wanted to call the reception so they could send someone, but there was no info what that number was, (tried 0, 1 and a few more but ofcourse it was none of them...turned out to be 9) so I had to run down and fix all of these issues. Ok, heading to the pool...there we realized everybody had big blue beach towels...nothing had been said where to get those,…

title: The dinner buffets could use some work
review: Dear 3AndreasK,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at the Zafiro Tropic.  Your feedback, whether positive or negative, is very important to us as it gives us the opportunity to always seek improvement.  I am really sorry that you did not enjoy your stay and would like to offer you my sincere apologies. I have already shared your comments with the departments involved and they are looking into the issues in order to take appropriate measures to prevent them from happening again.  One again, please accept my apologies for everything that went wrong with your stay.  Should you wish to give us another chance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me directly so that I can ensure everything will be spot on.  Best regards,  Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel General Manager

title: Hassle Free Holiday
review: Stayed for 9 nights on the plan that included breakfast and dinner.  Nice well maintained rooms with a ton of amenities. The room had a kitchen, well equipped should you want to use it. Breakfasts had a nice variety of good food. The variety for the evening meal could use more variety for those who are staying for more than a few day, we ate elsewhere one evening for some variety.  There were a number of small children in the dining room that needed supervision to avoid being annoying to other customers, coloring on the floor and running all over the place.  The hotel has limited parking space, however, there is on street parking available nearby.

title: Zafiro tropic
review: Excellent staff, food amazing, lovely clean pools, kids club great for all ages, shop on site, 2 min walk to beautiful clean beach, this is the 6th stay at this hotel and already booked for next year .

title: Overall Excellent
review: So many facilities for kids that my daughter aged 10 was constantly busy. Really good value for money, breakfast was excellent! Close to the town/strip, the beach and the water park so a great location too.

title: Family holiday
review: A good hotel for families, every age group catered for.  We did self catering and the kitchen was more than adequate. Enough room to eat inside or out.  Great pools. Inside pool was adequate with a sauna room.  Half board and all exclusive available.  Food looked very good although we didn’t try it.

title: An excellent family friendly hotel
review: The hotel is in a really good position for easy access to the beach, town and bus stops for visiting other places of interest.. Excellent facilities for the children. Great number of pools, good to see 1 adult  only although from Oct 1st children are allowed in. Room was excellent with kitchen facilities. Good shop on site! A really huge buffet and welcomed and presented. Well worth the half board.

title: Zafiro
review: Our first visit since it has been changed to Zafiro,Happy to report it continues to inprove on its high standards Our room was perfect,The housekeeping staff are excellent and always take time to ask is everything ok as they go about their work throughout the hotel.

title: Great family hotel
review: We had a lovely week here in July. Pools were a huge hit with the kids as were the daily events for children - foam party etc. Good location, close to the clean beach and plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. We were self catering and the accommodation and balcony (sea view) was great for us. The only thing putting us off coming back would be the very high prices at the bar and restaurant. We had a very poor lunch at the pool bar and gave up on buying drinks as the cost was so highly. Overall, an enjoyable stay.

title: More than  happy
review: Couldn't be more happy  from start to finish  on arrival reception staff were more than helpful our room was a low level Royal Terrace extremely clean management must be so proud of their staff from the cleaners to the bar staff waiters and maintenance staff all extremely helpful the more than impressed with the quality of the food and drinks  the hotel itself and the pools were extremely clean will be going back again next year and would highly recommend it

title: Clean, comfortable and very friendly staff. Recommended.
review: The hotel is modern, clean and spacious. Our room was not exactly huge, but the bed was large and comfortable. Air conditioning was also very good. Bathroom and shower all top notch. What struck us was just how friendly and nice the staff all were. There will be issues for nit- pickers but this is a lovely place to stay. Can't comment on the restaurants as we always ate out but the outdoor pools were all lovely. One minor complaint was the loud music played in the pool area during the day, but teens will likely approve of that.

title: Average, not value for the price...
review: Restroom that has a leaking toalet AND where the door smacks into your legs when you're sitting down to do your thing is a HUGE no no where I'm from.   We traveled 5 people, 4 in my group and 1 alone in 2 seperate rooms. Guess WHICH one got the BIGGER kitchen, BIGGER bedrom, BIGGER toalet and a BIGGER terrace?  If you guessed the LONE traveler, then you guessed RIGHT !.  Not to impressed with many things at the hotel, like the facts that the Lifeguards around the pools LEAVES at the first sign of rain and leaves EVERYDAY 40 minutes earlier than the what the signs says

title: hutmuss
review: Dear glennsoe,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review after your recent stay with us.  I am very sorry to read about your experience with the room. Our engineer has been informed of your experience and will thoroughly inspect the areas you mentioned.  We will also look at the procedure with the lifeguard company on rainy days. I can only apologize for the problems you experienced, but I can confirm that they are being addressed.  I hope you give us another opportunity in the future and we thank you again for your comments.  Best regards,  Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Cant understand the negative reviews
review: We were concerned by the mixture of reviews for the Zafiro Tropic. Our experience of the hotel was positive. We stayed in a 1 bedroom apartment self catering. We were able to check in early and the staff were pleasant. On walking into the lobby our first impressions were good its very clean and inviting.  Our room was a good size with a nice open plan living room and small kitchen. The bedroom had a super king bed which was very comfy and not 2 beds pushed together like most Spanish hotels! The bathroom was a good size with a large walk in shower. The balcony was large and overlooking a side street but that was fine because it was quiet. Okay the decor is a little dated but I'm sure Zafiro will eventually refurbish having just taken over the hotel from Viva. A big shout out to…

title: Lovely week
review: I have to admit that I was very worried about coming to this hotel because of the negative reviews. One in particular really made me anxious. When someone puts that the buildings need knocking down you can imagine my horror. Shame on that person for putting that into a review! Anyway I needn't have worried at all. This is a very nice hotel. Yes it needs a little painting here and there but I feel sure this will be attended to over the winter period. Our studio room on the second floor was very clean and modern and overlooked the garden. We were very happy with it. Actually we are still here and leave on Monday. As we eat out I cannot comment on the food. Some people have said that the bar prices are high but actually they are less than some restaurants in town. The entrance to…

title: Reception staff awful and lie
review: The hotel on a whole is a great base for alcudia but would I return? No. The kids pirate pool was a hit with our 4 year old but from the word go the reception staff are reluctant to help with anything. I emailed ahead before the holiday to ask for a late check out room and the cost and was told to ask when checking in, was told at check in to come back the day before check out and there was 75% chance of keeping the room.the day before I am now told the hotel is full and not a single room spare, it's October and I'm not joking when I say barely 20% of sunbeds are occupied on a daily basis. Blatant lie. Also wasn't happy with the room, we were stuck on a road with a giant tree hanging over the balcony. Asked to be moved and again told me i have to pay 30 euros a night for a room…

title: Lovely Relaxing Break
review: Dear sjcraig2007,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review after your recent stay with us.  I am sorry to read about your experience with the reception team not being up to the service levels we strive for. With regards to late check outs, it is normal procedure to be requested at least one day before and it is always subject to availability.  I can only apologize for the problems you are experiencing, but I can confirm that they are being addressed.    I hope you give us another opportunity in the future and we thank you again for your comments.  Kind regards,  Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Late summer break
review: For months I kept reading the reviews as I normally do and I couldn’t wait to get there. I have to say the place didn’t let me down it was lovely. We had to wait a while for our room to be ready but when it was it was worth the wait Block 3 3021 it was lovely. We were all inclusive and the food was great but as with any holiday after a while you get a bit bored with it. Named soft drinks in bottles which surprised me. Top branded drinks included which is always a plus!   My 2 year old enjoyed the pools it was hard to get Him out of them. Entertainment wasn’t out thin so we went out at night after our meal and then returned later on.  Some of the bar staff could be a bit more pleasant but otherwise the staff were great.

title: Definitely the best for those with kids
review: The best entertainment for children through the day and till late night too.   The hotel itself was no different to any other and was starting to look a bit back dated.   There are 3 lifts and unfortunately they were rubbish. They take ages to come when called and then the doors shut so quickly (careful if you have kids).  The rooms are an okay size but adequate.  It gets a 5 star because Yzzy and team have provided non stop entertainment for kids and the location is amazing!

title: A most enjoyable holiday
review: We had a brilliant one week stay at the Zafiro Tropic from start to finish. Very friendly & helpful staff at check in. Our room (studio apartment, perfect for us 2 adults & 1 child) was lovely & clean and was kept that way all week by a lovely, friendly housekeeper. The facilities for children are amazing at this hotel. So many pools to choose from which are so clean & safe. My daughter really enjoyed the 2 main pools where most water activities took place.  The kids club staff kept my daughter entertained all day long with activities (when she wasn't in the pool!) Running mat, water basket, t-shirt painting & foam party to name afew. Even when it rained on afew occasions the activities were moved indoors. A movie was put on a big screen in the inside bar while the children ate…

title: Tamara
review: Its a really clean hotel, nice, helpfull personel. Good place to holiday with family or friend. The room was very pleasant and comfortable. Very good localisation, niear to beach or town center. I will be back there.

title: Biking holiday with friends
review: We were very satisfied of the hotel. The only remark we have is that our bed was to soft! And the beds at the 18+ pool were not very hygienic! Very good food, enough choice...friendly personnel. Possible that we come back once....

title: Paula turner
review: This hotel is brilliant for people with mobility problems the hotel very easy to get round everything close to hand we been given a ground floor two bed room room 2008  with walk-in shower and large garden area with gate leading to pool (the room good with a lovely cleaner who comes daily bringing  fresh towel etc and very  helpful nothing too much trouble for her) and sun loungers couple of steps out of gate  and there plenty of loungers available all day no need to get up early the complex is spotless the food and drinks brilliant ( we are all inclusive) the staff are very very good  this complex suitable for all age groups but especially fantastic for young family’s we are going home tomorrow but could have easily stayed a few more days everything 100 cent not got one…

title: fantastic holiday
review: I cannot fault our holiday in anyway - excellent throughout Location: nice quiet area but just five minutes from 12km of immaculate beach, and shops and restaurants five mins or 10 to main beach area or along the beach to the same area or if you go to the right you can walk for miles along the beach, mainly hotels backing onto the beach this way but a lovely walk.  there is a supermarket onsite has a wide selection but a lot cheaper just round the corner. - smokers the supermarkets don't sell tobacco of any kind. there is a tobacco shop  go left onto the main strip of shops.  Alcudia  old town is worth a visit, taxi or bus will take you we chose to walk took about half an hour but definitely worth it to see within the ancient city walls a town in its self, with shops and…

title: Birthday celebration
review: Hotel very clean basic inside but all what you need for a base.As it was a special birthday the hotel left a bottle of champagne for the birthday girl guest  .We all thought this was a very nice touch.We were also upgraded to a garden view with no extra charge.Thank you zafrio topic for an enjoyable stay,we all found the grounds to be maintained to a good standard.The only one negative around the pool area was the sun lounger where on top of each other giving you no space.Otherwise no other concerns  the location of the hotel was perfect very close to everything beach was very clear and clean.restaurants and bars close to hand.

title: Not relaxing but children loved it
review: When we first arrived we were a bit disappointed.  The building is old, the lifts were broken and it wasn't exactly what we'd call 4 star in appearance.  For example there is no one to help with luggage, no-one serving drinks by the pool and the place felt very over crowded.  The rooms are also pretty basic.  However the facilities are amazing for children.  I can not praise the entertainment team enough.  They made my daughters holidays.  There is a large variety of activity available and they are so welcoming. The mini disco is fantastic, and the kids pool is also impressive.    The food at the buffet is also outstanding.  I am pretty fussy but have to say it was 5 star quality and it was very varied from day to day.   I don't think I would go back because the buildings need…

title: Noisy, not very clean but good proximity and pool area
review: Very noisy in the evenings - especially consideeing it's a family hotel Nice large room (privilege) but not very clean Buffet was good but servers were too busy, glass broken but not replaced, cockroach on plate without presenting any excuses,... Nice pool area and playground, close to beach

title: Great hotel for families with young children
review: Dear plomme9  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review after your recent stay with us.  I am very sorry to read about your experience at the buffet and the room.   I am pleased to know that the pool and playground were to your liking and I hope that, on this basis, we will see you soon. I can only apologize for the problems you experienced, but I can confirm that they are being addressed.  I hope you give us another opportunity in the future and we thank you again for your comments.  Kind regards,   Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Kids orientated
review: On arrival staff was so polite this didn't change as all through the holiday they couldn't do enough for you.  We upgraded to an apartment from the studio on day 2 which was so much more spacious and nice to have a bedroom to give us some privacy from our daughter, I'd definitely say to book an apartment over a studio.  The amount of activities throughout the day and night for kids was brilliant always something to do. Location was perfect.  I'm so happy we chose this hotel and if we go back to alcudia I would definitely stay again. Pool ball was so much fun for adults and children.

title: Toddlers paradise
review: Dear Mr./Mrs. Cjw1990   Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards,   Pep Escalas Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Nice week
review: We arrived at the end of August for our week’s stay with our 2 year old. We went all inclusive as it was just easier with a little one. We’ve been to Alcúdia before but we’re further up the coast. We loved the area more this time. 20 minute walk to the old town and 5 minutes to the beach. Lovely sandy beaches and shallow, so perfect for little ones  The hotel itself is super family friendly and going late in the summer meant there were plenty of families with little ones around our 2 year old’s age. So we felt very relaxed as we didn’t have to feel self conscious if she had a meltdown. The hotel staff are amazing! They work tirelessly round the clock and the place is spotless!!  There are several pools, the splash pool is awesome! Waterslides, shallow with a sloping edge and our…

title: Not worth it
review: Love this hotel. There was dufferent swiming pools. Relaxing with out children. Pools for children. And pools for both children and grown ups.  We had jazzacucci in Our room. Wery food. A pool man looked after evert day. Romm was cleans almost evert day. We could not find out with time on day it was. Some times after 15  But thank you for a Nice week

title: August Holiday
review: We just got back from Mallorca and this time we stayed at the Zafiro Tropic. I was thrilled at first because our last visit at Zafiro Palace was amazing. I understand they are different hotels but the level of service was significantly different. The prices of each were very similar but obviously the Tropic was a little less. The rooms were ok, but there was a constant hum within our room, glasses were never washed, cracks in walls and the showers overflowed into the whole bathroom. Had to wear water shoes after the shower. In my opinion, they need to step up their game. Pay the extra little bit and stay at the Zafiro Palace in Port Alcúdia. It will be a much better visit. Don’t waste your time here. On a high note, breakfast was good.

title: Family holiday back to this hotel
review: Visited the hotel for the 4th year in a row and already booked to go back July 2019 which should tell the tale of what we think about the hotel. Good location, friendly staff, comfortable clean rooms. Good food choices and drinks in the all inclusive options. Adult only pool lovely to chill out. Mini disco with Izzy the mascot quite good, evening entertainment ok.

title: Good base to explore Mallorca
review: The Zafiro Tropic is located just five minutes from the beach and a very short walk from the bars and shops of Puerto Alcudia. While it is looking a bit tired in places we found it a good base for our Mallorca holiday. My 10 year old daughter loved the pools, especially the bouncy pillow. We booked a Premier Studio originally, but we took the opportunity to upgrade. The décor, and the kitchen area were dated and would definitely benefit from some attention; however, we chose self-catering and with the exception of breakfast, we eat out every day, so the limited cooking facilities were not an issue. The bed was very comfortable, and though we were close to the lift, we had no major issue with noise.  For us, the Zafiro Tropic provided a good base to explore Mallorca. We can't…

title: Disappointed Initially
review: Having been here before a few years ago we decided to come back again as felt it was really child friendly. Decided to book directly with hotel and mistakenly thought we would get a room as described by booking directly rather than paying with discounted (cheap and cheerful) company and being offered poorer room.  When we arrived late at night and went to room I was extremely disappointed- safe didn’t work, no complimentary water as mentioned at check in and worst part was room was terrible. Kitchen area was opposite toilet and behind front door which made for a narrow, claustrophobic not very hygienic experience.   We paid for Premium Pool View which had a very limited view of pool and only when stood up could we see the pool. (See photos) Went back downstairs straight away and…

title: We arrived and promptly left
review: We were booked into the Tropic for ten nights as part of a 15 night break to Mallorca. First impressions were that the hotel was very crowded and noisy and there were bees/ wasps everywhere! We had a top category royal terrace room but it was pretty tired and dated- much like the whole hotel. We were most concerned about a safeguarding issue at the kids pool- they have to climb up steps to access the pirate ship slides and these steps are out of sight of the pool area and right next to a road. Only a flimsy hedge between the main road and the kids pool was of real safety concern to us with a 3-year old child.
