We upgraded and went to the sister hotel- Zafiro Palace- 700m up the road and like a different world. This experience proved us wrong in thinking that it would be fine to…

title: Great for kids
review: Dear Krevans250812,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.  I am very sorry to see that there were a few factors of your stay that left you feeling disappointed. It is great to hear though that you were happy with the upgrade to our five-star Zafiro Palace Alcudia hotel.   I hope that you enjoyed your time in Mallorca and we hope we can see you back again in any of our Zafiro Hotels.  Best regards, Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Great hotel but needs improvements!
review: Firstly, this is a good hotel.  It's in a good location (5 mins walk to the beach / 20 mins walk to Alcudia old town), and only 45-50 mins from the airport.  Reception area is immaculate, and the check in was efficient.  We stayed in 1 bed pool view rooms, and they were certainly big enough and had a kettle / fridge / microwave etc which all came in handy.   The pool facilities are fantastic - we travelled as a family of 7 (4 adults and 3 kids aged 15, 12 and 7), and the children spent most of their time in the various pools - they loved the bubble pool.  We stayed all inclusive and the food and drinks package was probably one of the best we have had.  The food at the pool bar during the day was really good quality and the range of food available on an evening meant there was…

title: Just returned from a family holiday
review: Dear Richard L,   Thank you for taking a few minutes to rate our hotel.   I am glad to read that you and your family specially enjoyed the pool areas, and that you also found our All-Inclusive quality was superb.  We take note of the negative points to improve them. We apologize that your experience with us on this occasion was not ideal, but we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again in the future.  Best regards,  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: experience of this hotel
review: I have given this hotel 4 stars as it does have some very good amenities, the hotel rooms are lovely and clean, the maids are also very friendly. The hotel pools are also very nice and clean and plenty to choose from with life guards covering all the pools. We stayed self catering so cannot comment on the all inclusive food but we did try the food round the pool bar and that was excellent, also they offered good rates to upgrade to AI,it was 56 Euro per day with pay for 5 days and get 2 free, we didn’t do this as we enjoy eating out. The reception staff where also very nice and sorted out any problems in a polite, friendly manner. One of Things I would change for self catering families is to be able to pay for food and drink as we get it, we had a couple of incidents when one of…

title: Phil
review: Dear Mrs. Karen M   Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic.  We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort. .   I apologize for the service your received in the bar, we take note of your helpful feedback and we will work hard to improve these aspects.  Best regards.  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Complaint
review: just arrived home from a 2 wk holiday at the Zafiro hotel Alcudia.was very disappointed as we approached the hotel not what we were expecting for the money we paid.Rooms were very basic with a kitchenette that we didn't want,rooms could do with a good deep clean,no tissues in rooms had to pay for safe which most places now are free.Pool areas for children very good,pool for adults good but no amenities at hand such as a bar.kids entertainment good but repetitive.staff on reception use toilets but don't wash hands.the biggest downfall is 1 bar open all day for all hotel,waiter service is terrible you could wait an hour or more for a waiter to return, when you go to the bar to get your own drinks you get ignored by rude bar staff also waiters are very rude.One good point is food…

title: Week away with Family
review: We have stayed at the Viva Blue in Playa del Muro a number of times but couldn't get a reservation for the dates, so decided to try the Zafiro Tropic instead.  I must admit, we were pleasantly surprised.  The hotel in general is slightly dated but functional all the same and a very short walk to the beach and Port, which we very much enjoyed.  Normally we do all inclusive but decided to go self catering due to the number of bars and restaurants in close proximity.  My 8 year old daughter enjoyed the pools during the day, especially the bubble bouncer just off the main pool, also, the kids disco and entertainment was good fun but you need to be quick to get a decent table.  We found that we could get a decent sun bed even after 9am which was a bonus.  The biggest compliment I…

title: Fantastic week
review: Dear JamesGYorkshire,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review regarding your recent stay with us here in Mallorca.   I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back to Mallorca again soon.  Thank you again Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Nice hotel but not quite 4 star
review: Myself and my partner stayed here with our kids aged 9, 8 and 1 for 1 week from the 3rd-10th August 2018. On arrival check in was quick and easy we were just told it would cost €7 per night for the use of a cot but I had already read this on a previous review so it was fine. We were also given our swipe cards as this hotel doesn't accept cash payments for food drink etc, you settle your bill when your leaving. We stayed on the 3rd floor. Rooms are modern and clean and had all the space we needed as we didn't spend much time in the room. We were self catering so everything was there if you wanted to cook although we ate out all the time. The pools are fantastic our 9 and 8 year old loved the bouncy one mainly. There is a choice of 6 pools outside (one over 18 that we never got to…

title: Not 4 star
review: We stayed here for 10 nights July/August in a Premier one bedroom apartment with pool view on our first family holiday abroad with our 8 and 4 year old.  We had a great holiday here, there are definitely positives and negatives for this hotel.  Negatives; - although pools and main parts of the hotel are beautiful the rooms definitely need updating, they let the hotel down and are definitely not 4 star level. Our room was in block two, the air conditioning barely worked and there were dead mosquito splatters all over the place, there must have been 10-15 around apartment! - we arrived late at night with tired kids and suitcases, which we had to drag up to the second floor as there were no lifts. The air con wasn’t working, the room was roasting and the sofa bed hadn’t even been…

title: Summer Family Holiday
review: Dear gemziboo,   Thank you for taking a few minutes to leave a review following your recent stay with us.    We apologize that your experience with us on this occasion was not ideal. We take note of the negative points to improve them.  We do hope we can have the opportunity to welcome you again in the future to restore your faith in the ZafiroTropic.   Best regards,  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Ants, waterleak, horrible customer service
review: We stayed 2 weeks in this hotel. We have been to Alcudia several times before, and wanted to try a new hotel. NOT doing the same mistake again. I can not and will not reccomend this hotel.  The customer service at the reception was terrible, refused to order a taxi to the Old Town, because "it only takes 15 min to walk", the clerk claimed... Well that would be my decision, wether to walk or not....? We had ants in our bedroom and our livingroom. The beds were horrible, my husband and I didnt´t sleep continously one single night during our stay.  There were dead insects in the pool at 9am. Too few sunbeds around the pools. Considering what we paid for this stay, it was not worth it.  The hotel needs an upgrade, rather sooner than later...

title: Mixed review - Stayed at better.
review: Dear Camilla,  We appreciate that you took a few minutes to rate our hotel.  We are sorry if you felt that the service at reception was unpleasant. I am sure our receptionist only wanted to give you advice, as we always try to make the holidays of our guests as nice as possible.  We apologize for the ants and uncomfortable beds, we are a bit shocked with this feedback as they were all changed last year. If we had known this during your stay, we would have tried to find another solution. Also this year we are trying to prevent the sunbeds from being reserve, with towels being removed every 40 minutes.   We hope we can welcome you again in our hotel,  Kind regards, Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: I don't get it?
review: Having seen the pictures of the pool area before travel we couldn't wait for our holiday! The apartment blocks at this hotel are HUGE. it looks great with the apartments round the pool but at the hotel entrance is the 5 story God knows how many rooms mega block. There is probably dining seating for around 250- 350 guests but only sun loungers for around 150.  So obviously when you went down to sit next to the pool it was the usual idiots that got up at 6am ready to wait and reserve their 6 beds for their family of mum and dad and children aged 1,2,3 and 5. Selfish people! Same faces everyday. A few times we went down and had to wait an hour so the lifeguard could remove a couple of towels so our family of 6 could squeeze onto 2 beds.  At anyone time all beds were towel reserved…

title: Fantastic family holiday
review: Dear RICHinWAKEY,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.   I would like to take the opportunity to thank you for choosing to stay at Zafiro Tropic.  I would like to apologise for the service issues you experienced during your stay. This is not the level of service that we strive towards and as such I have taking note of this and passed it along to the Higher Management Team to review this with the members of staff within their teams.   I do hope to welcome you back to Zafiro hotel in the future.  Many thanks

title: Summer family fun at Zafiro Tropic
review: Lots of positive reviews on this place so clearly I'm in the minority when I say I'm not wowed.  Nothing is really bad but nothing is good either.  I think a big part of my issues are more the fact the hotel is packed, the pools are like a bath tub with no room anywhere, restaurant the same, bars the same.  It's like the whole complex has twice as many people it can actually cater for.  The gym is lousy and rooms are tired.  With the exception of the reception and cleaners staff look harrased and miserable.  I have a week to go and it's feeling like an endurance test, we ate out last night which was a refreshing change to the cattle heard moving to the troughs for more bland food in the hotel.  It could be this just isn't my type of holiday so take this review in context of all…

title: Great family hotel
review: We visited this hotel in July.  We were a family group of 6 adults and 2 kids.  The hotel was great! Very clean and reception staff and cleaning staff were lovely and very helpful! We chose the hotel Because we had kids traveling with us, if we didn't have the kids with us we wouldn't have chosen it! It's perfect for families with kids, however if you're a couple I wouldn't recommend it! There's something for everyone but we found the outside bar staff very difficult to deal with! They insist that the service be a sit down table service but there wasn't enough staff to deal with the amount of people there!   The only complaint that we had was that the adults only area / relaxation pool is right beside the kids pool, and the tennis court where they have foam parties for the kids.…

title: Nice hotel
review: Very good hotel for families. Clean enough rooms, and generally clean hotel. Pleasant and helpful staff in all departments. The bar service can be slow, so they do need some more bar staff, but they all are very helpful and polite. Food is good. I'm a vegetarian and I didn't struggle for choices to eat at all. I'd say the highlight of the hotel had to be the pools and the way they are monitored. Anyone leaving towels by the pool and then going back to bed will have their towel removed. The lifeguards are generally very good too. Parts of hotel itself are a bit a bit worn and tatty, but hopefully it will get a bit of a makeover soon. On the whole, we had a very nice time here and would visit again in the future.

title: NIce hotel and location - few complaints though around noise.
review: Generally the hotel was very nice, kids loved the pools and entertainment. We stayed self catering so ate out every night along the seafront / harbour with some very nice restaurants. Pippers restaurant served lovely food right on the beach front, our favourite for the week.  Room was fine and cleaned every day, on site shop was very good and catered for most items you would want for self catering.  Food around the pool at lunchtime was very good.  Having requested a quiet room with pool view prior to visiting and the reception confirming this on check in, we were given room 3119. This is on the first floor looking out over the main pool. On our first morning at 7 am we were woken by the noise of sunbeds being scraped along the tiled floor around the pool by the pool boy. Maybe…

title: Family Hotel in Alucdia (Port)
review: Dear Mr. Tabiner,   Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback following your recent stay with us.   I would like to apologise for the service issues you experienced during your stay. As I mentioned to you in my previous email, this can only be done first thing in the morning. I agree with you that when laying out sunbeds around the pool members of the staff should be careful not to make noises. As soon as you reported this issue we spoke immediately with the relevant team.   Hopefully we will have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Warmest regards, Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Best hotell in Alcudia / Mallorca
review: This is very much a family hotel. During our stay, the majority were younger families, and indeed the property is well catered with facilities for these ages (toddlers to early teens). For the older teens and adults, chill out spaces, gym, bike room etc are available. Reception & Reception staff 100%, Onsite Shopping facilities (for the self caterers) 100%, The Spa and quality of treatments there 100%. The choice of pools 100%. The entertainment (family oriented) wraps up around 1030pm as it is in the centre of the property, but there is an option of a bar for those who'd like to keep going. Otherwise, very close to the Port and bars/restuarants & the beach - about 5min walk. As a location, the beach is long and amazing, and very popular. There is a good choice of places to eat…

title: Dated, tired and poorly cleaned.
review: My first impressions of the Zafiro Tropic were that it needed a lick of paint to bring it back to life.  Considering the money this place must bring in, it is tired looking with flaking and faded paint.  The pools have got lots of minor damage, such as tiles missing, exposed seams on the kiddies slides, and torn safety mats on the trampoline.  The food was great and is this hotels greatest asset from what I saw.  Generally the staff are good but can a little hit and miss with how they treat customers.  I think this may be down to the fact they appeared to be working 15-16 hour days.  My family got sick whilst staying here and despite telling the cleaners and the manager, it wasn’t until our last day that our room had a proper clean with bleach or disinfectant.  If they had done…

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Tommo294,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review on your recent stay with us at Zafiro Hotel.  I am so disappointed to read that you felt your experience with us did not meet your expectations; please contact me directly via the email dir.tropic@zafirohotels.com so I can investigate this further.  Ultimately as a hotel and team, our core focus is to do the utmost for our guests during their time in our care and I  am so very sorry to learn that this was not the case.  Warmest regards, Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Hotel great, rooms not so
review: We have just returned from an amazing weeks holiday. The Hotel is spotless, our room was perfect - we stayed in a Royal apartment which was great for relaxing on the roof terrace for a few hours after a day in the pools. All of the pools were great and no problems with sun beds, if you can’t get one by the pool there is a grassed area by the pools that have sun beds piled up for you to use and it’s very chilled here as away from noise of the pools. Would definitely recommend and hopefully return!

title: Fantastic family holiday
review: Dear Mrs Clarrissa2014,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us.   We are happy to know that our staff at Zafiro Tropic did its best for you to have an enjoyable stay.   We would love to have you again at our resort again in the future.  Best regards,  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: 5th time at the Zafiro Tropic and still a great hotel
review: Excellent pool facilities. However for the price we paid the rooms really are not great for a family of 4.   Very expensive food/drink to purchase as well.  Buffet breakfast was nice.  Only meal we took as way over priced for other meals.

title: Disappointed
review: We stayed at the zafiro Mallorca in can picafort last year which was fantastic so happily booked again with zafiro this year and chose zafiro tropic in Alcudia. Sadly it does not live up to the Mallorca. The hotel looks tired and the bar service is unbelievable slow. I am actually writing this review whilst waiting for service. This hotel is certainly not 4 star and could only be described as a good 3 star. Hopefully an upgrade is planned. It will not stop us staying with zafiro again but it will certainly be the Mallorca and not the tropic

title: Great Family Holiday !!!
review: Just returned from a 7 night stay here at Zafiro Tropic and honestly was one of the best hotels ever visited ! I'll start from arrival where we were greeted by friendly staff and a very clean reception area . Our room was a 2 bedroom pool view apartment, the room was spacious, modern and very clean , we also had a very big balcony . In terms of facilities you can't get a better hotel -literally something for every one , there are 7 pools at the hotel ; 2 main pools, a splash park for kids , adults only pool , wet bubble pool for kids and 2 swim up pools. There is also a play park and a mini golf . The location is lovely it's about a 4 minute walk from the alcudia beach with many shops and bars on the way .The entertainment was okay just like anywhere , but the reps were so good…

title: Really Nice hotel
review: Dear Mr. jamesbuesnel21   Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. We are happy to know that our staff at Zafiro Tropic did its best for you to have an enjoyable stay. We invite you to follow us on Facebook and Twitter since we post some promotions which could be of your interest.   We do hope we can see you again at Zafiro Tropic hotel in the near future.   Kind regards,  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Another Fantastic Holiday
review: We are normally it traveling with all-inclusive vacation, but this hotel might change this. Room was very spicy, bathroom really Well equipped and the large terrace with privat spa was a treat.  I have to mention the 18+ aces pool. This is a brilliant idea when you would like to get a bit more relax time a bit time off from a gazillion of noisy kids. The hotel really offers some unique opportunities for every guest group.

title: 4th time at Zafiro Tropic - still good
review: Dear Mr. Tom H,  Thank for taking the time to leave a review.   We are pleased you had such a lovely time with us and that you found our Oasis Pool space a good idea for adults to relax. We certainly aim to provide a space for every guest group in the best way we possibly can.   We would love to see you again if you come back to Mallorca.   Kind regards, Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Brilliant family holiday!
review: We have just returned from a fun-filled, fantastic family holiday at the Zafiro Tropic hotel. We had a truly great time staying there, and the staff were a credit to the management- they were all so friendly, attentive, and well-trained.   This hotel, like the last Zafiro Hotel we stayed in was extremely well maintained and very family-orientated. We were all-inclusive, and we found that a great option for us, as it included really anything we fancied, from ice creams, to cocktails.   Only slight bugbear during our stay was the availability of sun-loungers around the pools, just like all other hotels we’ve stayed in. People seem to get up very early, saunter down to to pool, and reserve sun-beds- sometimes not using them for hours later. This was annoying, as at 9am there were…

title: Really nice hotel in Alcudia
review: Dear Mrs. LornaM  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review following your recent stay with us.   We are delighted to read you had such a great time at the hotel and that your kids enjoyed the entertainment team activities. We take note of the rest of your comments to keep improving the service to our guests.   We would love to see you again if you come back to Mallorca.   Best regards, Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Good 3 star
review: Really nice hotel for families, in Alcudia. Close to the beach. Good food in bar and buffet. A lots of activities for children. Many swimmingpools, for every age. Playground. Minigolf. Nice workers, good service.

title: If you feel like sleeping in a room full of cigarette smoke, then go here...
review: Dear Karin,    Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic to spend your holidays.   We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards,  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manger

title: Amazing, a truly perfect family holiday!
review: Just back from 9 nights Self Catering at Zafiro a Tropic. Travelled with wife and 2 girls (10 & 7). This is a good 3 star, definitely not a 4 star. Check in went smoothly although a bit disappointed no reception drinks on arrival. We were in room 1443 in the main block. Hotel looking tired and needing a revamp. Reception area nice enough but rest of hotel a bit drab. Beech flooring and colours took me back to 1999. Did receive a free complimentary bottle of water in our fridge which was appreciated.  Be prepared to be invoiced for Tourist tax on arrival. We were €56 for 9 nights. Doubled from last year. You pay bill on departure so remember to retain some funds. Also got stung for safe so we were billed for €90 in total on arrival.  Our room was a small 1 bedroom apartment.…

title: Lovely stay!
review: We have just returned from a weeks stay here. To be honest, I couldn’t really fault it and after reading recent reviews, I was concerned. Our children aged 9, 6 and 1 had a ball! We stayed in block 1(the main part of the hotel) and paid to upgrade to a pool view room on arrival(although we were 2nd floor so our view of pool wasn’t the best due to layout.Our one bedroom apartment was lovely and clean and perfectly adequate for our needs. We did have a problem with the air conditioning but were moved rooms quickly.   The food was excellent, always varied choices for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Themed nights were very well done. We had lunch at the pool bar, again excellent. The majority of drinks were all inclusive, only certain brands you had to pay for but no need with choice…

title: excellent stay, 5 stars on all fronts
review: Dear Mr./Mrs. lk60a,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic.   We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again at our resort or any other of our Zafiro Hotels.   Best regards,  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Fab holiday with the family!
review: I have just come back from ten days at the Zafiro Tropic. highly recommend for a family vacation, or also for couples.  Reception: check in was fast and efficient. We had booked a deluxe room and we were given the chance to upgrade to a two bedroom, which we took. we had the all inclusive package. Staff at the reception was nice, always ready to help.  Room: We were in bloque 4, which was surrounded by greenery and close to the kids club and kids' pool. Room was clean, balcony was big, but faced the back of the hotel, but we didnt spend much time on it, so no problem. Air conditioning worked well, we had a leak one afternoon, we notified the reception and they came to fix it right away. There is a small kitchen with everything one needs, including stove, cooking pans, cutleries…

title: Brilliant family Hotel
review: Dear Mrs Criny,  Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic.   We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon. Should you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact us.   Kind regards,  Zafiro Tropic Hotel Manager

title: Johns review
review: Pool set up is wonderful for adults and kids can see all at most angles.   Love the stage and screen good atmosphere for World Cup.  Bar food tastes amazing cooked fresh and great table service - David and young Guy black hair behind bar very efficient.  Buffet mainly good but a bit repetitive,  great options on wine choices for all inclusive with bottle opened at table, first class.  Room very dated and paint colour drab, but clean, functional with good balcony.

title: mediocre
review: I’m very puzzled why this hotel gets such good reviews. There’s nothing especially wrong with the hotel but there’s nothing particularly great about it either, other than the staff who are exceptionally polite & attentive. The photos are extremely misleading, it’s looks huge on the pictures but it is actually on the small side and very cramped around the pool areas.  The hotel is advertised as only a 5 minute walk from the beach. This beach I feel is terribly DANGEROUS. The sea is stagnant, there are no waves or even ripples. The sea is very warm and very inviting but as you swim out the smell of sewage is overwhelming. This has to be dangerous and people should be warned before they go rushing in with babies and children. The whole of the hotel including  balcony lights shut…

title: Excellent
review: We are coming to the end of our two week holiday and have to say this hotel is amazing. What really makes it stand out from the rest is the attentive and friendly staff. Check in was smooth and our room very pleasant and so clean. The food is superb, we were all inclusive, every member of the kitchen staff, food service staff and bar staff are superb, they look after you so well. Look out for Lili, Alexandro, David and Ricardo who are working between the bar and restaurant. Head chef always on hand to chat about the food and service, great to see. Very family friendly, great value we are having a superb holiday. Thank you to all the staff for making our stay 5 star 👍❤️

title: Nice resort!
review: Dear Mr.  Garry A Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are proud that our clients‘ needs are attended in the best way. If you come back, do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Loved coming back and will return again
review: We stayed for 9 days in late June. We have a 12 and 15 yr old girls (we are American) and did the all-inclusive which was a first for us.   The resort was great! Our most favorite things: the staff was wonderful! Friendly and accommodating. The pools are laid out very well and beautiful, nice towels. The pool bar was a favorite hang out for lunch (menu service even will all incl) or just to a get a drink or coffee (cappuccinos and lattes were great). Large selection of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. The large TV outside was so fun to watch the World Cup matches. Unlimited ice cream selection available at all times. The grocery store made it super convenient to buy misc items. While it is not on the beach, it is only a 5min walk. We had a two bedroom suite on the ground…

title: A good resort and location
review: Dear Mr. Robyn B Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort. Best regards.

title: Loved every minute at this hotel.
review: We travelled as a party of 6, and had 3 apartments. Three of our party had learning disabilities, and we found that all the staff in the pool bar were absolutely fantastic with them. Nothing was ever to much for them , and they greeted our friends daily and made them feel so welcome and important. I would like to make a special mention of Jesus, and Sandra in the pool bar, such lovely welcoming and cheerful staff and a credit to Zafiro hotel our friends felt like they had made great friends in them .Our friends can’t wait to go back next year and they only came home today. The rooms were clean and fully suited our needs, although we had requested at least one ground floor apartment with our travel agent, there was not one available, but as soon as we asked at reception and…

title: tired
review: Wow!  Thank you very much for your words. We hope to see you very soon!

title: Great Kids pool
review: Having stayed here the previous year we were really looking forward to our stay. We had to move rooms on our first night due to the room basically not being fit. Paint stains in the bath, Cracked step into the room and loose light fittings. Our room we moved into was nice but ready for a refurb. Food was nice and the staff fantastic as always. Very noisy at night. no fault of the hotel just lack of respect by other guests. The hotel offered us a stay in another Zafiro to get away from this but having moved once it was more hassle than it was worth. On checkout I thought it would have been a nice gesture for them to cover our government tax given the circumstances. Needs a refurbishment now. 4 star? maybe once.

title: Lovely hotel
review: Bit of a mixed review of this hotel. There are good points and bad points. Good points - excellent kids pool, and play area, fantastic location, rooms are big and even studio room could easily fit family of 4 with a cot. Great choice of drinks on AI and great food at the pool bar. Hotel was clean. The bed was the comfiest bed I have slept in.  Bad points - food was average and cold at times. Got really sick of the same food most nights. Could do with better themed nights. Buffet at busy times was like being in a cattle market and it didnt help when they switched the food from different ends at lunch and dinner.  Mini disco started at 8pm which meant you had to go in  really early to eat if you wanted to make the disco in time. This meant everyone went at that time and it was…

title: Would return
review: We stayed with here as a family with 2 toddlers. As it was our honeymoon, we spent a bit extra on the Royal Terrace. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The reception desk were very helpful. The room was cleaned thoroughly multiple times. We found all the staff to be very accomodating and helpful. The facilities are very good, and caters well for children. We enjoyed it so much that we have booked again for next year.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Hotel is in a good location.    Staff very helpful and friendly.   We did self catering as like to try local restaurants.   Rooms clean and had good view - in garden view room with balcony.    Has an adults only pool which was ideal.    Hotel would be great for families but as a couple it was still good at this time of year.    There is a shop on site for any extras you need.   Hotel is only 5 mins to beach and about 10 -15 to port.   You can walk to old town alcudia in 20 - 30 minutes.   Overall a good hotel in good location.

title: Great family holiday
review: Dear Mrs. Karen7767,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards.

title: accommodation and buffet not 4*. good kids pool and entertainment
review: We arrived on 4th June for 11 nights self catering. Check-in was fine and we were given our card key to our room. We were in block 2 on the top floor and to be honest my first thoughts were disappointing. We have a 3 and a 5 year old and always take our double buggy with us on holiday, so as well as having our luggage to carry up the stairs we also had the double buggy as there wasn’t a lift. My husband did go back to reception and they did advise if we took all our belongings back to reception they would try and move us but to be honest at that point I just wanted to get unpacked and enjoy our holiday. I will be honest though, it was a bit of a pain being self catering and having to carry our shopping, the double buggy and any other belongings we had to the top floor every…

title: Just been back for our 2nd year!
review: Dear Mrs. clarelmartin83,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic.  We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Regards.

title: Great family holiday
review: accommodation - we had a royal terrace suite with the hot tub overlooking the pool. we were asked upon check in if we would like to swap from a top floor roof room (because we would need to use a spiral outside staircase without stairgates) to the 1st floor suites, as we had toddlers. lucky rooms were available for us to swap but they must have seen this when we booked? the original room given to us wouldnt have been suitable. rooms very dated and small. kitchenette fully functioning and does the job-as an all inclusive guest. sorting the kids some cereal or toast etc is ok but wouldnt do much more than that. we had to pay for travel cot (8 euros per day) but it came with nice mattress and very nice sheets (bought my own as wasnt sure but didnt need to) the terrace was very nice…

title: Lots of family stuff available
review: I had gone here with a couple of mates so stayed in the adult only areas of the grounds but was nice to hear families playing together nearby. The cleaners are the nicest people I've ever encountered - so friendly! The staff in the buffet restaurant were also nice. The service at the bars is quite slow during the day, especially if it is very hot out! Their gym looks nothing like any of the photos and the equipment is very dated (I know I was on holiday but you don't get time off fitness!). My one real annoyance is that towels used to reserve the best places are not removed as suggested but hey, the sun does move.

title: Try somewhere else!
review: Thank you very much for your review and sorry about the inconvenience with towels. We will try to solve it. Hope to see you soon at the Zafiro Tropic.

title: Definitely not 4  star.
review: My wife, 3 year old, 8 month old and I visited for one week. We used Jet2 holidays.  On arrival, the hotel looks nice and modern.  There is no staff to help you with your luggage from the bus to reception, or any offer to take your bags up to the rooms. Check in was quick and the reception staff were nice. I speak Spanish and that always helps when dealing with them. Our room was ready (sort of) so we went upstairs to drop the bags off before having a look around.  The room was a Premium Studio, Road view which was too small for the four of us. This may have been mis-leading by Jet2s website. There was no sofa bed provided for my 3 year old (luckily we brought our own blow up bed). We had to pay for the use of a cot bed for our baby. (We were not told before we arrived that we…

title: Cheap and cheerful
review: Very disappointed with our arrival at the zafiro tropic.  • Met by a grumpy receptionist (who turned out to be the manager) after travelling with 2 young kids up since 1am so not off to a great start  • Found out that all inclusive  at this hotel is not in fact all inclusive like the other hotels we have stayed with. Quite a number of times we were are told that something is not included.   • Whole hotel and rooms in block 1 were dingy, very old looking and the "Premium Studio" is so small that you couldn't swing a cat in it, the bathroom smells disgusting either from damp or sewage so much so that it makes my daughter feel sick!  The maids done a good job cleaning tho you can't polish a turd.   • A wardrobe for clothes wouldn't open due to a door stop in front of it!?!  • The…

title: Disappointment
review: Dear family Forster,  Thanks for your email, we really appreciate your  comments. We are very sorry that the hotel did not reach your expectations. We take notice of all your inquires and will make an effort to improve. Also we will have a meeting with our head managers in order to give the best service. We are sorry that you don’t agree with the safe cost, but please understand that it covers an insurance for your items. As regards the baby bed, you should be informed by Jet2 as the information is in the contract. You requested to be together with your family but sometimes, even if we make our best, that's not possible for availability reasons. We apologize if we couldn’t make it possible.  You booked a studio for 4 persons, and this is where you were allocated. You should be informed by your TTOO about the room size. We couldn’t offer you a room upgrade because our apartments were completely booked. Otherwise we would have prepare a room change. We did not have any notice about your son's allergy, so we always recommend to inform the maitre at the restaurant so he can explain you the different options you have.  Regards.

title: The Noisiest hotel I have ever stayed in.
review: I have just spent a week at this hotel, and got very little sleep, due to the constant noise inside the hotel rooms. I have stayed in hundreds of hotels, both for business and pleasure, but I have never experienced so much noise before. This is  partly due to the laminate flooring thoroughout the hotel, including the corridors, but also the open atrium through the middle of the hotel, where any noise from the foyer, travels up to the rooms. Then there was the poorly insulated windows and doors, which allow the noise from outside the hotel to be heard clearly in the rooms. I have stayed in airport hotels, overlooking the runway, that have not been as noisy as this hotel. Our rooms were located opposite a block of flats, where dogs barked constantly, and loud music was a problem.…

title: Beware!!
review: Dear PatSurrey_England,  Thank you for taking a few minutes to rate our hotel. We take note of the negative points to improve them. We apologize that your experience with us on this occasion was not ideal, but we hope to have the opportunity,   to welcome you again in the future to restore your faith in the ZafiroTropic.  Regards

title: Good solid family hotel
review: The hotel claims to be 4 star. It’s more like a 3 star. I’ve been in better 3 stars.    The rooms are very average and need modernising. The lifts can be temperamental & slow. Had to take the stairs often. There can be communication break downs with reception. The corridors have cheap laminate so it echoes the noise more.   If I had paid £200 less then maybe fair enough but it’s asking premium prices and not delivering on quality.   On a good note, the pool facilities are very good!

title: Excellent family holiday
review: Overall this is a great family hotel, check in was quick & our room was ready for our arrival.  We had a pool view room 3109 which was very clean & the double bed was very comfortable. The living & kitchen area was good but for a family of four is was a bit on the small size, especially when the sofa beds are being used. We were half board & really enjoyed the breakfast, pancakes, waffles & all the usual buffet bits. The drinks at dinner were expensive, 2 apple juices & a coke €10! Pools are great & the normal morning rush to get sun beds isn’t too bad, 8.30 - 9.30 & there’s plenty of choice. Didn’t use the kids clubs so can’t comment, but there was always something going on.  My son loves football & so I took him to ESA Soccer, just a five minute walk. Beach & shops just a…

title: Mr coppini
review: I would really recommend the Zafiro tropic for a great family holiday. The location is just a few mins walk from the beach/shops. The hotel itself is set up perfectly for families, spacious and very clean, supermarket on site. The real highlight was the buffet, excellent range of food which changes daily. Lots of variety and very fresh. The staff in the restaurant are especially friendly and even with an over excited toddler we didn’t feel like any bother. We visited outside of the  school holidays so it wasn’t too busy. Mostly Scandinavian/German visitors at this time of year.  The room was great, very clean and had a kitchenette which was perfect for us. We opted for a roof terrace with hot tub and day bed so we had somewhere to enjoy the evenings whilst the little one slept.…

title: Just lovely.
review: I wasn’t instantly wowed by this hotel but ended up falling in love with the place. Everything turned out to be excellent. Great food, good entertainment, kids always happy!   The thing that really stood out for me was the staff. Just a genuinely group of really nice people.   You won’t come away disappointed.

title: Perfect !
review: Dear Mr. Steve M Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort. Best regards.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Super!! Good, staff, service, poolarea everything! Clean and tidy. A wonderful hotel for families! We Will come back for sure! Close to the beach aswell. We had a problem with our room and the staff fixed it Very Quick . When we got back, we had som wine and fruit in the room!

title: Amazing for kids
review: Dear Mr. Malena M Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic …. We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon. Should you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact us. Kind regards.

title: Excellent family holiday
review: Checking out today after a three night stay. Everything has been brilliant. No need to so anymore. Service, staff and food fantastic.  Adult pool was very relaxing. Mowtown band were fab, would have paid to see them Thank you👍😀

title: Royal terrace room amazing!!
review: This hotel is lovely. We found it very clean and the royal terrace room is amazing! The facilities were very good but it is definately a family hotel with a lot of children running about. It was in an ideal location to the port, old town and the beach. The staff were helpful. The pools were very good although when using the adult only pool we found that a family had decided to ignore the 18+ sign, also it is positioned right next to the playground and childrens pool. The food was excellent. I would definetely recommend this hotel to families it would be perfect. But to couples i would say stay here but only if you can book the royal terrace room so you can get some privacy and quiet time.

title: Stayed here twice - can’t wait to stay again
review: Thank you for giving us such a good score and recommending our hotel Zafiro Tropic to other travellers. Our staff enjoyed attending your needs. Kind regards.

title: Nice hotel and location
review: Great location, very large clean rooms, wonderful sheltered pool with lots of sun beds.  Lots of facilities in room including full size fridge.  Hotel has bike store and garage - indoor relaxation pool in case you get a bad day.  Have stayed here twice and will definitely stay again.

title: Showing it’s age now ..... place needs a refurb
review: Wow! Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel. We are proud that our clients‘ needs are attended in the best way. If you come back, do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Lovely hotel and staff!
review: Great hotell, in particular for families. Very clean, good service and lovely staff. The location was also good, close to the beach. Big pool areas and many sunbeds. One area för only adults - great! Unfortunately was the gym not so good for strength training, few weights and only one weight machine.

title: brilliant hotel
review: not been to majorca in over 30 years so thought we,d try it again turned up at this hotel on first entering we were asked to hang around as the room wasnt ready which was a bit annoying as we,d been travelling since early morning  but turns out the wait was worth it  the room was fantastic  the bed was massive (i needed a taxi to go near wife lol ) and you just sunk into iteverything was spotless only thing we didnt like in room was the tea cups (there tidgy things lol you need 3 cups just to get a taste lol)  we were offered an up grade to a pool view for an extra 10euros a day which we declined(im a tight yorkshire man) turns out we were right as they put us in block 4 (room 4102) which is right next to kids pool at the side and just in front is another pool which was quiet …

title: Very nice
review: Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic …. We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon. Should you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact us. Kind regards.

title: Be aware and enjoy
review: We stayed half board in a room at poolside with 1 bedroom. The room was big enough for the 4 of us and was clean. Breakfast and dinner are very good, also for the kids al lot to choose. Very close to the beach.  We and the kids had a great time!

title: zafiro hotel is ok for a good break
review: Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort. Best regards.

title: A pretty good base for a family holiday
review: The sensation on the reception is that they want you to leave as soon as possible. Not even basic information about the hotel is provided. You need to keep asking... The restaurant states that dinner finishes at 9h but around 8h30 they are already removing the food, not making fresh meat/fishes and the left overs are cold. Don’t book food, there are plenty of good restaurants around the area. Mosquito is a problem, my daughter was attacked and even worse, NO ar condition in the month of May to aliviate. The girls from the miniclub are very friendly but there is no control on the kids, the kids can leave the area and walk around the hotel without supervision and even go to the swimming pools on their own, which is really danger. So if you take your kids to the miniclub, stay…

title: Good base for cycling holiday
review: Just back from 4 days at the Zafiro Tropic with 5 friends on a cycling holiday. Great trip and the Zafiro Tropic  was an excellent base for our holiday. The cycle rental was good value for our road bikes (Specialized tarmac). Breakfast buffet was pretty standard and a bit expensive. We had 1 bedroom apartments which were good but in need of a little tlc on the decoration front - that being said everything worked and they are well equipped overall. There is also a good supermarket as part of the hotel which was very convenient. There was a mix of families, groups and couples and the hotel was not too busy, given it was off season. Overall its a great value for money option in the off season that is well located with good facilities.

title: April holiday
review: Thank you for giving us such a good score and recommending our hotel Zafiro Tropic to other travellers. Our staff enjoyed attending your needs. Kind regards.

title: great hotel
review: Having already stayed with Viva/ Zafiro hotels at Zafiro Menorca and Zafiro Bahia,we opted this time for Zafiro Tropic. We chose this one as we had found Zafiro Bahia and its surroundings to be a little on the quiet side last April and had thought this one may be situated better for early season. (Being closer to bars/restaurants that have opened for season) As with our previous visits to Zafiro hotels, we found the Tropic to be clean, the rooms comfortable and the staff hard-working and friendly. The hotel is well situated,no more than 5 minutes walk to the beach and port/marina area and perhaps a 15/20 minute walk to the Alcudia town. It is close to bus stops where you can easily and cheaply travel to Can Picafort or Port de Pollenca. Although we had a great time and would…

title: lovely stay, gluten free and veggie food a let down
review: Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic …. We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. . We take note of the negative points in order to improve them. . If you come back, do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Holiday
review: great location, clean, pools fantastic but cold in april. rooms clean and modern, could not fault. food excellent standard, only dropped 1 star as entertainment poor but I suppose was early in season. overall would highly recommend- we stayed in a royal terrace room on the top floor with hot tub and balinese bed, would be worth the extra in summer but weather wasnt great when we went so couldn't  really use them. has tennis court and different pool selections - caters for all ages.

title: Easter break
review: Fantastic Easter break. Couldn't faulth this hotel one bit. The manager tamou is spot on. Anytime I had a query or question he was always there to assist me. My little boy loved the playground and the kiddie pool.  Spa is great. Got a lovely massage with 50% off 😁.Al la carte food was nice. I loved the zafiro that much I decided to come back in August. But instead of staying in the tropic I'm staying in zafiro mallorca. Just for a change of location. Because the zapiro group will be great!!!

title: Great hotel and facilities
review: Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic …. We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon. Should you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact us. Kind regards.

title: Trapped in lift
review: Just returned from a great week at this hotel. Good location just 100 yds from beach. Room was clean with modern bathroom and kitchenette (didn't use as all inclusive) Staff were very friendly, accommodating and attentive. Pools were great however the water was freezing in main and put people off using them. Fortunately with it being early season children were allowed to use slightly warmer pool in adults only section. Plenty of choice for food if a little repetitive.  Only criticism is the lack of entertainment for kids 8 years plus, and 3 nights of week consisted of bingo. Not what I would expect from this type of establishment. Again, this may be due to early season however hotel was full so no excuse for that.

title: The best Buffet
review: Thank you for giving us such a good score and recommending our hotel Zafiro Tropic to other travellers. Our staff enjoyed attending your needs. Kind regards

title: Perfect facilities for Cycling Holiday
review: We have stayed in this hotel for 5 years. So we have liked it and it suited our needs. This year the room wasn't ready on arrival. Once ready there wasn't even a bottle of water in the room. It was tired with a rusting fridge. The lifts often didn't work and we became trapped in the lift (which was quite small) for over 45 minutes. Once finally rescued (We had to jump out as it was between floors) we didn't even get an apology from management. It is a real shame as we had liked the hotel and the waiting and cleaning staff are friendly.

title: Not up to scratch
review: Zafiro are normally great hotels this one needed re-painting ,the food was almost the same all week,which is unusual , not a great selection on dinner menu, waited to long for drinks and often given wrong drink, staff did not like customers going to bar

title: Will be back
review: Dear Raymond W, thanks for dedicating a few minutes to rate our hotel. We take note of the negative points in order to improve them. We apologise that your experience with us on this occasion was less than ideal, but we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future to restore your faith in the Zafiro Tropic. Regards.

title: Great second visit
review: Went to Mallorca on a cycling trip and stayed half board, the hotel was very clean and modern, the food was excellent and buffet style with some elements being prepared freshly in front of you. the staff are very friendly including front of house and cleaning staff. I kept my very expensive bike in the bike store which was very secure.  My only criticism is I prefer to pay as you go when it comes to paying for drinks from the bar and at meals, however these are charged to the room so keeping track of your bar tab can be a little problematic (I was mainly drinking coke light and only had a couple of alcoholic drinks)...  Hopefully I'll be returning next year

title: Good location
review: Dear Darren J.,  Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel Zafiro Tropic. We are proud that our clients‘ needs are attended in the best way. If you come back, do not hesitate to contact us.  Regards.

title: Perfectly run hotel!
review: We have just enjoyed our second visit here, despite unseasonably cold weather for our first two nights. Heated outdoor and indoor pools were wonderful and the apartment was spotless. We were worried to be in the room right above the entertainment, and at the start of the corridor of rooms but everything went quiet long before we had a chance to be disturbed. The TV played up, the hob didn't work but when everyone has a great time why not five stars?

title: Good location for cycling, good buffet restaurant
review: Good location for cycling. The hotel even has its own bicycle garage. The bufffet restaurant has a good choice of food with plenty of healthy options.  My only criticism is that there was only one small working washing machine leading to a long waiting time to wash sports clothes.

title: Amazing
review: Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort. Best regards.

title: Anniversary get away
review: we stayed here for 10 nights last year and my god what a place i would stay here ever time if i could the location is great the staff are great its very clean and the hotel has lots to offer i was very pleased with my stay abit gutted about the price now zafiro have taken over but all round an amazing place.

title: Everything was just beautiful.
review: Dear kyry1088,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.  Best regards.

title: Nice and quiet location
review: We stayed here at the end of February, first impressions were good and that never changed during our 3 day stay. The reception area was clean and really well presented, we checked in early and the room was clean and in good condition. The balcony was awesome and we loved every minute using it even the first 2 days raining we still used it Food was good and a great selection, not very busy but hat was just cause of time of year, in the summer this would be a very busy hotel. The bar area is the only place I would want to see an improvement in and it’s only one thing, the waiters/bar staff work at one pace and that is slow, you have to wait quite some time to be served and then to get your drinks and this was with only half a dozen people, would hate to see it when busy The resort…

title: Lovely hotel and a great holiday
review: We stayed in September last year, just after the school holidays. We had a ground floor room , near the adults only pool. No view to speak of but as a wheelchair user, nice and accessible and the kids come come and go as they pleased.  We were all inclusive and thought that the food and drink were excellent. Plenty of food choices to keep adults and kids happy and you could eat outside for lunch everyday, which we liked.  Drinks wise, loads of choices including cocktails and all served in good quantities and in proper glasses...including cocktails for kids. Food wise, good choices at breakfast....including an omelette station. Evening meals were good too...usually a decent range of choices.  We used all the different pools but the main pool is unheated so soon kids cool for…

title: Nice hotel with delicious food
review: Dear Mondayo,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards.

title: Ok hotel with the really great location
review: We spent one week at Zafiro Tropic in February 2018.We loved the food, plenty of options for fish lovers, meat eaters or vegetarians. We used the car rent via reception, very easy and good price. The indoor swimming pool was cold, but the  sauna was great.We also used the bike storage, but rented the light and easy bikes somewhere else. Minor things at the room to repair (fire alarm facing the bed is very annoying at night or shower door not full, so water was everywhere).Otherwise polite and nice employes.Would recommend!

title: girls hoilday
review: Dear Nela K, Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.  Best regards.

title: Great hotel in a good location
review: This hotel is a really big, but it also has a big pool area which is good (although water was quite gold). Our kids liked the pool area though they also complained about the cold water. However, this hotel gets my points mostly due to its really great location near the main beach, shops and restaurants (without them max. 3 stars). I could consider to be back some day.

title: Fantastic
review: This hotel has a fabulous location near to the beach, port, shops and restaurants. Being low season we were able to upgrade to the Royal Apartment with jacuzzi - money well spent. We were self catering and had lunch at the hotel once which was lovely. If going self catering you would struggle to cook a meal as there is no oven, 2 electric rings on hob and no power points at the kitchen, only one socket in the dining table. I wasn’t planning on cooking so no issue for us. The supermarket downstairs was reasonably priced and stocked essentials.  Rooms were spotless, cleaned with fresh towels and robes.  Facilities were great, indoor pool, choice of outdoor pools, bike hire, pistol/rifle shooting, mini golf, tennis, basketball all of which available without waiting maybe more so as…

title: Very good family hotel
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards.

title: Nice hotel but needs renovation
review: This is a very well run hotel located in the centre of Puerto de Alcudia.    The staff were always courteous and friendly.   The restaurant offered a wide range of different styles of plentiful food.    The link it has with SportActive cycling meant that we enjoyed a wonderful cycling holiday that met all our expectations.

title: Good family hotel.
review: Dear Eamonn C,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards.

title: Zafiro Tropic Saved our Holiday
review: Nice hotel with nice pools and very close to beach. We only had appartement with no meals. End of season. If you take premium appartement and want to sleep longer in the morning then do not take the ones on the fifth floor in building 1 facing the road (e.g. 1534) and because there is a large ventilation/air conditioning on the roof which can be disturbing during morning hours.

title: Good hotel with outstanding diners
review: We have enjoyed our stay in Zafiro Tropic. Outstanding food, allin service very good. If you want, you can book or upgrade a luxury room. Hygiene is important. Rooms are large. For disabled people too. Much entertainment for kids. Easy access to rooms and services by chip on wristband.

title: Perfect stay for the family!
review: Nice hotel and great location near the beach. We upgraded our room the last days, and we really liked the top floor with jacuzzi :)  Some few tings: *The elevators in the hotel were not top modern, and were not very gentle :) *The food could have been better, and we recommend restaurants in the old city, which was a really fantastic part of Alcudia.  Except for that, a very nice stay!

title: Fantastic holiday
review: We have had a fantastic stay in Zafiro Tropic. All in service and buffet is perfect. The staff of the Hotel is really fantastic and make your holiday extra special!! nice entertainment and good shows in the evening

title: Autumn in the Mediterranean
review: The hotel was perfectly located, within easy walking distance of both beach and harbour. The harbour area is full of shops, bars, cafes and restaurants offering plenty of options day and night.  The flat beach extends for miles and is perfect for swimming/paddling due to lake like conditions and gradually sloping bottom.  The hotel rooms were modern, clean & tidy and the facilities onsite catered for everyone's tastes. 4 pools (including 1 adults only and children's splash zone), gym,bar, evening entertainment and restaurant. In fact the food served cannot be faltered, the selection was endless, tasty and to a high standard.  All staff were friendly and happy to assist when required.

title: New to Family Holidays - Loved it!
review: Our first all inclusive holiday in Europe (we did one as a coupe in Mexico and that was brilliant) especially this holiday being a family holiday with a 3yr old daughter.  Mid September holiday so is after school holidays so not so busy but was full of like wise young families with children mostly under 5.  We only chose B&B and the breakfast buffet catered for all dietary requirements and there was a lot to choose from - great food and on board chefs to make food to your requirements also.  Different swimming pools for different ages (depths) and the kids area is really good fun for the kids (especially the park and bouncy castle).  Water is slightly colder than expected.  Nightly entertainment for the kids and shows in the evening - good fun and the noise only impacts the…

title: Another Great stay at Zafiro (viva) Tropic
review: This is our third stay at this great hotel, lovely friendly staff who can't do enough for you.  Food is fantastic and there is plenty of choice for everyone.  The accommodation could do with a little updating, but the its kept super clean by the staff and we spend most of our time at the beach.  The entertainment is ok and really good if you've got kids.  We will be back next year.

title: Not suitable for babies at this time of year!
review: We carefully thought about where we wanted to go on holiday with our 11month old baby for our first family holiday abroad- not too hot, good facilities and family friendly. We picked the tropic from some great reviews as we could get a 1 bed apartment in the hotel and upgrade on a daily basis to the food option we wanted or go out and explore the town if we were feeling adventurous. The room is great plenty of space for all of us and the travel cot, sliding doors to the seperate lounge for us to while away the evenings when the LO is asleep. The main problem is that we can't go swimming, all the pools are far far too cold! Travelling with a baby I have a infra red thermometer the max temp on the outdoor pool read 21°C and the indoor pool was 25°C this is too cold for adults let…

title: Fantastic staff
review: Dear TheStrooths,  Thank you for taking some time to write a detailed opinion about the Zafiro Tropic  hotel. All your comments are very important to improve our services. We will inform the staff about your complaints.   Best regards

title: Fantastic staff
review: This was our second stay at this hotel we stayed last year and decided to return as we really enjoyed our stay.  The staff are fantastic cannot fault them at all, the hotel is spotless and the food is of high quality.We asked for a pool view 1 bedroomed appartment, we did have a pool view pity it wasn't the Hotels pool.  We were given room 1418 which overlooked the road and was quite close to the main entrance of the hotel which meant we did get quite a bit of noise during the day and night from the coaches picking/dropping people off which did cause a couple of restless nights.  If you are a light sleeper like myself I had to resort to using ear plugs which did help. The only negative with the room was the noise from the coaches and other holiday makers when moving around in…

title: Great holiday
review: Me and my parents stayed in a royal terrace room for 1 week from September 6th-13th. This comes with good kitchen facilities, enough space for 4, a nice outdoor terrace with hammock and hot tub. The room is nice, but could maybe do with being updated a little, similar to some other parts of the hotel. The hotel is about 5-10 minutes walk from the beach. It's also a short walk from lots of bars and restaurants like D3 Lounge, Muddy's steakhouse on the sea front, or the old town which has a lot to offer.   Firstly, the staff here were incredible - notably Marga at the lobby desk as well as Ricardo, Saray, and Maria who are all part of the bar staff/waiting team. They were a big part of making this holiday as good as it was. The entertainment team were just as friendly as the bar…

title: Super family holiday in great location with super pools!
review: We had previously stayed at Zafiro (VIVA) Menorca in summer 2016, which was fabulous, and set the bar very high indeed. The all round holiday was brilliant for a family of 3. Hotel has fabulous facilities and the pools cater for all. All Inclusive was good, but Menorca was better. Entertain was good, again, could have been better for kids. The only minus we could find was the constant smoking around the pool, bar area and nightly entertainment - being non-smokers - this was annoying night after night! Super place for all age groups, though we preferred Menroca, personally.

title: Great Family Hotel
review: Just back and other than the "not so good" weather, we had a great holiday. We paid to upgrade on arrival so had a pool view apartment in the main building and as we were also all inclusive, we got the wrist band with the room entry chip - this was great, no key cards required, we also paid for the safe - surely these should be free for all inclusive guests?? A very well kept, clean hotel with fabulous facilities for kids. As an all inclusive guest, we had constant access to whipped style self pull ice cream, slush, bottled water, ice lollies and ice cream pots to name just a few, our daughter loved this, as did I! What I found mad was that no one manned this and so absolutely everyone regardless of what their board basis was, could access these, and certainly did. There was a…

title: Our Alcudia Holiday
review: Dear Nicola B,  Thank you for dedicating a few minutes to rate your experience at Zafiro Tropic We feel sorry about your experience with us. All your comments are very important to improve our services. We will inform the staff about your complaints.   Best regards

title: Really lovely hotel
review: We have visited Alcudia many times before but this time we booked a hotel that was very close to the Port.  We arrived around one o'clock in the afternoon and our room was ready. We had booked a 1 bedroom studio which had all the usual amenities plus microwave coffee machine and cooker hob. You could be self saficient in the room which was clean and tidy. We had a nice balcony from where we could see the mountains and the pools.  Going for lunch about 2pm we sat at the pool bar outside the hotel, all our food was cooked to order. The menus outside was good and included Salads Burgers Pizza and traditional Mallorca snacks too. We had booked All inclusive and so after lunch, we had cocktails from the extensive list. I recommend the majito!  Staff were very friendly and helpful but…

title: Very good 4 star hotel in a great location
review: Dear Marcus A,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.  Best regards.

title: Another great family holiday at Tropic
review: This is our third visit to this hotel in the last 6 years. We love the simplicity and ease of a holiday here with our now 5 and 7 year olds. The rooms are very simple. The food and hotel service is great. The pools are clean and the Pirate splash pool is perfect for little kids and keeps them entertained for hours.  The beach and local shops/restaurants are a short walk away. The childrens disco in the evenings is also a great treat for the kids. Overall we have really enjoyed our visits here.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Stayed in a one bedroom room spacious and clean. Balcony is large. No problem getting a sun lounger as there's a grassy area with extra loungers. The pools are never overly full due to all the kids on the bouncy ball pool. Food is amazing full of variety and we have very fussy eaters in our group. We went in August as a family of 4, all inc.  Staff are very helpful and friendly. We have been 2 years in a row which we don't normally do . It's a 5 min walk to the beach . I cant recommend this hotel enough, please if there are any negative comments please go and see for yourself , you won't regret it.

title: Couldn't ask for more!
review: Currently on my last day of a 9 night stay At this hotel with my boyfriend. From start to finish we have been so pleased with the hotel, location, service and facilities available. We chose self catering as we like to have flexibility with restaurants, but have eaten lunch in the pool bar a few times and have been impressed with the food. One downside is that you cannot pay cash anywhere in the hotel so it is settled when you depart, not an issue but just something to point out. The reception and general first impression of the hotel is stunning. By far one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in.  We have not had any issue getting sunbeds despite being late risers. The adult only pool is busy but we have been able to spend the day here most of our holiday. It's located next…

title: Great family holiday!
review: Dear hannahreid2017 Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.  Best regards.

title: Good family hotel
review: Visited the Zafiro at the end of August with my family (wife, 11 year old, 14 year old and myself) Hotel is well situated near local beach which is shallow for a long distance so safe for children. Also good fun feeding the mullets with bread as they swam around your feet. We were given a 1st floor room in the actual hotel which was great as not only do you get a decent sized apartment but a spacious patio containing  a personal hot tub, hammock, sun loungers and furniture! Almost a room in itself! Lovely to lie out here after the evening entertainment and look up at the stars with a glass in hand! pools are varied and of good standard with children's areas, pools of differing depths for family fun and an excellent adult pool for relaxation and tranquillity. The animation team…

title: Great hotel for kids...but not a 4 star hotel
review: I just had a 11 days staying in the deluxe swim up apartments. My sister was also staying at same hotel but in a standard 2bed apartment which could accommodate her family of 6(2 adults and 4 children). I paid £3000 more for my 2 bedroom apartment and really disappointed. It was not value for money!! My room was the furthest from the bar, restaurant and main pool and didn't get sun in the pool until early afternoon and no sun in the private garden area until late afternoon. Due to this I spent all my time in my sister private garden area that had sun most of the day. In my humble opinion the deluxe rooms are not worth the money unless u or kids want be away from the rest of the hotel and u don't mind shade!! The room service was ok but the toiletries are not what I would expect…

title: Excellent
review: We've just returned from our week in the hotel. We took 5 children in our party. The hotel offered activities for the whole family. The staff were friendly and the rooms clean. We was self catering, so had breakfast in our rooms and lunch by the pool which was reasonable and nice. Lots of local restaurants to choose room close by especially on the beach front. Highly recommended hotel !

title: Another great holiday at this fantastic hotel
review: Dear Sarah G,  Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are proud that our clients‘ needs are attended in the best way. If you come back, do not hesitate to contact us

title: Great family hotel with room for improvement
review: Back again at the Zafiro Tropic for the 4th year in a row. A fantastic 2 weeks, plenty of activities to keep us, a 17yr old daughter and my Mum happy. The sports team, Kris especially, were brilliant. Friendly, enthusiastic and doing a great job all round.   We prefer self catering, so can't comment too much on the food, but the lunches at the outdoor snack bar were reasonably priced and good quality. Friendly staff there too, as throughout the hotel.   The hotel is well located in the Port d'Alcudia area, with a large selection of restaurants nearby and 2 mins walk from the beach.   Would definitely recommend and we're hoping to book again tomorrow for next year.

title: Families, super attentive staff.
review: Dear jacks4too Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are proud that our clients‘ needs are attended in the best way. If you come back, do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Zafiro Tropic Great
review: Really good hotel, delicious rooms, lots of things to do, good service, very child friendly. We have now been to the hotel 3 times and will definitely be back again. The only negative is that there are too few sun loungers

title: 4.5 holiday - Great place in a great location
review: Dear brianlh342   Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort. Best regards.

title: Another excellent holiday here - 3rd year visit
review: Really enjoyable 10 day break which was just the right amount of time. Friendly staff and entertainment team. The rooms are a good size with great storage. Good choice of to channels too. With 6 pools for all different ages the place caters for everyone. The main restraunt is pretty much the same on all inclusive hotels but the pool bar food and drinks were excellent as were the ice creams available all day. Really enjoyable holiday even if we did get bit a few times - bring antihistamines! Would recommend especially with smaller children.

title: Holiday
review: Dear PDJ750 Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort. Best regards.

title: Enjoyable 10 nights
review: Visited here for the 3rd time and enjoyed it as much as we'd hoped. Love the adult only pool and special needs daughter enjoyed the mini disco. Staff all very friendly. Good choices available on the all inclusive options. Nice rooms. Plenty of choices on the buffet restaurant and nice breakfast choices. Close to a lovely beach

title: Familia Sellar
review: We have all got back from our holiday and we had a great time.  Many thanks to all the staff for making it really special. The facilities for the children were excellent and for the Adults just great.  Missing the bar staff already.

title: Fantastic
review: We (2 adults, 2 primary school age kids) returned for a second year to the Tropic, and although it is being rebranded from Viva to Zafiro the hotel was just as good as before. We were all inclusive and the food was fantastic, you have to get your room key scanned every time now when you order but this is OK.  The pools are great, rooms are plain but fully functional, and anyway you don't spend much time in the room when you are all inclusive in Majorca. Staff are all friendly - some more than others but you probably find the ones deemed less friendly probably struggle with the language so will be less chatty with us Brits. Yes the pool loungers get "bagged" early with towels but you name me a hotel where this doesn't happen. We had a great time and will seriously think about…

title: Excellent
review: Dear Andy S.,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards.

title: Amazing Food and Facilities
review: Returned to same hotel after 3-4 years with family because of a very good experience the first time. Pool areas clean and nice. Friendly staff, excellent entertainers/activity leaders. Restaurant is good  and rooms are cleaned at times to suit also us being late up in the morning. Go for the young reception staff if you want problems solved. We got into a tricky situation and needed top management help: Expectations exceeded and the hotel Director solved the situation in the most professional and best way possible. We will return to same hotel.

title: Excellent trip jet2 are amazing
review: We stayed here AI  when it was Viva Tropic. 2ad+2ch.  The food buffets were the best point for me. Wonderful choices for all meals and all of the chefs couldn't be nicer.  The pool choices were super and the main pool wasn't too deep so I was never overly concerned about the children going in by themselves. Always lots of water activities throughout the day organised by the animation team and included everyone, adults and children.  The children loved the jumping bubble pool the most, it kept them entertained all day long. The negative were the drunk male guests getting on it each afternoon and acting quite rough with all the children. The lifeguards need to be more strict.  Always something to do each day for everyone and the staff were lovely.  The reason I didn't give 5 stars…

title: Good family hotel, but room for improvement
review: We stayed here with our 5 and 2 year old children for a week in the middle of July. Because the schools where we live break up a week or so earlier than the rest of the UK, we found that most of the other guests were Dutch or German rather than English.  On arriving at the resort, we weren't able to check into our room which we were disappointed about. The girl who told us this wasn't very helpful or apologetic about it - despite the fact that check in was meant to be from 2pm and it was already 2pm! She tried to get us to pay for an upgrade to a more premium room which we turned down as it was going to cost another €400 for the week. So not a great start, but we decided to spend some time by the pool and managed to find stuff from our luggage to do so. We eventually got a call…

title: Summer Holiday
