review: We stayed at the Zafiro Tropica for a week all inclusive, the hotel is well positioned down a quiet side street. We had room 2005 which was brilliant as it had a large terrace which led directly to the poolside which was brilliant for the children. The food was always excellent and plentiful with a good choice of dishes. The only negative I could find was that the shower above the bath was pretty useless with not much more than a fast dribble coming out, but this was over dwarfed by all the positive points. We would definitely go back another year.

title: Depends what you are looking for
review: We read lots of great reviews about the hotel and the beach and were excited to come. While we agree with some aspects of these reviews, I wanted to note some other things that are not great, hoping that it will help other travellers.  The positives: 1. The staff are extremely nice and helpful no matter where you are at the hotel. This is just the way of the island. 2. The kids absolutely love this place. There is so much for them to do -- from the exciting pools, one of which has a pirate ship with slides, to the playground, the trampoline and miniature golf, they love this place. We haven't even tried out the kids club yet, but there are so many activities, you are guaranteed to be entertained all the time.  3. The location is pretty nice. You are within a 10 minute walk of…

title: Excellent
review: Just spent a week at Zafiro Tropic with wife and 2 children aged 12 and 14, in self catering deluxe apartment. Accommodation was perfect, staff friendly, helpful and courteous. Everything seemed immaculately clean. Kids Facilities brilliant. Pool areas super. Adult pool area nice however occasionally a stray under 18 would appear, but not a problem. Apartment was spacious with everything you need provided. We were self catering and didn't eat at premises so cannot comment on foods available. Entertainment was as you would expect. Signage stated that you were not permitted to leave towels on sun beds unattended for 30 minutes, if so towels would be removed by staff - most days there were numerous sunbeds left with towels with no one using them, and never seen staff remove any…

title: Holiday
review: Just got back from a week stay at this hotel, had a lovely room with a balcony with pretty views, think we may have been on a no kids floor as it was lovely and quiet, rooms were cleaned every day and fresh towels each day, bed was changed half way through the week,  Food was good there was plenty to chose from they always had salad buffet with a good choice of meat fish and cheese, they had a vegetarian section at the top of the hot section which was my choice each day, then there would be different selection of hot food to choose from, it was lovely but definitely not first class, there was always a good selection of pudding and fruit and cheeses, you won't go hungry,  The evening entertainment was good but always aimed for the children which was fine as I did enjoy watching…

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Myself my partner and 20 month old daughter stayed here for our first family holiday on the 21st June. On arrival the hotel was quiet as it was late. First impressions are stunning. We was in room 1427 which was a pool view room. When we got in our room there was a bottle of wine and food in the fridge. The room was big. The furniture was a little dated but don't forget that these are used by hundreds of people a month. On saying this the queen size bed was very comfortable the AC was cold and the bathroom had fresh towels Dailey if you left the dirty ones in the shower for the cleaners. The staff where brilliant with our daughter always made a fuss over her and any special request we had with food they tried to accommodate her needs. The pool bar food was amazing it was cooked…

title: Immaculately clean, loads of things to do
review: Dear casper55 Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are proud that our clients‘ needs are attended in the best way. If you come back, do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Great location
review: Went for a week, 2 adults & 16yr old, stayed in a one bedroom apartment with pool view, the whole place was kept immaculately clean, apartment of good standard, loads of sockets, wardrobe space, toaster, fridge & kettle in kitchen (washing up liquid & teatowel provided), tv with English channels (BBC, itv), massive comfortable double bed, pull out bed for child in main room easily fit 6ft child!...no matter how old the child or adult there was always something going on football, volleyball, shooting, water polo, archery, zorbs, aquafit, kids clubs, table tennis, pool table...you were not pestered to do anything..the reps work really hard.....the pools were brilliant especially the over 18 pool with the really comfy sunbed, and the inflatable dome pool which was brilliant fun, a…

Dear tangerinetracey Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic. We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon. Should you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact us. Kind regards

title: Great hotel
review: Came in July a week before the school holidays...  Great hotel and ammentites and a good location. Around 10 minutes to the beach and a few more to the port area.  The pools are fabulous with kids pools a plenty. Also plenty of ongoing kids activity from face painting, discos and treasure hunts. Evening entertainment was very good.  Had a few problems with the room but as a gesture of good will had dinner at the hotel and letter from the manager. So this was satisfactory to us for the issues.  I was a bit disappointed with the 'sunbed' towel game. There is a policy in place that is not enforced unless you ask.  Some beds had towels sunbathing all day long   I removed some towels and had to challenge certain sunbed game heroes.  I think the idea is if you can't beat them then…

title: 3rd visit amazing
review: Me and my partner have stayed at this hotel for the past 3 years and have rebooked for 2018 the hotel is lovely the staff work so hard and go above and beyond to ensure you are having a great holiday rooms are spacious and comfy hotel grounds are great we used the over 18 pool most days although i wish people wudnt bring there children in to the pool as they have 4 others they cud use a few teenagers were in there i wish that cud be monitored a bit more as its a relaxing area this isnt a fault of the hotels tho a big thank you to all the staff for a lovely holiday cant wait till next year ps went all inclusive food and drink amazing

title: Lovely
review: Dear Jody R.,  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.   Best regards.

title: first summer holiday as a couple! :) amazing!
review: Wow, what a wonderful hotel. Reception staff very efficient and helpful Bar staff and waiters cheerful and friendly and extremely hard working, but always have the time to acknowledge you. The rooms very spacious and cleaned daily. Housekeepers very friendly. Good choice of food, lots of variety. Tasty too. The chefs do an excellent job. I cannot really comment about the entertainment as we tended to go out most nights, but judging from the laughter the children's entertainment was good. We would stay here again

title: Great family hotel
review: Me and my boyfriend (22 & 25) were looking to book our first summer holiday as a couple. Zafiro tropic looked appealing to us due to the fact it looked spacious and in a very good location.  Upon arrival we were greeted by Toni, which in previous trip advisor comments people had said he was very rude and not helpful at all, not in our case. He was very pleasant and welcoming to us which was definitely a very good start to our holiday. The staff behind reception were also very polite and spoke very good english and helped several times when it came to booking taxis. A trip to the old town is must, very quiet and beautiful.  Our room 1310 was exactly what we needed for our holiday. We went self catering so the room had all facilities such as a coffee filter machine, toaster,…

title: Not very impressed...
review: Dear tasha_amie11,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. We are happy to know that our staff at Zafiro Tropic did its best for you to have an enjoyable stay. We invite you to follow us on Facebook and Twitter since we post some promotions which could be of your interest. Hope to see you soon.

title: Brilliant holiday
review: Wow what a fantastic place - we had the best time ! Went with a 5 year old boy and 7 month baby and stayed in a 2 bed swim up apartment . Apartment was pretty basic but had everything you need and the garden out to the swimming pool was lovely and quiet  This was a great all singing and dancing hotel but with quiet spots aswell if you wanted. The pools were brilliant and all the food was really good too . 5 year old went to the kids club once but with so much going on in the hotel and at the beach ( he loved all the rides at the port ) he didn't need to go much  We would have loved to re-book for summer hols but it's really expensive . We looked around and noticed that viva sunrise is a bit cheaper (top tip !) so have booked that for August . We have stayed at zafiro palace but…

title: AMAZING PLACE!
review: Dear Jodie M,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences with us. We are happy to know that our staff at Zafiro Tropic did its best for you to have an enjoyable stay. We invite you to follow us on Facebook and Twitter since we post some promotions which could be of your interest.   Hope to see you soon.

title: Wonderful Stay Again
review: Me and my family have gone to Zafiro Tropic on vacation 4 years in a row now. It's an amazing place, and it's very family friendly. it has also so many activities, and there are some amazing shows at night. So try Zafiro next time you're going on vacation.

title: Just Amazing!! Great hotel for Families!!!
review: Second visit to the Zafiro (Viva) Tropic. Friendly and helpful staff good food and a wonderful time had by all. As ever my 3 year old son loved seeing Bufo. This is my 3rd stay at one of their hotels and I'm never disappointed. Thank you to all at the Tropic

title: Fantastic holiday
review: We are only back a few days from Alcudia. Our experience at the Zafiro Tropic was the best, we would go back in a heart beat. From the moment we arrived at check in to check out. We loved our pool view apartment in block 3 room 3103 it was just perfect for a family of 4. We were able to see stage area and all the pools from our balcony. We had sun alot of the day from 1st thing in the morning for breakfast. We stayed SC but we did eat in the restaurant one night and the food was fabulous and very reasonable. The staff were all lovely especially in the restaurant for dinner at night and at the reception where i met them most. The location was perfect for us we were very central to everything. 5 minutes walk to the beach(Best way when you come down the road from the reception at…

title: Family holiday
review: Currently staying here all inclusive and can't fault anything.  It's not too busy. The pools are enjoyed by me, my husband, my son 11 and daughter 18 who's with her partner.  The staff work extremely hard to  ensure our stay is fantastic. The all inclusive food is the best we've had......We've stayed 3 times all inclusive in majorca before! Breakfast is buffet from 7am until 10am then we've eaten at the pool bar for lunch. They serve burger and fries, pasta dishes, pizzas, beautiful salads and a full range of drinks to suit all, from beers to cocktails, wines, spirits, coffees, soft drinks and tea! For breakfast and dinner it in the main restaurant, there is a great selection for even my fussy son!  Literally about 5 minutes walk to the beach!  So friendly, and the staff aim to…

title: What a fabulous hotel for families
review: Dear Mr./Mrs Louise J  Thank you for your comments and for choosing our hotel Zafiro Tropic We are happy that you have enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at our resort.  Best regards.

title: june 2017
review: Currently here at the Zafiro Tropic in Alicia and just coming to the end of 7 fun filled days with the family.   There are 10 of us here in total, 6 adults nd 4 kids and every single one of us he had a fabulous time.  Ok so the hotel itself looks a little dated, a quick lick of paint would solve this in a flash. We arrived last Sunday and greeted at reception by a lovely man. He was interested in us as a family and interacted with the kids asking them about football. We were even upgraded for free which was a lovely bonus!   The room was a deluxe apartment so we had a big bathroom, lounge  a dressing area as well as a double balcony! The room was clean and everything was in working order. No complaints barr the pillows were not very comfortable.  We were hoping for some…

title: Wonderful facilities for children
review: Dear Mr./Mr. Helen J,  Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic. We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon. Should you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact us.   Kind regards.

title: TERRIBLE SERVICE from desk manager MOLD ON ROOM
review: My family and I have visited this wonderful hotel for a FIFTH time. The food variety was Great  led by the wonderful Head Chef and I do not know how he keeps so many guests happy. For dining the waiting staff are led by the great Restaurant Manager.The waiting staff  are always available to help . In our party my sister in law was in a wheelchair and they reserved a table for all of us to fit in to make sure she could get and look at the food on offer. Despite a HUGE thunderstorm on the Monday evening into Tuesday the staff at the Hotel worked hard to clear the water around the Hotel. Summing up as I have said on my previous review if you want the best come to this Hotel ....Already looking forward to coming back soon.

title: Great family hotel
review: Stayed here recently with my wife and daughter (almost 3 years old) and we had a great time - it really is a great family hotel. Here's an overview:  Room - We originally booked a premium studio but had doubts about the size and also the view (based on previous reviews). On arrival we were told that the studios overlooked the road and as we didn't want this we immediately upgraded to a 1 bed apartment overlooking the pools. We had room 1443 which overlooked all pools. The room itself was nice and spacious and got the sun late afternoon. The only thing we would have changed is having a bath rather than just a shower.  Pools - The kids splash pool is excellent, a few slides and very shallow water, perfect for what we needed. It also had a playground in the same area (with a…

title: Amazing hotel and entertainment
review: Dear Mr./Mrs Sperks,  Thank you for your comments about Zafiro Tropic. We are very happy to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you back soon. Should you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact us.  Kind regards.

title: Good but had a few problems
review: We are just at the end of our amazing holiday for the second time in the formally known viva tropic now zafira tropic.  This hotel does not disappoint in any way at all. We are a family of 6 with children aged 15,12,10 & 4.  Entertainment is absolutely outstanding from 10am until 10pm, lots of choice for all ages. Adults 16+ are of the same variety and plentiful.  We previously did stay all inclusive but on this visit didnt. We wanted the variety to go out and explore alcudia which has some really nice restaurants and beautiful views along the sea front.  Lots of money has been invested since we were last here with now 7 pools, apart from 1 all children friendly (18+). We have not felt the need to go out as there is enough here to entertain any age from morning until night. …

title: Nice family hotel
review: When we booked the hotel we were told we could choose a room with either bath or shower so we told our travel agent we needed a bath because my 3 year son is terrified of showers. We get to the hotel and we are given a room with a shower. I explained our situation to reception who didn't care and said they had plenty of bath rooms available but we'd have to pay €200 extra for an already expensive holiday we just couldn't afford it. After 4 days of my son screaming when he went into the shower and deeply distressed to the point where one day he ran out slipped and hurt himself  (again told the hotel they didn't care) I ended up bathing him in the sink. Day 8 of our holiday my son got poorly with ear infection and sickness (we strongly suspect the pool as 24 hours before it was…

title: Another Great Holiday ..thank you to everyone at Viva Tropic :))
review: Dear, Mrs Michaela.      Thank you for your opinion about the Zafiro Tropic hotel. We have informed the staff. We apologies, we are very disappointed so we ask you for another opportunity to demonstrate we are able to improve.   Best regards.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: This is the second time we've been here and on both occasions it was fantastic, the food is great and with so much choice you cannot fail to find something to enjoy the staff are very friendly and the activities for the kids were non stop. Hope to return soon 😎

title: Lovely friendly hotel
review: l When we stayed at this hotel  it was called the Viva tropic but i find it listed under Zafiro Tropic hope it is the same hotel.We had a studio it was very neat and compact although there was lots of room. A fully fitted kitchen with micro wave and fridge and enough utensils for three people. A lovely modern shower room flat screen tv and a nice small table and two comfy type armchairs. Lots of English programmes on t.v.  We found the staff to be very polite and helpful . The standard of cleanliness was second to none. There was also a small supermarket within the hotel. The Hotel was situated very close to the beach, shops and bus routes.  I would highly recommend this Hotel a must for families with young children as there was an abundance of pools and swing parks to keep them…

title: Nice hotel and good for kids
review: Dear Maria,  Thank you for your positive review. We suppose that you’ve enjoyed your stay and service in our Hotel, and we hope to see you again at Zafiro Tropic soon.  Best wishes

title: Great place for our 3 yr old
review: We stayed here on a room only basis in one of the Royal terrace rooms with a hot tub. It is a nice hotel with great facilities for kids. The room was nice, it's a good size and the deck is really spacious and great for toddlers. Only criticisms would be that the hot tub was cold when we arrived and the next morning. The rooms are cleaned most days but it's a very mediocre clean/tidy and could be better. The staff are nice and the food from what we had was good. Great location! Around the corner from the beach, shops and restaurants. Good base for the ironman too

title: Excellent triathlon base
review: Our 1 bedroom apartment unfortunately at the back of the resort and so was a bit noisy with bins being emptied, road and dogs over the road barking. Got woke up one morning at 6.30 because of deliveries/bin men but was only one morning. I realise it's not the hotels fault for the barking dogs, but maybe next time they refurbish they could do thicker Windows to keep out noise. It's not noisy all the time though and the road is not that busy.  That said, the rooms are nice and beds comfortable. Cleaning staff are great and very friendly.   My son had a great time and the facilities are great, the buffet is really nice and great quality food. We didn't go all inclusive, but decided to eat at the buffet because it looked so nice.  The pool area and the children's areas are fantastic…

title: A nice hotel, all inklusive, lots of kids, but a nice place and pool area
review: We like the hotel, the service was good. The room was bigger than we thought, towards the pool area, and had separate bedroom, and balcony with 2 chairs and table. Sofa bed in sitting room for extra guests (children) and a kitchenette. The food was all fine, we had Club sandwich / Pizza / or wraps at the pool restaurant most days, very good. The dinner buffet was big and colour full, and healthy and something for everybody. There is a Relax area for over 18+, with big double soft matress sun beds. But it was placed to next the play area, so relax, no, only with ear plugs. A Kitchen drawer fell to the floor, but was fixed the same day.

title: Great hotel and location
review: Dear Rooty2013, We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as they help us to improve. The staff is pleased that you have enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you soon. Best regards.

title: Don't book this hotel. Pictures lies!
review: We stopped at the Viva Tropic as it was called then in April this year. On arrival we were worried as the room we were initially given overlooked the road. We weren't worried about this but could not stand the constant barking of a dog in the opposite apartments. Before unpacking we went to reception and explained we were not happy with the room because of the barking dog. The manager was brilliant and arranged to move us and even upgraded us to the pool view room. This room was much better, a lovely view and nice and quiet. If looking for a quiet room ask for something in block 2, even if you don't get a pool view room, the other side overlooks the mountains. Avoid the road facing rooms above reception if possible! ROOM - The room was great, nice and clean. Basic cooking…

title: Fantastic!
review: Dear Absdabs05,  We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as they help us to improve. The staff is happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you soon.  Best regards.

title: Great
review: We have just stayed here for 6 days and we aren't pleased with this hotel at all. Its a 4+star hotel, and for us its much lower standard! The aircon is terrible! Its so hot at night so we can't sleep. If we have the window up we're getting a lot of mosquito bites. The aircon can't go lower than 24 degrees (!). We have the evening sun on our terrace (block 3, not faceing the poolarea), so the appartment is really hot when its nighttime. When you head out from the shower you feel more sweat then before you showered! No place to cool down before you dress youreself!  The aircon is also very noisy. Even though its on, its not coming out any cold air. Its sound almost like been onboard a ferry..   And then we have the poolbar. We have eaten there two times. The food is bad and…

title: Very Nice
review: Just arrived home from a week at the Viva Tropic. On entering the Hotel, first impression, very nice, clean and tidy. Check in was very quick, although our room was not ready they quickly allocated us another. Staff very nice, polite and helpful. Room was basic, but clean, twin beds, balcony. 2 ringed hob, kettle, coffee maker and toaster. Pool area was nice, but you couldn't swim, the water was ice cold and I mean Ice cold!! We went to the chill out pool, where in the brochure, it states adults only. However, children were in there and also it was right next to a children's play area so you couldn't really chill!!! We were SC but did have Breakfast one morning, 16E Each, as much as you want but it wasn't the best and not that hot. Apart from that, overall, a nice hotel.

title: Lovely Stay for Our Honeymoon
review: Myself my Wife and two year old daughter stayed at the viva tropic for a week, after reading such good reviews I was eager to see if the Hotel lived up to its name.  We were not disappointed the staff were really friendly, the room was a good size cleaned every day and had a nice view of Alcudia.  We didn't eat in the hotel so can't really comment on that, We ate at such lovely restaurants during our stay. The hotel was really busy during our stay due to the cycling event taking place at the weekend but we didn't mind as there was always something for us to do and always beds free when we went to sit by the pool and sunbathe. We really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it to anyone and we would happily stay again and go back to Alcudia!

title: Good standard hotel
review: Had a wonderful 5day stay here in a royal terrace apartment on the top floor. Room came with rooftop terrace with hot tub and full loungers and furniture to use. Really good quality rooms and hotel facilities. Very good reasonable priced shop in the hotel where you can buy everything you need for breakfast and things if you are self catering as we were. Toni the manager was excellent. Lovely man and sorted small issues without any fuss. Beer is too expensive in the bar at night at 4.50 a pint for local beer which we found a tad too much to be fair but hey ho we went out most nights anyway to sample the wonderful restaurants in the port area. The adult pool is heated slightly and this helped as due to the time of year the other pools were too cold to use really. The kids club is…

title: Great hotel at a reasonable price
review: Dear Bobthestag,  Thank you for your positive review. We suppose that you’ve enjoyed your stay and service in our hotel.  We hope to see you again at Zafiro Tropic.  Sincerely yours.

title: Great atmosphere
review: I just came back from my second stay at Viva Tropic and I had good experience. Check-in was done in less than three minutes and check-out was less than one minute (we had settled the room charges the day before). The cleaning staff was effective and helpful. My premium room was on the ground floor with direct access to the pool area. The room was in need of some maintenance. The gate lock to the pool was completely rusted shut and we had to climb/jump over the gate (about 50 cm) to get out. Something was wrong with the entrance door so you had to apply a lot of pressure to open or close it. An elderly person would probably not have been able to do it without help.  The food at the hotel restaurant was not really that good but it did not bother us as the town offers many other…

title: Very good hotel
review: We recently spent 4 nights in self catering accommodation at Viva Tropic. It is a beautiful hotel, excellently located in Alcudia, and accommodation and pool areas are of a very high standard. Staff we met were mostly friendly and attentive (especially Veronica the pool lifeguard). We didn't eat in the hotel as there are plenty of bars and restaurants nearby. Two small criticisms. We asked 2 days prior to departure if we could pay to keep our room as we had a late night flight. We were told to check the next day, which we did, and again were told to come back later as they couldn't tell us at that time. Unfortunately eventually we were told we could not keep the room as the hotel was too busy. It is such a big hotel, and did not appear to be full (third week in April), so I…

title: Easter Break
review: Dear Maria,  Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and sharing your experiences at Zafiro Tropic. We careful take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion. We hope that the next time you can rate us better. Sincerely yours.

title: Great accommodation, Great service
review: Arrived to find a very friendly but busy hotel with more children than expected especially in the adults only areas apparently due to the coldness of the main pool!! However it was Easter and the hotel was virtually full. Lovely room and spacious balcony clean and quiet at night. All drinks etc are put on your room card and bill settled on leaving making it slightly hard to budget if a keen eye not kept on receipts. Spa was excellent and indoor pool although closed for 2 days was a bonus. A good family hotel.

title: Really enjoyed our break
review: This was our second visit to the Viva Tropic having previously stayed there 3 years ago. I gave it a positive review before, but wanted to review again as I think their service had got even better. The hotel accommodation was clean and spacious, we had a one bedroom apartment with a sofa bed in the living area. Everything worked as it should and it was peaceful at night. The staff were all friendly and the service efficient. The hotel is located within ten minutes flat walking of Port D'Alcudia and less than a mile from Alcudia town. It has an excellent and free storage facility for bikes - which can take over 200. We got a 'deal' though one of the hotel websites that made the stay particularly good value for money.

title: Pool and beach
review: Dear client, Thank you for your positive review. We suppose that you’ve enjoyed your stay and service in our Hotel, and we hope to see you again at Viva Tropic soon.  Sincerely yours

title: Relaxing April break
review: Great location hotel is close to beach, marina and beatiful old town of Alcudia.   Hotel spotlessly clean and upgrade to royal terrace with Bali bed and hot tub on the roof terrace which had stunning views around the bay was worth every penny! Wifi good and available throughout hotel.  Lots to do for children most appeared to be younger, ours are 13 and 11 but still enjoyed tennis, football, mini golf and table tennis. Shame the tennis net stayed up most of day, it would have been a good idea to allow half day for tennis then take net down for half day as kids flocked to play football when the kids entertainer did take it down. The adult only pool was heated with lovely comfy huge double loungers around it, kids were aloud in due to hotel being quiet during day and main pools…

title: Once bitten......
review: Dear SuzanneandMark,   Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and sharing your experiences at Viva Tropic.  We take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion, so next time you can rate us better.  Sincerely yours.

title: Great fun hotel
review: I'm sorry to have to rate this resort so poorly ,as it has many good points as detailed by other reviewers .Excellent kids activities delivered non stop by a great team, Nice pool areas and all areas  maintained to a high standard by a large cleaning staff.However........ The "De luxe apartments "were to a low standard ......small ,gloomy with brown laminate flooring  and with no ventilation in the bathroom  ( only 1..no ensuite ) .The chairs and couch were grubby ,the kitchen table was tiny and there was insufficient cutlery and Delph.We were not on the inclusive package and I can only conclude most guests are ,as the room is not an easy one to sit in ,never mind eat .As a family of 5  we were falling over each other but the worst was still to come .... We enjoyed daytime…

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear DDHAWK1,  I'm very sorry that the stay in the hotel was not to your pleasure. We are very grateful for your comments and suggestions since they help us to improve.  It would be our pleasure to see you again at our hotel in order to change your opinion.   Sincerely yours.

title: Bonza!!!!
review: Pretty, central with a lot of amenities and activities. Rooms great, nice balconies. Very noisy from the pools, ask for rooms away from pool. Not good noise isolation in rooms. Very uncomfortable mattresses and pillows. Supermarket with good prices on the premise, nice spa. In general recommend it.

title: 3rd Visit...time for a change
review: Don't get me wrong, this isn't an average hotel but it is no longer a 4/5 rated stay location. The good points are still good - friendly staff; good sized rooms offering reasonable comfort and kept meticulously clean throughout, facilities and services such as kids club and mini disco continue to be a winner. The use of adults pool for the kids to swim in at the start of April is also well considered by the hotel due to this being the only outdoor heated pool. Prices remain competitive for an hotel. Right now to the issues as we saw them first problem, we had requested a quiet room and for the third time we were put in a room on the 4th floor in the main block, after last year's pool view we were back overlooking the road this stay. Located above the dustbin store and near to…

title: Excellent hotel
review: This hotel is in a perfect location not too far to walk to beach and close to restaurants and shops. Outside and inside areas all clean nice pools plenty to do for families. We booked 2 studio apartment in the 3rd block . Large rooms and balconies small kitchenette large bathroom plenty of storage and hot water. The maid came in 5 out of 7 days . Very clean on arrival also had a safe which you pay for . Excellent wifi throughout the hotel and in the rooms and it was free. Even worked 2 streets away. All the staff from reception through to maids were very polite and always greeted you . Can not comment on food because we ate out all the time . Would definitely go back here and recommend it to any age group from singles to older people as it is flat outside .

title: family Fun
review: Dear client,  Thank you for your positive review. We suppose that you’ve enjoyed your stay and service in our Hotel, and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely yours.

title: Lovely, clean and great location
review: Great staff, good hotel. Doesn't look much from the outside but clean and well maintained inside. Kids club is well run and the entertainment is good. Plenty of pools to choose from including a kiddys splash pool with a pirate ship. They children loved it as did the wife and I.

title: Not a 4 star hotel
review: Dear R1058XXmartinc,  Thank you for your positive review. We suppose that you’ve enjoyed your stay and service in our Hotel, and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely yours.

title: Great family hotel lovely rooms, great location.
review: This is a great family hotel. The rooms are great. Really comfy beds and clean. Kids club is good and entertiNs kids. Bike facilities, storage and access to hire bikes is really good. Location is fantastic, not rar to the beach and easy to oak your car, this is our 8th time here, it really is  a great place to stay.

title: Amazing visit
review: Dear Karentriannswim,  Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and sharing your experiences at Viva Tropic.  We careful take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion.  We hope that the next time you can rate us better. Sincerely yours.

title: Good Stay
review: Very children friendly with facilities catered for children and adults alike. Food was well supplied with excellent choice of healthy options. Even have non-dairy variety of milk and the hotel has a good allergy policy.   Apartment is very comfortable with good facilities. The balcony was a nice touch and great to have a place for alfresco lunch. Also the hotel has various recycling points, which is pleasing to see.  The only short fall? The heated pool and the indoor pool, where the water is a little cold for me.  We will come back again next year!

title: Great springtime break
review: Dear Mrs. Chesham,   We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day. We are very pleased that you enjoy your stay at our hotel.  We hope to see you again. Best regards.

title: Good cycling base hotel
review: Stayed here for 6 days on a spring getaway. Can't fault the hotel at all we did self catering si cannot comment in the food.   Clean tidy and very comfortable beds.   The quite big downside of those hotel is that there was even morning from about 6am several dogs barking constantly at the Base of the hotel and they would not stop. Nothing really the hotel can do about this as it's not there fault but worth mentioning if you want a lie in or not be woken at 6 am probably best ask to not be on that side of the hotel as you'll always be woken !!

title: Fantastic
review: We went to relax and chill out and we did exactly that hotel was beautiful clean and staff were fab could not fault this hotel or the area and location one little bit the facilities were overall top notch would really recommend this hotel to anyone

title: Fantastic out of season
review: Dear William,  Thank you for your positive review. We suppose that you’ve enjoyed your stay and service in our hotel. We hope to see you again at Viva Tropic.  Best regards.

title: All included in Alcudia
review: We stayed four nights at the end of February as a family and booked a first floor royal terrace room direct with the hotel. Fantastic outside area with sunbeds, hammock, eating area and a wonderfully maintained hot tub. The inside apartment space could maybe do with a spruce up but the bedroom was lovely and the bed itself was comfy. Everywhere inside and outside was clean, as were the hotel grounds. The indoor pool was a hit as it wasn't too deep and had areas for bubbles and jet sprays. The peak season outdoor 'adults only' pool was heated and because of the time of year was available to all - never seemed busy and was a wonderful contrast when the weather did get a little chilly. Wifi was free and coped with streaming youtube while the large flat screen tv had bbc world, bbc1…

title: Short break
review: Dear Richard,  We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as they help us to improve our work every day. Both staff and me (Manager) are very pleased that your stay at our hotel has been good. We hope to see you next year.  Thank you and best regards.

title: Cyclists Paradise
review: Took a long weekend break. Alcudia is a 50 minute drive from Palma Airport, which was pleasant enough as the roads are good. Arrived at hotel and checking in was relatively quick and simple. The hotel was nice enough from the outside and the lobby was clean, bright and air-conditioned. The receptionist was friendly and spoke good English. Our rooms were on the fourth floor and there were three elevators, all working. I think all the rooms are for self-catering and come equipped with a small kitchen - two ring hob, microwave, kettle and fridge, with freezer compartment. The lounge are had a bed settee, which had seen slightly better days, coffee table, TV unit and TV, plus a storage unit/wardrobe. The bedroom had two single beds pushed together and built in wardrobe. All the…

title: Some good and some bad....
review: Stayed at the hotel during a family trip at Alcudia. We checked-in to a double bed room with balcony and mini kitchen. We stayed for 3 nights.  Location - Very good location. Short walk away from the beach and restaurants. Parking is adequate - both along the road outside and at an open parking space.  Room - comfortably spacious inside and balcony was also spacious. Bathroom was quite large too. Cleanliness is good. BUT the bed was terrible! The mattress was old, creaks, and poor quality. After the first night, i woke up the next morning with a sore back. The mattress was so poor that it sinks in the middle. Also had some funny smell. Was talking to one of the visitors during checkout, and she had the same complain about the bed. Furnitures in the room are also old and worn…

title: Great spot for kids
review: Dear Victor,  Thank you for your time in rating and sharing your experiences at Viva Tropic.  We take note of the points we must improve in order to get a better opinion in the future. Hope to see you again.  Sincerely yours, Pep Escalas

title: Balls to it...we're going back April 2017 for 3rd stay
review: Very clean , excellent food , good kids entertainment. The new rooms in block 4 are the best. Very busy but they coped well and it didn't feel crowded. Short walk to a very nice beach. Everyone on the trip wanted to book again before we left. I suppose that's the test. The only minus was the kids machines out of order all the time and eating your money. Apparently they are owned by another company but that didn't make the kids any happier.

title: Great family hotel
review: After staying in the Viva Palma Nova; Viva Blue  and Viva Tropic (twice) we have just booked for another 8 night stay in April 2017....despite having 3 weeks booked in Orlando in the Summer, we just couldn't resist returning once again to a great hotel in one of our favourite places in the world. Already planning where to eat during our stay...but when it comes to accommodation, well, its simple! Viva Tropic all the way! See you in April 2017 (again) The Hopkinson's

title: brilliant
review: Brilliant hotel to stay very clean and staff very friendly. Food was excellent.The only bad thing was could not get a sunbed around the pool all beds had towels on them. Excellent activities on every day.

title: Cycle holiday
review: Great hotel,only complaint was had to get staff to turn on sauna and steam room,and would turn of to quick,food was good and good variety ,pity had to pay for drinking water in dining room,staff friendly , had to pay for safe in room  bit mean,

title: great hotel and Alcudia is beautiful !!
review: Dear client, Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and share your experiences at Viva Tropic. We careful take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion. We hope that the next time you can rate us better. Sincerely yours,

title: Good family hotel and good location
review: went here in June with my partner the staff are very nice and my room was cleaned every day to a high standard , the food is great , the pool are very nice and there is entertainment all day and night if you wish to participate , hotel is in perfect location just a 2 minute walk the road to beach wich has lovely white sand and clear sea reminded me of Mexico to be honest , also just a 5 minute walk to the port were all the restaurants and clubs are , holiday has perfect for us .

title: Great family hotel!
review: We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day.Both staff and I (Manager) are very pleased that your stay at our hotel has been to your liking. We hope to see you next year. Best regards

title: Mallorca Stay at Viva Tropic
review: Second time at a Viva hotel.  We came as family of 4 (2 kids aged 6 and 8) with out friends next door of similarly aged family. It was mid-October.  We had a one bedroom apartment (de-lux or superior can't recall). Room was presentable enough. Living room area quite small, not sure what was superior or delux. But adequate as you really only want a place to sleep when on holiday.  Adults slept in room and the couch in living room area converts into a bed and another bed pulls out for the kids. Small kitchen facilities in open plan living room.  Kettle, microwave, hob, sink, small fridge.   Weather was around 25 degrees and sunny.  Occasional overcast and rained on last day.  Great for mid-October compared with sunny Scotland!   Small niggles:   fridge was struggling to maintain…

title: Great service
review: We stayed as a family of 3(10yr boy)sadly for just 3 nights just wish it was longer we booked a 1 bedroom with a pool view,nice but looked slightly dated very minor criticism,we very well looked after by the reception staff.close to shops cafes and marina.our son loved the pools especially the bouncy dome pool,all in all a very good stay just a bit to short

title: Good Hotel
review: We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day.Both staff and I (Manager) are very pleased that your stay at our hotel has been to your liking. We hope to see you next year. Best regards

title: Great base for Cycling Holiday's
review: Went for 7 days 6 nights mid October. Hotel was very clean and all out door area's were also clean and tidy. We got up graded on arrival to a room on 3rd floor overlooking all pools and had a good view. Hotel is only one road back from lovely white sand beach so a good position. We were room only so did not use main restaurant but it looked very nice. Hotel has one of 4 pools that was adult only which had nice double sun beds with curtains which was nice, only problem was on second day they opened this area for kids as well so lost piece and quite. So used beach from then onwards. But did like the layout of hotel grounds.

title: Good hotel, Royal Terrace Room good for baby
review: Dear Guest              We are very pleased that your stay in our hotel has been to your liking. We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day.  It will be a pleasure to see you at Viva Tropic next year

title: Wonderful for kids
review: Have stayed here several times now, most recently Oct 2016. Fantastic hotel, v friendly & helpful staff, great buffet food in the restaurant !!! Rooms comfortable, Spa very welcome after a hard day on the bicycle. Used the hotel as base for a 5 day cycling trip, using the bike hire service from the Viva Cycle Station which is on the hotel premises. It ticks all the boxes, that's why we keep returning. Highly Recommended !

title: Great Hotel - Would go back
review: This is a great hotel. We stayed for 4 nights at the end of September and found it to have everything we need really.  Room We had a standard room which over looked the main entrance/road/pool at the opposite accommodation. We liked this as it was quiet. The kitchen is small and set into the wall but had everything we needed. The bathroom was quite modern and has some miniatures and essentials which was great. Our shower head was a bit dodge (water only came out of one side) but it was workable and I didn't want to move rooms so didn't report it. We tired the air con but it didn't seem that cool. Not sure whether this was to do with the time of year and it being unavailable maybe? The TV was great and had quite a few UK channels (BBC, ITV, kids and music channels).   Pools…

title: " EXCELLENT HOTEL , AMAZING ,WONDERFUL HOLIDAY "  SEPTEMBER 2016
review: Dear client, Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and share your experiences at Viva Tropic. We careful take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion. We hope that the next time you can rate us better. Sincerely yours

title: Great place for kids between 2 and 10 when going halfboard
review: Very nice hotel , very friendly and great for everyone , we had all inclusive and the food was excellent . All the  staff were so very nice and friendly , the barman Ricardo was excellent and hope he is there next year , and the waiters and waitresses too ,  we were so impressed . Thank you very much . The room was kept clean by Carmen she was lovely and friendly and  did an excellent job Thank you   Hope to see you next year  .

title: IRONMAN Family
review: We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day.Both staff and I (Manager) are very pleased that your stay at our hotel has been to your liking. We hope to see you next year. Best regards

title: Good family holiday
review: We've spent 2 weeks in this hotel with our 2 year old. The kiddy paddling pool with slides was a big hit with her and my husband :) There is a playground with a couple of slides, seesaw and trampoleen, as well as a bouncy castle, to tire your little ones before bedtime. There is another slow slope pool where at 10 am they hold water aerobics, and the rest of the day kids can paddle in on inflatables or partake in various water-entertainment. On top of that there is a pool with a bounce-ball, two deep pools and adult only pool, with tinkly music and soft loungers. At 8 pm every evening there is minidisco for your little ones to have a dance and bounce for an hour. Right after that there is an hour long entertainment act for adult (we had circus, comedy show, rio dancers, river…

title: lovely hotel
review: We had a good holodays but won't go back to this hotel unless we were taking the grandchildren. We didn't research hotel enough it is very child centred. Lovely room,good food and excellent pool area but shortage of sunbeds and they were packed very tightly.

title: Excellent complex in a great location
review: Dear client, Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and share your experiences at Viva Tropic. We careful take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion. We hope that the next time you can rate us better. Sincerely yours,

title: Great trip
review: Lovely rooms, friendly staff, great all inclusive, especially the food from the pool bar. Sun loungers available in the middle of August. Great location, close to resort centre. Would definitely go back to Viva Tropic!!

title: Excellent service
review: We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day.Both staff and I (Manager) are very pleased that your stay at our hotel has been to your liking. We hope to see you next year. Best regards

title: Waste of money
review: This is the third time that we have stayed at The Viva Tropic but this time we chose the all inclusive option as we had our grandson with us. Once again no complaints about this hotel. Location, staff, rooms and food all great. I would definitely recommend the all inclusive option and especially the food at the pool restaurant. We will be going back again next year!

title: Brilliant for children
review: I traveled in June as a single parent with my 15 month old and we had a brilliant time.  The hotel is perfect for children with a brilliant swimming pool with slides, a playground with a bouncy castle and a fab kids entertainment team.  It is only a 5 min walk to the beach, and it is all sand with a long promenade so perfect for children.  The food was fantastic. Large variety and all freshly cooked.  The all inclusive drinks were fab too - lovely cocktails and table service in the evening watching the entertainment.  All the staff were fantastic - especially the waiting staff who entertained my daughter. We were in a 1 bed apartment, which was lovely.  Meant I could relax in the living space when my daughter went to bed. Definitely somewhere I would go back to.

title: Not for adults, could do better
review: We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day.Both staff and I (Manager) are very pleased that your stay at our hotel has been to your liking. We hope to see you next year. Best regards

title: Great hotel
review: Travelled here with my mum and dad for a nice relaxing holiday but it didn't quite turn out how we'd imagined. This is not a bad hotel but it wasn't for us for the following reasons. Entrance to hotel very nice, but no welcome on check in and no information what so ever given on hotel apart from one piece of paper with meal times and cleaning days. Told room not ready, had to wait approx 2 hours, not a problem as went for some lunch and a look around. When the room was ready we had to find it ourselves and it was not as booked with regards to sleeping arrangements. Went back to reception where staff said they would change the room but repeated over and over that we mustn't have touched anything in the old room. They also tried to get us to pay an extra 70 euros for a pool view.…

title: Good Family Holiday
review: Dear client, Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and share your experiences at Viva Tropic. We careful take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion. We hope that the next time you can rate us better. Sincerely yours,

title: A dream  come true.
review: Really enjoyed our stay at the viva tropic. The room was lovely, good flat screen TV, nice balcony and great location. There is a choice of 5 pools, the majority of which get extremely busy through the day, with the exception of the adult pool. The adult pool is like a little paradise, big massive comfy padded double bed type sun beds (which get very hot through the day so a large towel is needed) and was never overly busy with cool little jacuzzi pods round the outside of the pool. The only thing that really let the hotel down for me was the really really poor wifi. I know you don't go on holiday to use devices etc, but the majority of other hotels and establiments have really strong reliable wifi, here that just wasn't the case. The hotel does advertise as having a gym,…

title: Could do better to be a real 4 star
review: Visited in early September with our toddler. Rooms very disappointing considering it's supposed to be a 4 star hotel.  Staff very hard working and friendly. Went all inclusive and food was good. Cocktails and drinks hit and miss.  Entertainment not very good I'm afraid. Also as all of it is outdoors it all finishes at 10.  I think there are better 4 star places in Alcudia for the price when we come back next time.

title: Another lovely Viva hotel
review: Dear client, Thank you for dedicating a few minutes of your time in rating and share your experiences at Viva Tropic. We careful take note of the points that we must improve in your opinion. We hope that the next time you can rate us better. Sincerely yours, Pep Escalas Hotel Manager

title: Great hotel
review: For our 4th stay at a Viva Hotel we chose the Viva Tropic & Spa having previously been to Viva Ca'n Picafort, Viva Alcudia Sun Village (now BQ) and Viva Rey Don Jaime.  We travelled as a party of 5, this time with Thomson and once again we were not disappointed.  The hotel location is perfect being close to the beach but in a quiet area. We had 2 ground floor 1-bed apartments on the west side of the hotel facing the road. Initially we didn’t like the idea of a ground floor apartment however this had the advantage of having our own sunbeds on the grass. The rooms were fine, the a/c worked, the TV was ok, the fridge was cold although the girls would have preferred a bath rather than just a shower. The hotel was quiet at night and we were not disturbed by the neighbours. We rented…

title: Family holiday
review: We greatly appreciate your comments and suggestions as it helps us to improve our work every day.Both staff and I (Manager) are very pleased that your stay at our hotel has been to your liking. We hope to see you next year.  Best regards

title: Friendly family hotel
review: Had a week at Viva Tropic. It was a great hotel, perfect for family. Food was good, always a good choice (though slightly geared to German tastes, there was always LOTS of choice for everyone).  The Pool bar at lunch time gave an extra good choice and the ability to get takeaway as part of the AI package was excellent.   Rooms were clean. We moved sofa bed mattress onto the floor of the bedroom for our 2.5 year old and there was room (although getting in the wardrobe was a bit more tricky).  Range of drinks on offer was good, entertainment was a bit rubbish, but what you'd expect. Our 2.5 year old loved the few activities she took part in. Playground, trampoline and bouncy castle all fun, as was the splash pool and other swimming pools.   Only 2 downsides - the lifts are…

title: Perfect, family hotel
review: We stayed at the Viva Tropic in August for two glorious weeks. We had a two bedroom apartment with our own garden & loungers. Lots of space, with a pool view.  This is very much a family hotel and seemed to attract lots of families with younger children. Great pools to suit everyone and plenty of room to sunbathe (we loved the municipal field/park area as it was so peaceful)  The staff work extremely hard and deserve credit, especially brothers Gonzalo & Jaq who, always had a smile on their faces! Pillar on reception was helpful and friendly as were the other staff.  The location is perfect for the beach and the old town, which is beautiful, is only a 15 minute walk. The only one thing we would say is that the evening entertainment wasn't great. We don't particularly go to a…

title: Viva tropic
review: Brilliant family holiday ages ranging from 14months to 59 excellent value for money all inclusive very good choice of food and drink excellent staff and service highly recommended all the staff work very hard and it shows well done to all at viva tropic hope to return next year xx

title: Don't always trust brochures.
review: We have stayed here twice in an upgraded room overlooking the pool (2012 and 2015). It was in the main building, there's only 2 small lifts and they can be quite busy, 4 people is a bit of a personal space issue. The hotel and rooms are clean. Same as most other hotels there are very nice staff and there are the occasional not so friendly staff. You just bypass the miserable ones and get on with your holiday. We were asked when we checked in why we hadn't booked direct through their website, they said it would have been cheaper. I told them I looked at their website, but it was so much more expensive we ended up getting our flights and transfers for free. They weren't impressed. The upgraded room we stayed in had a separate bedroom from the lounge/kitchenette which was really…

title: Lovely hotel
review: We stayed at Viva Tropic on a self catering basis due to my boyfriend being a coeliac. The staff are friendly and speak very good English. Our room was lovely and fresh and big enough for us both. The bed was huge and super comfy which we aren't used to abroad! The kitchen is tiny although equipped. We had 2 rings on the hob, a microwave and a kettle. However there isn't much work space so you end up making meals on the dressing table. The maids clean the rooms 5 times per week. Ours was always cleaned to a very high standard ans the maids always say hello when you are passing. We spent most of our time at the adult pool. The other pools are great but it's very difficult to get a sun bed at the others after 9.30am. There are lots of children which you must bear in mind before…

title: Good hotel
review: I really enjoyed my stay at viva tropic. The rooms were comfortable, with good air con and bathrooms. The facilities at the hotel were good, and I particularly enjoyed the adults pool. The food at the hotel was decent; lunch was excellent, although I've had better breakfasts. There were also a large number of kids around, so this is something to bare in mind. All in all, I would return

title: Family Holiday
review: Amazing hotel and staff! Kids club was excellent for my nieces . .  Lots of food and alcohol choice! Would stay again!! The location of the hotel is central to everything.  Stunning locations around . .first trip to Mallorca but won't be the last

title: Great Hotel for families
review: We have just returned from an 8 night stay here and are already talking about going back next year. There was 10 in our group with 4 children under 8. There was so much for them to do, they especially loved the kids pool and park and the entertainment staff were great with them. The pool bar was great at lunch and the food was lovely. Jesus and Sandra were the two that stuck out and always made sure we had a table even at busy times, although there wasn't a bad word to say about any of the staff. Would definitely recommend this hotel and we will be back to see Bufo next year.

title: Excellent place for family's
review: All round a brilliant place for family's and couples, food was very good everyday couldn't fault it. Location is perfect only a five minute walk too alcudia beach and local shops, the night time entertainment suits both children and adults. Would definitely visit again

title: Good family resort
review: Stayed at Viva Tropic for 9 nights at the end of August 2016 having booked through On The Beach holidays. Wasn't sure of what to expect as we usually book a private villa but went for this as were holidaying with another family that wanted onsite facilities etc. On arrival we found the reception staff friendly and helpful, porters were available to help with our luggage and guide us to our room if required. Our 2 bed apartment was reasonable, bedrooms were a good size, bathroom was ok but is in need of refurbishment, enamel peeling off the bath, dirty grouting etc etc. we were self catering rather than taking the all inclusive option and although we didnt intend to do much home cooking here the kitchen is limited for space and facilities, although it does include microwave, two…

title: Viva Blue and relax
review: Second year we have been to this hotel and still as great as the first.love the fact no early morning towel run as if you leave your towel for more than half an hour the life guard takes them.entertainment team was great but what I think makes our stay so enjoyable is the waiters/waitresses they work so hard but are always smiling and have time for you one in particular is Alicia she didn't stop but always made everyone smile I wanted to bring her home with us as we already miss her. The hotel was so clean and the rooms was spotless.just can't fault this hotel but as I said the staff make your holiday.see you you next year.

title: Not bad but not great.
review: We came here in early August with a group of six.  This is our third stay in a viva hotel so we know what we should expect regarding service and rooms etc.  Pros-  The privilege room was fantastic and I would recommend this to anyone. We could sunbathe on our own beds on our decking area. No need for the morning sunbed rush , no lifts, no public toilets, pop in and out to get changed etc   To get these rooms you need to book via their website and book flights separate.   Pool area:-  The pools are great and the inflatable bubble was a big hit with the kids.   Location:- The location was very good and only a few minutes walk to the busy marina area and beach.   Kids entertainment:-  The kids love this place. Kids disco, football for the teenagers every morning and evening and the…

title: Great stay as always
review: Stayed here this year for the fifth time. We went self catering. We had a great time as always. 5 minute walk to the beach and harbour. Lots of great restaurants around the beach front and up the harbour roads. Staff very friendly and helpful. Food at the pool bar is nice but pricey and small portions. We discovered this year you can pay to eat in the all inclusive restaurant at lunchtime for a very similar price to the cost of foid plys 1 drink at the pool bar. Food choice was good and you can go up as many times as you like, cost also includes 1 drink. The kids pool is great with lots of slides and its very shallow. Lots of activities for kids. Thet have installed a wet bubble which was turned on at 10am and went off at 6 or 7pm. This entertained our son all day. For the first…

title: Dissapp
review: Won't be staying there again,hotel has dated and very shabby appearance to it.apartment had limited facility's  for family's.several appliances didn't work one being the fridge.not good!lifts in lobby were a joke.

title: Another fantastic holiday here
review: Repeat visitors, had been in 2015 and this year was just as good As all the family are now 18 and above, we were all able to go in the adult only pool which is where we spent most of our time. Very relaxing Weather lovely. Staff just as good as 2015 and really looked after us. Food  and drink choices in all inclusive very good and we have already booked again for 2017

title: Returned for 2nd year fab
review: This is our second stay at the viva tropic and have rebooked for 2017 we love the viva tropic the staff are helpful and the rooms are lovely we didnt get a pool view so view from balconey was the road but that didnt bother us as you dont spend that much time in your room  The adult pool is one of the best things about this hotel as we are a couple and i must say there are alot i mean alot of families at this hotel with young children so if you want peace the adults only pool is great . The hotel location is great alcudia is beautiful and the all inclusive at the viva tropic is the best ive had food fab cocktails amazing waiter service is nice although sometimes you get overlooked but the staff work so hard all day this hotel is well worth the price you pay one of the best if not…

title: Amazing Holiday
review: Just returned from a weeks stay at this hotel and can honestly say I loved every second of it! A group of 7 of us went and we all had so much fun, they cater for everyone and there is so much to do in the hotel that you don't have to leave for your whole stay if you choose not to!  The staff were all lovely I cannot fault them at all, and our maid left our room spotless. The kids pools are perfect for children to play in with water slides for younger children and the main pool for older children, they even had a 18+ pool if you wanted a quiet, relaxing swim. We were lucky enough to get a hot tub on our balcony which was perfect as we were with young children who had an afternoon naps in the afternoon, so we could chill out in the hot tub! The food was amazing and there was so…

title: Happy Kids.. Happy Parents.. and we're talking Teenage kids!!!
review: This review I must say would be a 5 star... the only reason it was knocked down was from a personal point - we were a party of 13, two families of 4, my family being 5, meaning I needed two rooms.  The two rooms, despite being booked back in January and requests put in to be together, were at two totally ends of the floor, meaning my 12 year old son had to share with his uncle and was so far away from me, which just felt wrong - They were also put in a room, with a queensize bed, rather than two twins!  Well apart from that, we got over it, the rooms were very clean and although could do with a little updating, i.e. get rid of the laminate flooring, update kitchen area (not that we needed that as we were all inclusive.   The Bathroom had a fab walk in shower, with plenty of hot…

title: Great stay
review: We have just arrived home today from a week at the Viva Tropic, we came with our two small children , 3yr & 5yr. We absolutely loved it,loads to do and even more for the kids.  The food was lovely and plenty of it and always available the cocktails were out of this world.  The rooms were great with the maids changing towels and bedding regularly.  The evening entertainment was great.  We only left the hotel twice as everything we needed was there. All the staff were very friendly and polite.  I would definitely recommend the spa and full body massage well worth the money.   Overall the stay was better than expected and was really pleased there was lots of activities day and night for the children and will definitely be going back next year.

title: Amazing family holiday!
review: Just returned from a weeks stay here and had a fantastic time! We travelled as a family of 7 (4 adults 3 children aged 12, 7 & 5) The hotel was lovely, clean rooms with a huge bed and lots of pool options including the bubble pool which kept our older children very entertained! Standard of food served was very high, we have stayed all inclusive many times before and this was our best experience to date. There were options to please everyone and the included drinks were also of a really good quality, cocktails in particular! What made the holiday for us was the staff. Could not fault a single member of staff everyone we met went out of their way to be friendly and helpful. The waiting staff at all bars and restaurants were professional and it was a nice touch having waiter…

title: 2nd time
review: I can't praise this hotel enough, lovely setting, close to beach and shops. Staff were always professional, very polite and looked after us well. Our room was perfect ( we did go for the Royal terrace) and as I mentioned it is our second visit. The hotel was very clean, air conditioned and had WiFi. Restaurant catered for every palate. Definitely a place to stay 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

title: Family Fun in the sun !
review: Very well serviced hotel, staff super efficient, rooms and hotel in general kept very clean , good food and pools. Quick walk to town, beach on its doorstep and treatments with Gloria suburb. No thrills excursion company nearby to book good trips, well worth it.

title: Summer Sun
review: I have just returned from an excellent visit. The hotel could not have been more perfect. I would firstly like to thank the ladies on reception for being so understanding and helpful. I arrived from Luton with no luggage due to Easy Jet leaving all 3 cases in Luton. When we got to the hotel I did explain this to them and it seemed that they manage to get us to our room early as we arrived about 2 hours before I was meant to  check in. Well done and thanks you. The food was excellent and was always hot which has not always been the case at all inclusive hotels.  The kids loved the kids clubs and especially BUFO but my only complaint is the CD that my daughter brought as I am sure I know all the words to the BUFO song which is on constantly. I have been travelling to this type of…

title: Top Family Holiday
review: An excellent resort which met the needs of the whole family (2 girls aged 6 and 8). Very clean with excellent facilities (a different pool for each day of your week holiday!). Staff were wonderful on reception as well as the bar and restaurant. Kids club staff really cared about the children having a great holiday.  Evening entertainment was top notch and a good variety.  Would highly recommend it for anyone wanting a stress free holiday.

title: Great hotel, very family friendly
review: The location of this hotel is my favorit. 20 minutes walk to old town (lovely evening stroll and many cosy and nice restaurants), 3 minutes to walk to "center"/port and 3 minutes to walk to the beach :) nice facilities, though I wished that the gym opens earlier than 9... Friendly staff and pleasant stay in overall!

title: Family break
review: Just arrived back from a week away in the viva tropic and feel very relaxed due to being very well fed watered and relaxed  The room we were in was clean and I have never slept in such a comfy bed away on holiday before  The reception crew were informative and spoke good English  The food was lovely and varied each day ,the waiters at lunchtime at the poolside bar were attentive  Slightly moaning but in the evening the waiters came to your table to take your drink orders ,you weren't allowed to go to the bar to order and so your drinks took a while to come or not come at all and have to re order  The hotel is in a good position for the beach and shops   The Thomas cook rep was poor and didn't really offer any trips or things to do in alcudia so we organised a boat trip ourselves…

title: Amazing family holiday
review: We stayed for 10 days at the beginning of August , two families of 3. A fifteen year old and a four year old. To be honest there was nothing you could fault from start to finish. The rooms are lovely clean and modern very spacious.  The staff are so helpful and friendly go out of their way to make your stay.  The food is very tasty and there's something for all .  The pools are amazing, there's plenty for all to do throughout the day and the entertainment staff also work very hard.  This is our first visit we would definitely go back.  The reception team also need a mention nothing too much trouble.  I would recommend this holiday to the most fussy of travellers.

title: Very average experience
review: We thought that Viva Tropic in Port Alcudia had several good points; the room (we had a "villa with swim-up pool" - which was a two bedroom apartment which shares a pool with the other villas), the size of the resort was good for kids, proximity to a lovely sandy beach,  facilities for kids (playpark, water slides) and lunch at the pool bar.  Everything else about it was average or below average.  The food at the buffet wasn't great (breakfast was ok, but dinner was very uninspiring), the gym is badly equipped and half the machines didn't work.    The main issue that I had with this hotel is the attitude of the staff.  With the exception of the kids' club and reception staff, I found them to be bossy, rude and unhelpful.  They make no effort to engage with guests and seem to…

title: Great family all inclusive
review: This my first time all inclusive with my wife and 2 kids(8 and 5), so have nothing to compare to. On arrival the reception is well decorated, clean and spacious. Checking in was easy and we were very kindly upgraded to a 2 bedroom apartment instead of the 1 bedroom we booked. This was great news add it meant the kids had needs instead of soda needs. We were reminded of the Mallorcan tourist tax which we paid on departure, this is new this year and every tourist will have to pay it. The room was very tidy and cleaned thoroughly 5 days a week with towel changes. The room was of the standard I would expect for the price, could do with updating. It has cooking facilities, a TV, a safe(free of charge) and a lovely balcony with view. The many pools are amazing with something to suit…

title: Excellent holiday
review: Stayed here for a week in August. Would defo recommend the hotel & to top it off location was great. The hotel was very clean and staff were really nice, helpful & polite. Pools were great, adult pool was a hit and kids loved the blown up ball in the pool.  Food was nice with lots of choice and the pool lunch was very nice with Waiter\table service. Lots of variety of drinks and cocktails. Just a shame the bar closed at 12midnight, an extra hour would have been nice. The rooms we had we fine, have had better but they were ok, with a nice sized balcony, although air con wasn't the best. There are 3 lifts in the main holding to rooms but there were very slow so going up the stairs is much quicker unless your on 5th floor then you'd have to wait for a lift. The sun bed rule is good…

title: Viva fabulous
review: We stayed at viva tropic as a family of 7 for 10 nights in August. Last year we stayed in viva can picafort we enjoyed it so much we wanted to try another viva hotel and we were not disappointed. This is a fab hotel we thoroughly enjoyed our stay plenty of pools to choose from kids loved the pirate pool. Few more sun beds would be a good addition Food was of good standard especially breakfast and lunch at the pool bar. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Jesus who served us at the pool bar deserves a special mention.  Staff at the kids club were great with the kids and there was plenty of activities to keep them entertained. Location of this hotel is very close to shops and restaurants and a short walk to Alcudia beach.  Beach is beautiful. Also enjoyed a wonderful massage at…

title: Great hotel
review: Fantastic for the kids with something to do for them all day every day. Food was superb with something to suit every diet. The only slight complaint I have is there was no air conditioning in the gym which made it very hot, but apart from that I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Generally good but room for improvement
review: I stayed for 10 nights in August and would sum up the stay as a mixed experience, with some definite room for improvement.   -great swimming pools but the area around the pool is very small and there are not enough sunbeds, this means it is difficult to supervise your children when they are in the pool. The area around the pool is very cramped so you couldn't even bring a chair to watch your children.   -rooms were fine but don't really compare to the quality of other 4* hotels I have stated in.   -the food was generally good. The choice at the buffet lunch was limited but less busy than the pool bar. There was a good choice of food at breakfast and dinner. The stray cats in the patio area were very off putting! Waiting staff were attentive in the dining area.   -the evening…

title: Mm not quite 4* .. Slightly disappointed 🙁
review: I'd first like to say this isn't my first visit to a viva hotel.. We visited Viva Alcudia sun village last year and totally loved it. So thinking we would be upgrading I was super excited .  Having paid in excess of £5000 for 2 weeks holiday this was no cheap & cheerful holiday so expected something special.  From entering the hotel the reception was a lovely area and seemed loads going on.  My first meeting with the reception staff I wasn't told anything about the hotel except our room was a room with no views looking over the back street .... And if we wanted to we could change our room to a pool view room at the cost of €140 !!!!!  Now the money wasn't the issue ... My problem with this is if the room is there surely the good rooms should be first come first served ! As all…

title: Family holiday
review: Nice hotel couldn't fault anything staff friendly rooms large and clean branded drinks with all inclusive entertainment was ok nice walk to the harbour with loads of shops and restaurants eat out a few times just for a change nice trip on small train that runs about port

title: An average stay for us
review: The good  Family hotel, good with kids, shallow pool and deep pool, adult only pool, adventure playground. All inclusive, sèems to include everything except al a carte dining and safes. The rooms and beds are good standard, we stayed in a studio on floor one facing outside and a pool view on the pool facing side. Lunch at pool bar was by far the best meal of the day, cooked to order and waiter service. Disabled access is good  The not so good  The breakdast and evening meal felt the weakest, breakfast suffered from near cold cooked food though the standard was ok as for the evening meal, i was struggling to put a good meal together. The pool, where some might argue a good thing, if you leave your sunbed for 40 mins the staff pull off your towels as there is a no reserve policy…

title: Holiday in Alcudia, Mallorca
review: Viva Tropic Hotel. Lovely Hotel, Great pool  area, 6 altogether, all different depths. Ideal for families with children of any age, Life guard at every pool which is good,  Rooms are apartments, You can get self-catering to All inclusive.Really had a excellent time. Staff always ready to help. Near to the beach approximately 4/5 mins walk. Close to main shopping area and the Port. Plenty of restaurants close to the hotel if you want to go out for meals.

title: Too big?
review: We enjoyed our stay in Viva Tropic. One of the main reasons were the fact that we chose one of the top floor apartments with big terrace and jacuzzi.   The door to the apartment was thin so you could hear everyone passing by. It is a family hotel so lots of kids running and because of the all inclusive some people that had been drinking too much.  The bath was clean and tidy.  The kitchen was alright, but there wasn't much equipment. Although we had microwave, water heater and a bad coffee machine. Maybe a suggestion to the hotel would have been to buy Nespresso-machines for the "better" room types?  We felt that the quality of the apartment didn't quite reach up to four stars. Its hard to explain exactly what was missing, but just a feeling. For example the old refrigerator had…

title: Overall enjoyable but more suited to u10's
review: Just back from 2wks in Viva Tropic.  1st impressions, Need to cut back on air freshner in Reception, very overpowering. Room was a 1 bed facing onto road but really was scrubland we were looking at.  Hotel is spotless and couldn't fault it or the hard working cleaners. You have a regular cleaner assigned to your room during your stay, Dolce was ours and what a lady, nothing was too much for her.  We were all inclusive, food was only ok but nothing great compared to other a/I hotels I've stayed in. Dinner finished really early at 9pm, no serving beyond this time.
